4. There are other "lost sheep" that the Master must bring, And they must the message be told; He sends me to gather them out of all lands, And welcome them back to His fold.

SongPage.Title: 184 THOUGH YOUR SINS BE AS SCARLET
SongPage.Context:
1. Tho' your sins be as scarlet, They shall be as white as snow; Tho' your sins be as scarlet, They shall be as white as snow; Tho' they be red like crimson, They shall be as wool! Tho' your sins be as scarlet, Tho' your sins be as scarlet, They shall be as white as snow, They shall be as white as snow.
2. Hear the voice that entreats you, O return ye unto God! Hear the voice that entreats you, O return ye unto God! He is of great compassion, And of wondrous love; Hear the voice that entreats you, Hear the voice that entreats you, O return ye unto God! O return ye unto God!
3. He'll forgive your transgressions, And remember them no more; He'll forgive your transgressions, And remember them no more; "Look unto Me, and be ye saved." Saith the Lord your God! He'll forgive your transgressions, He'll forgive your transgressions, And remember them no more, And remember them no more.

SongPage.Title: 186 IF I GAINED THE WORLD
SongPage.Context:
1. If I gained the world, but not the Savior, "Were my life worth living for a day? Could my yearning heart find rest and comfort In the things that soon must pass away? IfI gained the world, but not the Savior, Would my gain be worth the lifelong strife? Are all earthly pleasures worth comparing For a moment with a Christ filled life？
2. Had I wealth and love in fullest measure, And a name revered both far and near, Yet no hope beyond, no harbor waiting, Where my storm-tossed vessel I could steer; If I gained the world, but not the Savior, Who endured the cross and died for me, Could then all the world afford a refuge, Whither, in my anguish, I might flee.
3. O what emptiness - Without the Savior 'Mid the sins and sorrows here below! And eternity, how dark without Him! Only night and tears and endless woe! What, tho' I might live without the Savior, When I come to die, how would it be? O to face the valley's gloom without Him! And without Him all eternity!
4. O the joy of having all in Jesus! What a balm the broken heart to heal! Ne'er a sin so great, but He'll forgive it, Nor a sorrow that He does not feel! If I have but Jesus, only Jesus - Nothing else in all the would beside - O then ev'rything is mine in Jesus; For my needs and more He will provide.

SongPage.Title: 189 SOFTLY AND TENDERLY
SongPage.Context:
1. Softly and tenderly Jesus is calling, Calling for you and for me; See, on the portals He's waiting and watching, Watching for you and for me.
Refrain: Come home, Come home, Ye who are weary come home; Earnestly, tenderly, Jesus is calling, Calling, O sinner, come home!
2. Why should we tarry when Jesus is pleading - Pleading for you and for me? Why should we linger and heed not His mercies - Mercies for you and for me?
3. Time is now fleeting, the moments are passing - Passing from you and from me; Shadows are gathering, deathbeds are coming - Coming for you and for me!
4. Oh, for the wonderful love He has promised - Promised for you and for me! Though we have sinned, He has mercy and pardon - Pardon for you and for me!

SongPage.Title: 191 JUST AS I AM
SongPage.Context:
1. Just as I am, without one plea, But that Thy blood was shed for me, And that Thou bid'st me come to Thee, O Lamb of God, I come! I come!
2. Just as I am, and waiting not To rid my soul of one dark blot; To Thee whose blood can cleanse each spot, O Lamb of God, I come! I come!
3. Just as I am, though tossed about With many a conflict, many a doubt; Fightings within, and fears without, O Lamb of God, I come! I come!
4. Just as I am, poor, wretched, blind; Sight, riches, healing of the mind; Yes, all I need, in Thee to find, O Lamb of God, I come! I come!
5. Just as I am, Thou wilt receive, Wilt welcome, pardon, cleanse, relieve; Because Thy promise I believe, O Lamb of God, I come! I come!

SongPage.Title: 193 O GOD, OUR HELP IN AGES PAST
SongPage.Context:
1. O God, our help in ages past, Our hope for years to come, Our shelter from the stormy blast, And our eternal home.
2. Under the shadow of Thy throne Thy saints have dwelt secure; Sufficient is Thine arm alone, And our defence is sure.
3. Before the hills in order stood, Or earth received her frame, From everlasting Thou art God, To endless years the same.
4. A thousand ages in Thy sight Are like an evening gone, Short as the watch that ends the night, Before the rising sun.
5. Time, like an ever-rolling stream, Bears all its sons away; They fly forgotten, as a dream Dies at the opening day.
6. O God, our help in ages past, Our hope for years to come, Be Thou our guard while life shall last, And our eternal home!

SongPage.Title: 02 The Love of the Father, The Son And The Holy Spirit
SongPage.Context:
1. You are the living God Forevermore, Of wonder and glory, "I am that I am." Mid the Father, the Son, And the Holy Spirit, There's interflow of love before time began.
2. The Father and the Son and the Spirit, Sweet and perfect in one, love boundless and deep. Now I can partake such closest tie and love, Drink from the highest love, my heart rests in peace.
3. O God, the First, the Last, Great Your glory! Yet You have thought of me since eternity. How precious are Your thoughts, they outnumber the sand Or the stars of heaven, all with love for me.
4. Through all eternity, You're loving me, Long that I'm joined to You, E'er in love abide. Lord, You are my Beloved; Your heart , Your arm are mine, Sharing Your everything with me You desire.

SongPage.Title: 06 Grace Before Time Began
SongPage.Context:
1. Before time began was salvation grace Given to me in Christ Jesus. From e'erlasting, He've thought of me. Such love draws me, comforts my soul.
2. What length, breadth, height and depth, Lord, is Your love! Gives me warmth, melts my heart each passing hour. My soul adores, flows endless praise. Your bands of love draws me to You.

SongPage.Title: 08 He Came From Heaven To Earth
SongPage.Context:
1. God's beloved Son came from heaven to earth, His name is Jesus, Dwelt among men with glory, Full of grace, full of truth. From heaven to earth He came to bring me Back to the Father's fold.
2. God's beloved Son came from heaven to earth, Was in a manger born. He bore all sorrows for me. He walked to the cross for me. God's beloved Son came from heaven to earth; He gave Himself for me.
3. God's beloved Son came from heaven to earth, To fight battles for me. Destroyed the works of Satan, He took away all my sins. From heaven to earth He came to bring me Out of death into life.
4. God's beloved Son came from heaven to earth, Forever He is man. He is so kind and friendly. What love and warmth He gives me! God's beloved Son came from heaven to earth, His great love melts my heart.

SongPage.Title: 12 The Love Song Of Heaven And Earth
SongPage.Context: Gazes upon the earth, the hea'en above, Yet the earth has never cared. But today, dear Lord, it's so different now, Through heaven and earth Your love is shown. Looking up, run my tears, 'cause You've once left there, And now again You are there. Why should the heaven bow to kiss the earth? Why should it shelter the earth? If You were the clouds up high, I could only be a small grass down on earth. Yet the clouds turn to rain, showering down, To nourish my whole life. Never dared I to dream of the things above, But today I am seated in heaven with You. 'Tis too good to be true, yet this message from You, Is the best that's ever come true.

SongPage.Title: 14 The Love Of Endurance
SongPage.Context: From heaven, Lord, You came. It makes me so amazed. You were mocked and despised, yet Your love was still the same. E'en Your brothers' sneers could not quench Your love, Men's indifference showed more Your love of endurance. The world forsook You, and cried, "Away with Him!" You were steadfast, walked to Calvary! Wondrous Cross! Wondrous Cross! Vast forgiveness and bountiful grace flowing from the cross! Love as flashes of fire, as the flame of God! Your fervent love to men makes me ever amazed, adore!

SongPage.Title: 16 All For Me
SongPage.Context:
1. Lord Jesus, You've given Yourself for me. You have poured out Your life freely for me; Walked to Place of a Skull, and were hung on the tree, Blood and water came out, all for me.
2. Lord Jesus, You've suffered so much for me. You have borne those lashes in Your body; You are God, yet for me, were despised by the world. Thank You, Lord, You've done these 'cause of me.
3. O Lord Jesus, whom my soul loves, You are now abiding in my heart; Precious indwelling, union forever! Nothing can keep You and me apart.
4. Storms and waves may come to me all the way, But all these just urge me to You draw near You; Lord, I'm glad to abide in Your bosom of love, And respond to You with all my life.

SongPage.Title: 20 The Love Of The Cross
SongPage.Context:
1. Not that I loved the Lord Jesus, But He has loved me first, Dying for me on Calvary, Bearing all my sins for me.
2. My Lord's love is as strong as death, Fervent as burning flame. Waters, great waters cannot quench; All treasures cannot replace.

SongPage.Title: 22 The Loving Course Of Jesus -The Crucifixion
SongPage.Context:
"Away with Him!" cried men on earth. They drove the Lord out of the gate. Wounded He bore the cross for me, To Golgotha bled all the way.
2. Though He was rich; He became poor Even His clothes cast lots they took. All thro' His life, weary and sore, In manger born, died on the cross.
3. His hands were nailed; His feet were pierced, Hung on the tree, dreadfully cursed. His blood flowed down, bones could be counted, Tongue cleaved to jaws, heart melted like wax.
4. 'Fountain of Life' said, "I'm thirsty." From lake of fire, He did save me. God's beloved Son, by God forsaken. Lonely, He tasted death for me.
5. His face was marred, and He was crushed. Bloody and scarred, within and without. The precious veil is rent for me. A living way to God He leads me.

SongPage.Title: 26 The Love Of Salvation
SongPage.Context:
1. How I thank You, dear Lord! You came to die for me. You shed Your blood; Hands, feet were pierced, To save a wretch like me.
2. Moved deeply by this love, Eyes brimmed with tears I bow. O Son of God, how can it be That You should die for my sins!
3. Saved from eternal death, Set free from pow'r of sin, Led into the marvelous light, E'er in God's kingdom I live.

SongPage.Title: 28 It's You Who Have Loved Me, My Lord!
30 The Cross Of Golgotha
SongPage.Context:
1. O the cross of Golgotha Tells the love of my Saviour, how deep! Down from heaven full of wealth and glory, You did come, shed Your blood for me. Foxes have holes, even birds of the air have nests, Yet You had no place to lay Your head.
2. O the cross of Golgotha Tells the love of my Saviour, how rich! Suffered all the shame and scoffs so sorely, Gave Yourself, bore the stripes for me. The crown of thorns, the wounded hands and feet and side- I am set free by Your sacrifice!
3. Think and think - O Lord, Your love undying! Ne'er its depth can I realize! Gazing upon the cross - Your arms are open wide, May I come and consecrate my life.

SongPage.Title: 32 Bitterness On The Cross
SongPage.Context:
1. Behold! The sun gave not its light. The earth was darkened and shook; He left His Father's face and died, For me lowly and vile.
2. I view the cross from every side, His blood, His wounds I meet: His head, His face, His hands, His back, His side, His trunk, His feet.
3. For me to understand His love, He let His side be pierced; Flowed blood and water proving this: His heart 's wounded for me!
4. Hear, on the cross the Lord's first words: "Father! Forgive them! Forgive!" He died to pardon countless sins; He died that we might live.
5. To the corners of the earth I'll tell The wondrous love of the cross. Begone, the world's riches and pride! I lose them to gain Christ!

SongPage.Title: 36 The Costly Grace
SongPage.Context:
1. The grace of my Lord Jesus Christ - O what a costly grace! The Son of God once became poor for me. In manger born, He was humble and toiled, Died on the cross, for me suffered all loss, Of flesh and blood, bore the cruel punishment, God's beloved Son was by God forsaken. O what a costly grace, that makes me rich in faith, My Lord, I love You, adore You, Such love deserves my heart to gain.
2. The grace of my Lord, Jesus Christ Immense, glorious and rich! Surpasses human thoughts God's vast ocean of love! Captives of sin now with the Lord shall reign; Men of distress now are children of God; Once enemies now become His darling; One with the Lord, never sep'rate again O what a costly grace! What a beautiful heart! My Lord, I love You, embrace You, Enjoy and trust. My heart 's amazed!

SongPage.Title: 40 The Love Of The Blood
SongPage.Context:
1. May I oft meditate: What a place You put me in Your heart! How You long to be united with me! What a price You have paid for this!
2. May I oft meditate: "I am willing," You said through Your blood. Betrothed me with Your blood ever to You, How You desire and long for me.
3. May I oft meditate: How You long to abide in my heart, Be one spirit with me, ever draw near. You will to share all things with me.
4. Never forget Your grace! May I think of Your love every day; Shakes the earth, thrills my heart, Lord, Your great love! May my heart ever love You only!

SongPage.Title: 42 Deep Deep Love Of The Lord
SongPage.Context: Lord Jesus, Your love 's so deep; I can never measure all. For my sake, You suffered, Gave Yourself and bore my sins. Rugged road, You hold my hand; In troubles, You relieve me. I should rest inside Your love, Let Your love fill me deeply. I know You did everything for me. I should love You more than anything. In north wind or south wind, I'll still sing and praise You. Only You can fill my heart. May the whole world taste Your grace.

SongPage.Title: 44 Your Love So Touching
SongPage.Context:
1. Lord, Your love 's so true! For me You suffered all sneers and sores. For me You bore the cross! For me You abide in my heart. For me You ever live! I know for sure this love is true, Not just brief mercy You give.
2. Lord, Your love 's so deep, Gives me abundant life of glory, Like a charming melody. Thru' days, thru' months, thru' all the years, Brings forth enchanting hymns. When I reach home, may I repeat ev'ry song of love at Your feet.

SongPage.Title: 46 The Steadfast Love
SongPage.Context: Is there any love as Lord Your love, More lasting than the universe? Through all the ages Your thoughts for me Outnumber the sand of the sea. Hark, the voice of my Beloved! Behold, from heaven He came. To find me He came from heaven. And took the form of a slave. Why for me a homeless life You lived, Acquaint'd with pain and grief? I retrace in Bethany Before the tomb You did weep. God's love is the same to the end. Behold the perfect Son of Man, Without a trace of changing shadow, He's gentle and mild even now. His gaze is tender and charming, Draws me from wandering. It melts my heart, it melts my heart, It melts my unyielding heart. Why You had a marred and grieved form, No place to lay Your head? I retrace on the cruel cross Your love that overcame death. I have to give thanks, I am amazed, Such love in this world I've obtained. To me steadfast and unchanging, It's You who's ever-loving. Your love that great waters cannot quench, Deserves all my heart to gain.

SongPage.Title: 52 His Wounds My Hiding Place
SongPage.Context:
1. Rock of Ages cleft for me! Precious blood was shed for me! Cleansed me of my guilt and sin, Cleared away thick clouds and mist; Your love and blood, the best balm, Heal the wounds deep in my heart.
2. Rock of Ages cleft for me! Precious blood was shed for me! Washed me whiter than the snow, Even brighter than crystal. The Father opens His arms, Welcomes me back to His fold.
3. Rock of Ages cleft for me! Precious blood was shed for me! Cast away my fears and doubts, Bestow me sufficient faith. Boldly to the Holiest, Father's bosom is my place.
4. Rock of Ages cleft for me! Precious veil is rent for me! Let me see the Father's face, Enjoy His full acceptance; Ever live in cloudless morn, Abide in the Holy Place.
5. Rock of Ages cleft for me! Your wounds are my hiding place, Rest and shelter of my heart, Shield me from tempest and charge. No more shadows and dark clouds, I rejoice in Your embrace.
6. Rock of Ages cleft for me! Let me hide e'er in Your heart; Fully taste fruit of the cross, Daily drink of Your great love; No more shadows, no more doubt, My heart is drawn after You.

SongPage.Title: 56 Behold, The Veil Is Rent!
SongPage.Context:
1. Behold, the veil is rent! The Father runs to me; He embraces and kisses me; In His bosom so sweet.
Chorus : Deeper than the sea, His love e'er will be! In His sea of grace I live, Drink from salvation fount.
2. The lost son has returned, The Father lays a feast. Dancing, rejoicing, He's merry. In His delight I live.
3. The lost son has returned. There's no more wandering; The Father's love captures my heart. I mind only His things.
4. The Cross removed hindrance, Opened the gate of grace; The Father's love from heaven pours, Fills up my thirsty heart.
5. The Cross removed hindrance; His wondrous grace I taste; Living water from heaven flows, Becomes a spring in me.
6. Behold, the veil is rent! I see the Father's face; Talking with Him so glad and free, How warm and sweet to me.
7. Behold, the veil is rent! I see His boundless love; The Holiest 's my dwelling place. I stay before His face.
8. Behold, the veil is rent! Christ's at the Father's right; I see His glory, face unveiled, Am changed to like Him be.
9. Behold, the veil is rent! In heaven sit with Him, I share the Father's face of love, Enjoy cloudless mornings.

SongPage.Title: 60 "It Is Finished" And "Sit At My Right"
SongPage.Context:
"Sit at My right!" - the Father's glad response to "It is finished!" He has given the Lord all authority, Highly exalt'd Him, And given Him the name which is above all names. O how precious, forever I'm joined to the Lord!
2. "It is finished!" - the Lord's great proclamation! Full victory! His victory now becomes my victory. By Him I am rich. The Lord is pleased to share with me all His glory, I'll sit with Him on His throne till eternity.

SongPage.Title: 62 Christ Arose From The Dead
SongPage.Context:
1. Christ arose from the dead! The stone was rolled away; O what a joyous, glorious news, The angels did proclaim, "He is not here, He is not here, For He is risen, For He is risen, as He said.?
2. Christ arose from the dead! And death was swallowed up! Satan who had the pow'r of death Forever was destroyed. Christ holds the key of death, Set free those who fear death; O Death, where is your sting? O Hades, where 's your victory?
3. Christ arose from the dead! And death was swallowed up! He brought life and immortality To light so gloriously. He fills my life with hope, With meaning and bounty. It is so sweet - the risen Lord Is now living with me!

SongPage.Title: 66 The Dawn
SongPage.Context: At dawn He's risen! Bright morn light shines, Drives off the world's dark night. The glorious Lord parts from the grave, Wipes all sorrows away. The world has hope hence forth! (Hurray!) And I can boast to the end! (Hurray!) The risen Lord has conquered death, 1. A glorious hope He gives. (Wonderful!) 2. Takes all my fears a - way. (Wonderful!) What a boastful hope He gives! (Hallelujah!)

SongPage.Title: 68 Risen! Ascended! Coming!
SongPage.Context:
1. He's risen! He's risen! Jesus has conquered death! My Lord is risen, He has conquered Satan. My Lord Jesus has saved me; My Saviour has set me free.
Chorus: So let us sing! Hallelujah! Hallelujah! Hallelujah!
2.He's ascended on high! He's ascended to heav'n! He's given glory, That is above all things. He's living up there for me; He's holding authority.
3. He's ascended on high! He's ascended to heav'n! He's thinking of me; He is praying for me. Preparing a home for me, How He longs to receive me!
4. He's coming! He's coming! He promised to come soon. To meet me in the clouds, Ever to be with Him. He has kept rewards for me, And prepared a wedding feast!
5. Dear Lord of my heart! May You come soon, come soon! Then I'll stay by Your side, O how happy and sweet! In the City stroll with You, By the River walk with You.

SongPage.Title: 72 The Risen Lord
SongPage.Context:
1. It's so precious! I have the risen Lord. Throughout my life, daily He walks with me. He had passed through the darkest night! He'd overcome Satan and death! He holds my hand and walks with me through life, Leads me through storms and fires - And I shout, "Vict'ry!"
2. The risen Lord is my fountain of joy. This joy no one can snatch away from me. He fills my heart with faith and hope. I joy in Him, while onward go. He holds my hand and walks with me through life, Leads me towards the peak - And I shout, "Vict'ry!"
3. I'd tasted death, but now I am living. I'd conquered death, and I'll live forever. I've the keys of Hades and Death. My hand hold all authority. Fear not, My love, I am with you always, To the end of the age. Oh, let us rejoice!

SongPage.Title: 76 Fix My Eyes Above
SongPage.Context:
1. My Beloved longs that I behold Him now in glory. He who lives, once was dead, is alive forevermore. He's ascend'd to the Father's right hand, Given glory and authority. May my eyes fix on Him, let His glory transform me.
2. He longs that I see Him seated at the Father's right. How glorious! He appears before the Father for me. The Father loves me as He loves Him. He is pleased with me; I am His dear. May my eyes fix above - Changes not the Father's love!

SongPage.Title: 78 One Spirit With The Lord
SongPage.Context:
1. Love, boundless love! To the Lord ever I'm joined! One in spirit, ever closest to Him. Entered into the untold riches of Christ. Exalt Him high; He is my all, my life.
2. The glorious Lord in my heart ever abides. 'Living union', I am His. He is mine. Never alone, live in sweetness He and I. As close as one, split not we for a while!
3. Deeper union than the branches with the vine. Deepest union, beyond head-body tie. One in spirit, no hindrance as we draw nigh. He 'nd I as one, what precious bliss of mine!
4. He's now in me to be my glorious life. Day 'nd night supplies my every need inside. He is my drive, nourishes, transforms and guides. Through me His light, glory and love to shine.

SongPage.Title: 80 The Son Of Man United With Me
SongPage.Context:
You came as Son of Man, triumphed for me, Conquering ev'rything, all to inherit. You share the promise of the Spirit with me. One spirit I'm with You, my life You have been.
2. You became Son of Man, to give me warmth. As flashes came Your love, from high You brought forth. How gloriously You lived, God's heart to men unsealed, Taught me to live by You, reveal Your glory.
3. Son of God, Son of Man, fore'er You'll be! You're my elder Brother; You are my Beloved. One in spirit with You, a living union, I am drawn after You by Your love so deep.
4. Now I'm never alone, ev'r knit to You. When I think of myself, rightly think of You. To fight battles with You, earth's journey walk with You, Face everything with You, my heart rests in You.
5. At times it's so lonely, cheerless it seems, Yet You dwell in my heart, give a melody. As in heaven I feel, enjoy Your love and warmth. My heart's can leap and shine; flames of love grow strong.
6. Though now I live on earth, my heart 's on high. Always I think of You living in glory. Each other we possess, closer than all on earth. Falling in love with You - my greatest treasure.

SongPage.Title: 84 Union With The Lord
SongPage.Context:
1. O Father on Your right there's the Son of Man! He's my Brother, my Beloved, my best Friend. I even can become fellow-heir with Christ! Who can comprehend my riches and joy?
2. Union with Him is my greatest blessing; Freed from the sphere and yoke of slavery! Before God, I am a new creature in Christ, In His glory and light ever abide.
3. Union with Him is my greatest blessing; I now belong to my Beloved alone. All thru' this life, I enjoy His company; In love live with Him through eternity.

SongPage.Title: 86 Glorious
SongPage.Context:
1. How glorious, how glorious - The hour I first believed. I have been joined to the Lord, In one spirit.
Chorus: The precious Lord lives in me. Co-heir with Him of all things, I partake His glory, Father's love and the Spirit.
2. Wonderful! wonderful! Now I am in Christ. It's no longer I who live, But a new man.
3. Love that's true, love that's true, What a love it is! I want You to be my Lord, Live in love with You eternally.

SongPage.Title: 88 A New Creature
SongPage.Context:
1. If anyone is in Christ, He is a new creation. Old things have passed away; All things have become new.
2. I am no longer the thorn, But lily of the valley. I belong to my Beloved; His desire is toward me.

SongPage.Title: 90 Jesus Christ In My Heart
SongPage.Context:
1. Now that I have been crucified with Christ, It is no longer I who live, But it's Jesus Christ who lives in me, Jesus Christ who lives in me. The life which I now live in the flesh, I live by faith in the Son of God, Who loved me and gave Himself for me, Loved me and gave Himself for me.
2. How great is the riches of the glory of the Mystery of "Christ in me". My Lord Jesus Christ is mighty in me. He's greater than all in the world. Christ dwells in my heart through faith, I am rooted and grounded in love. I abide in Him and thus bear much fruit. Living water flows from my heart.

SongPage.Title: 94 Now Is Even Better
SongPage.Context:
1. Though I had not followed Jesus in Galilee, Yet now His presence is closer to me. It's for my good that He goes to the Father, For when He goes, the Helper's sent to me. Forever more, the Spirit will dwell in my heart. In storms or waves, His company is with me. He is my gain, my portion, my fountain of strength! With love for love I'll yield myself to Him.
2. Though I had not leaned on the bosom of my Lord, Yet in my heart forever He will stay. I do believe He loves me with the highest love. He loves me just as the Father loves Him! Oh such great love is the foundation of my faith; Oh such great love is the drive all thru' my life; Oh such great love draws me away from worldly cares; Oh such great love binds my heart to His as one!
3. Though I had not offered perfume for His death, Yet my spirit and body are all His. Now I am a holy and living sacrifice, I'll pour myself at the feet of my Lord. Devoted to His glorious plan I'll strive for Him. His way I'll go forward with no returning With the best gift, I'll seek the favour of my Love. I'll watch and wait to see my Beloved in the clouds!
4. Though I had not followed Jesus in Galilee, Yet now I have a glorious, boastful hope. Soon comes the Day, that I'll meet the Lord in the clouds, And thus I shall be with Him forever. He'll share with me His everlasting glory. He'll sit with me on His throne of sovereignty. He'll walk with me in the Holy City of Life He'll live with me in love through all eternity.

SongPage.Title: 98 In Glory The Son Of Man
SongPage.Context: In glory the Son of Man Always thinks of me. For me, He was born, and Died, and rose to heaven. One day He'll come back, To take me to be with Him ever. He loves me and longs for me. His love, His pow'r is mine. I'll lean on His bosom, Take Him to be my all.

SongPage.Title: 100 On Mountains Of Bether
SongPage.Context:
1. Lo, the winter is past; the rain is gone Trials ended, flowers bloom on the earth. The time of the singing of birds has come. The turtledove's voice has been heard! The fig tree has ripened its figs; Vines in blossom give forth fragrance. O My darling, beautiful one, Arise! arise! and come along, And come along!
2. On Mountains of Bether I wait for You Sojourn on earth, I long for Your return. I lay aside all things to see Your face. Apart from You, I've no desire. Steadfast I'll be, love You only. Wait for You on Mountain "Cloven"*. Lord, I am Yours, and You are mine. O Lord Jesus, I long for You! I long for You! I long for You! (*Bether means cleaving or separation.)

SongPage.Title: 102 I Know For Sure
SongPage.Context: I know for sure where I will go one day - A place where carols ring, where no sorrows remain, A city of glitt'ring gold, walls of lovable jasper. I know for sure where I will go one day - A home of scenic land, where love fills every place, With my Lord ever to dwell, His countless riches to taste. This is the home that You prepare for me - A hea'enly home above I'll see. Now and fore'er, my heart is glad and sure. Joined to Your heart, we shall never part!

SongPage.Title: 104 The Glorious Hope
SongPage.Context:
1. My Lord Jesus was resurrected, He has overcome Satan. Seated at the right of the Father, He is the victorious King! He is the Lord of lords, He is the King of kings, The ever-living God! (Hallelujah!) He's enthroned eternally, And reigns forevermore, He is the glorious King! (Hallelujah!)
2. Soon He'll come back, The church to receive, To His home in heaven so fair. In the City, New Jerusalem, Taste the wedding feast of the Lamb, What a joy that overflows! No tears and no sorrows, To enter sweet eternity! (Hallelujah!) Reign in the Millennium, Over the universe, Fore'er the Lord and we! (Hallelujah!)
3. Brothers, sisters, how happy we are, In heaven with God e'er to live! Partake His joy, His glory and bliss, Live with Him the eternal spring! It's so bright beyond compare, God's kingdom is righteous, Unshakeable, full of peace. (Hallelujah!) Let us join to sing and praise The ever-living God To Him be all glory! (Hallelujah!)

SongPage.Title: 108 In The Clouds
SongPage.Context:
1. In the clouds comes the time we meet Face to face our dear Lord we see. Parted many years, now at last we meet, Starts the sweet eternity.
2. Hold my hand to the heav'nly home, Then the Father gladly we see. Take a City walk, of the past we talk. What a sweet eternity!

SongPage.Title: 110 My Heavenly Home
SongPage.Context:
1. My heav'nly home, full of warmth and restful peace, Pearls as the gates, wall of jasper, street of gold, Precious stones laid, and the Lamb as lamp shining. There's no longer night; River of life flows forever. See His face, taste His love, My heart overflows with joy. With all the saints I'll gladly sing and reign together!
2. 'The First', 'the Last' - my Lord is ever-living. 'Alpha', 'Omega' - He will bring me to glory; The good Shepherd'll guide me to the River of Life. In rest eternal, we shall taste the sweet fruit of life. In the bright morning light, know His love in depth and height, Hear echoes of love ringing in the City of Life.
3. Come, O Lord! Come, O Lord! Take the church into the clouds. Dark is the night, May Your light shine forth upon all land.

SongPage.Title: 112 Come to Reign, Lord
SongPage.Context:
And I behold new heaven, new earth And I behold new heaven, new earth Ah...... Ah...... I behold new Jerusalem, Out of heav'n coming down. Things of sorrows have passed away, Have all passed away. No more death on earth thus shall be found, No more mourning on earth shall remain. Christ our Lord will forever reign, New heaven, new earth He brings! Ah... Jesus Christ, You're the City's glorious light; You are the King of kings.
2. O King of kings, O King of kings, You are worthy to reign. For great is Your salvation pow'r! Your loving-kindness is vast. E'en a sinner You change to a prince; In the desert, You make rivers. What a glory - Love of the cross Set all the captives free! Ah... Jesus Christ, Heaven and earth moved by Your grace, Give forth their songs of praise.
3. O our dear King, O our dear Lord, You are the King of peace. As the mountain is Your justice, Your love is like the deep sea. All the nations will be blessed by You. All peoples will yield their hearts to You. To us You are ever-loving. In wonder angels sing! Ah... Jesus Christ, * May You come soon, May You come soon, We long to see You reign. * (Repeat)

SongPage.Title: 116 The Will Of The Father And The Son
SongPage.Context:
Lord, Your body is given for me. The veil is rent, was torn in two. Now there is no more hindrance of sin. With my face unveiled I see Your glory. Hallelujah! How You long that I am Yours! You desire to draw near to me, And I treasure to draw near to You. "Close to Him!" How precious 'tis to me! My good part and my eternal bliss. When I rise up early ev'ry day. I long to draw near to Him.
2. Father, how broad and loving is Your heart! You gave Your Son to ransom me, That I may fore'er know and follow You. And you bring me into Your household, too. Hallelujah! The Father's house has appeared! 'Tis my family, and your family. Let's together love and care for it. Father, help us to love even more, To accomplish Your beautiful will, Ever to be rooted in this house. Heart to heart we journey home.

SongPage.Title: 120 In God's Household
SongPage.Context: In God's household lived many saints. How excellent they are! United in love and honesty, Never split. (never split) For the love of Christ has melted me, That I know what love should be, Lost in brothers' and sisters' Loving streams. (loving streams) Let's join hands to walk the journey, Building up ourselves in love; Stand up in unity, satisfy Him.

SongPage.Title: 122 The Love Of Creation
SongPage.Context:
This is my Father's world. See the wonder of His works! All show His love and tender care, Give grace and joy to man. He made birds of fine tunes, "Alarm-cocks" that crow at dawn; He made insects play the symphony, He clothes the night with peace.
2. He made the sun that shines, The moon that glows at night; He made clouds to shower and cleanse, And as sun-shade so nice. He made mountains and seas, For my delight in the scenes, Lovely and thoughtful are His designs, Showing His love tender and real.
3. He made the galaxies, To widen my eyesight, My Father's greatness I may perceive, That draws my heart to worship. Your love is high and deep, Thoughts of love as sand at sea. I praise Your love; I admire Your grace; Echoes of love I give.

SongPage.Title: 126 The Father's Name
SongPage.Context:
The Lord's Father - my Father, The Lord's God - my God as well; Now I am my Father's dear child. His bosom - my resting place. Manifold afflictions I've passed, But His plan must be the best. He has planned all my life's journey - "Through suff'rings enter glory".
2. Father, my time 's in Your hand. Everything 's good in its time. I don't fear the long dark valley. Dawn of hope will come at last. Your thoughts plentiful and precious. Rainbow 's bright when rain is past. Your way is higher than man's way, Your love is higher than sky.
3. I am well loved as Your Son, Father, I'm in Your best care. You knows well all my afflictions, You have numbered all my hair. Oft' You uphold me on my right, Not be shaken will my feet; My heart 's glad and free of worries, Finishes the course in peace.
4. On earth, Father, You're with me; Before You I boast and leap. With a heart sincere and set free, Talk closely with You, how sweet. Comes the day the Lord receives me, See Your face my joy is full. Fellow-heir with Christ in heaven, Sharing all eternally.

SongPage.Title: 130 My Father Who Loves Me Ever
SongPage.Context:
1. My Father who loves me ever, Holds me with His loving hand; With His highest love that knows no end, Paves my journey of glory. In afflictions, through dark valley, My heart can rejoice in You; "Through suff'ring to glory" - t'is my way, Too beautiful is my gain.
2. My Father who loves me ever, You have listened to my pray'rs; All Your promises will never fail, And Your time must be the best. Mid the trials You open a way, Perfect me thro' sufferings; What You've planned for Your beloved ones Must surpass what I can think.

SongPage.Title: 132 Love Of The Father
SongPage.Context:
1. In my Father's bosom I'm loved, I am His delightful hymn. All my hair with care is numbered, He treasures me more than birds. Precious thoughts He does bear for me More than the sands of the sea. My sitting down or rising up, Ever in His loving sight.
2. From young to old, He fosters me. All my life is in His hand. Fellow-heir with Christ now I am, Enjoy His abundant plan. Though on earth there are vales of tears, He's the God of all comfort. He holds my hand through the journey, Till in heaven I see Him.

SongPage.Title: 134 My Father's World Is This
SongPage.Context:
1. My Father's world is this! I can be free of worries. Dancing, singing as a bird of cheer, praising His watching over me. My Father's world is this, I can sing Ha! Ha! Ha! Ha! My name has been set upon His heart, I am the apple of His eye.
2. My Lord has conquered Satan, He has overcome the world. He is risen, taken to heaven, As head over all things for me. Ha! Ha! Ha! Ha! Ha! Ha! He has won the victory! Ha! Ha! Ha! Ha! Ha! Ha! Ha! Ha! My Brother holds authority!

SongPage.Title: 136 Jesus Is My Portion
SongPage.Context:
1. Jesus gives me living water, He's my dew and my joy. He is the bread of life that fills my hunger; Jesus is my rock, my fortress, my refuge and my shield. He is my inner strength, my ready Helper. He's my life, transforms me from glory to glory. He's my glorious boastful hope of this last age.
Chorus: Jesus is the Bright Morning Star, the henna in the yard; I am His, He is mine, I love Him ever.
2. Jesus is my Mediator, who pleads and intercedes. He's my High Priest who can sympathize and bless; Jesus is my King who subdues my heart's adversaries. He is the King of kings. His foes will perish. All will be put under Him; All knees'll bow to Him. The universe will be filled with His vict'ry.

SongPage.Title: 138 The Lord Is Fair And Good
SongPage.Context:
1. He's so fair! He's so good! My abundant love feast! He's so fair! He's so good! More than tongue or pen can tell. Close to Him, close to Him; I foretaste heavenly joy. Close to Him, close to Him; Is my portion on earth.
2. He's so fair! He's so good! My Friend faithful and true; He's so fair! He's so good! My Beloved, sweet and dear. He's with me, He's with me, Nothing on earth shall I fear! He's with me, He's with me, My heart's gladdened and cheered.
3. He's so fair! He's so good! Spurs me on all my life. He's so fair! He's so good! Gives me joy and comfort. For the Lord, for the Lord, I will bravely go forth. For the Lord, for the Lord, I will strive through my course.

SongPage.Title: 142 Christ Is The Centre Of My Life
SongPage.Context:
1. No longer I, but Jesus Christ, Becomes the centre of my life; Ever I'm His, forever He is mine. Christ is the Lover of my heart.
2. Not on myself, look upon Christ, He's my heart's vision of glory. The Lord draws me fore'er to follow Him. I belong to Him, O how sweet!

SongPage.Title: 144 Return To The Fountain
SongPage.Context: In You I've confidence. No more in haste I run. My perfect Providence, Your grace is sufficient. You are waiting to bless. In You dwells all the fullness. Gladly shall I return To Your bosom and rest. Drink from the salvation fount, Enjoy Your bountiful blessings. And lift my head above the foes, Rejoice beneath Your wings.

SongPage.Title: 146 Such Love As Yours
SongPage.Context:
1. Such love as Yours, makes me know the true worth in me; Such love as Yours, makes me see the beauty of all things. Life is full of meaning, worth well to live. Then I understand why there's eternity, And I know why, Your desire is to abide in me.
2. Such love as Yours, gives me rest in days dim or bright; Such love as Yours, makes me live in tender morning light, Gives me hope to run my course with delight. Thorns and swords I conquer overwhelmingly. Lord, in Your love, there is never fear but sweetness only.
3. Such love as Yours, teaches me what beauty really means; Such love as Yours, teaches me to praise and to give thanks. Turns me into a poet, a morning bird; Melts me into a river, vast and flood'd with love, Ever flowing, toward the earth's end, till eternity.
4. Such love as Yours, abounds in deeds, warmth and thoughts so deep; Such love as Yours, keeps my spirit alive, ever-fresh, Cheering me to climb up the highest peak, Blowing me to sail towards the boundless sea, Ever love You, follow You to the corners of the world.
5. Such love as Yours, makes me long for the heavenly home; Such love as Yours, makes me long to see Your glorious face; O Lord Jesus, may You come, may You come! In the Holy City of light and love we live, Sharing with You, endless songs and mornings eternally.

SongPage.Title: 150 The Song Of Solomon
SongPage.Context:
1. My darling, my dove, I long for you; Let Me hear your voice, see your face, For your voice is sweet, and your face is lovely. Let's meet in the clefts of the rock. My darling, my dove, I'll share with you your joy and tears. Walk with you heavenward, E'er be your company, Until we meet in eternity.
2. My Saviour, my Beloved, I long to draw near! For Your love to me is high and deep! Down from heaven You came, paid the ransom for me. Such great love forever constrains me! My Saviour, my Beloved, I am wholly drawn after You. None in heaven I love, none on earth I desire, None else I will seek besides You.

SongPage.Title: 152 His Desire Is For Me
SongPage.Context:
1. Lord, Your ever precious purpose Is for me to dwell in You. Lord, You suffered and gave Your life; That we may meet face to face. Through disciplines, trials, enemies, You urge me to come to You. With bands of love, cords of kindness, You have bound me close to You.
2. You give me the Holy Spirit That I'm ever joined to You. In close friendship we're heart to heart, Forever in company. You do love me; I do love You; Nothing can make us apart, One day You'll come to take me up, To share Your endless glory.

SongPage.Title: 154 Echoes Of Love
SongPage.Context:
1. My darling among the maidens Is like a lily among the thorns. My darling, beautiful one, May you arise and come along. Let me hear your voice, Let me see your face. For your voice is sweet, your voice is sweet, And lovely is your face. My sister, My bride, A glance of your eyes steals My heart. My sister, My bride, A strand of your necklace steals My heart. My darling is charming as Tirzah, Lovely as Jerusalem, Awesome as an army with banners. You are all together lovely!
2. My Beloved among the young men, 's like an apple tree in the forest. His banner over me is love, His love has captured my heart. My Beloved is dazzling and ruddy, Outstanding among ten thousand. I am my beloved's, My beloved is mine, And His desire is for me. Set me as a seal, Set me as a seal upon Your heart. Set me as a seal, Set me as a seal upon Your arm. Until the cool of the day When the shadows flee away, Make haste, my Beloved, be like a gazelle, On the mountains of Spices.

SongPage.Title: 158 The Lord's Personal Love To Me
SongPage.Context:
1. The Lord's personal love to me, Is pure, undying to the end. Waters, great waters cannot quench it; Time, even years, can't make it fade. Withstanding various trials and tests, It never fails my heart to gain. The Lord's personal love to me, Encourages me all my life. When I'm despaired, His love comforts me, Great and steadfast above all things. Rich and abundant, tender and soft, I will boast of forevermore.
2. The Lord's personal love to me, Is sweet and warm and full of hope, Shares in my life all sorrows and joy, Gives me courage and gives me faith, Fills my heart like a living spring, His bosom may I ever stay! The Lord's personal love to me, Makes the angels admire, amaze. Deeper than the sea, high'r than the sky, His love paves all my paths of life. Grace upon grace, 'tis uncountable, Beyond compare, no else to find.

SongPage.Title: 160 Full Acceptance, Love Forever
SongPage.Context:
1. Full acceptance, love forever! Ocean of love, O how vast! Deeply I taste, fully I drink God's great love with no ending!
2. Full acceptance, love forever! All my doubts and fears are gone. In Your love there's sweetness only. With You I can smile and leap.
3. Full acceptance, love forever! I can rejoice all my life. South wind, north wind, spring or winter, We embrace, love each other.
4. Full acceptance, love forever! How beautiful is Your heart! Who can sep'rate me from Your love? We're united, heart to heart!
5. Full acceptance, love forever! My heart is drawn after You. Nothing can be compared to You, Can I not desire You?
6. Full acceptance, love forever! My soul is healed and compelled. I lift my head, my heart's set free! With You gladly onward go.
7. Full acceptance, love forever! Your yoke is easy and light. You walk with me, hold my hand tight. We leap over depths and heights.

SongPage.Title: 164 24 Hours' Presence
SongPage.Context:
1. Twenty-four hours' presence with me! What a sweet and precious blessing! Who is so close to me but You? You're my present help in time of need.
Chorus: Presence day and night, how warm and sweet! With You by my side I'm not alone. Presence day and night, joined heart to heart! Living with You, I taste heav'nly bliss.
2. Twenty-four hours' presence with me! You are my support and comfort. With You, I'll not fear nor worry. You are always glad to stay with me.
3. Twenty-four hours' presence with me! I count on You, pour out my heart. You are my Beloved and best Friend, Carry me ahead, and hold my hand.
4. Twenty-four hours' presence with me! Lord, Your love has gone through all tests! Your friendship is warm and precious. All the universe 's beyond compare.
5. Twenty-four hours' presence with me! You have filled my life with Your grace; Having lived with You for these years, Can I live in heaven without You?

SongPage.Title: 168 In The River Of Love
SongPage.Context:
1. O God, Thy name how sweet and how fragrant! In Thy bosom, how peaceful and pleasant! In love with Thee, at night I still can sing. In love with Thee, I fear not long dark night.
2. With Thy presence, alone yet not lonely. With Thy presence, I own heavenly bliss. Walking with Thee, the dark vale seems so bright. Nearness to Thee, my heart's and Thine delight.
3. Thou in my life, what warmth and goodness give! Thou in my life, make me fervently live. Eternally, with Thee there's endless spring. Eternally, with Thee there's love so sweet.

SongPage.Title: 170 The Lord Who Cares
SongPage.Context:
1. My past journey You've cared continually. My course ahead, Lord, You will surely lead. In storms or waves, You are the First, the Last. Oh my Beloved, You'll uphold all my paths.
2. My God Your name is "I am who I am", The First, the Last, with all love and fullness. You can supply my needs and my desires. Now and ever, in You I'm satisfied.

SongPage.Title: 172 The Deep Affection
SongPage.Context: My Elder Brother, My dear Friend is the Lord, Our friendship endures, our affection grows deep; He paved my past journey with His grace and His love, For my days ahead, I walked by my Beloved. Though my future is yet to be known, The Lord has promised to be with me always; He has promised to be my Shepherd, To guide me each step, until I see His face. The path of the just is as the shining light, That shines more and more till the perfect day.

SongPage.Title: 174 All The Way He's With Me
SongPage.Context:
1. All the journey when I retrace, thankful tears oft fill my eyes; Once was lonely, vile and worthless, now I shine forth as the light. Ne' er forget the Lord's appearing, and His love as honey sweet, Drawing me from worldly follies, all my heart belongs to Him. Drawing me from worldly follies, all my heart belongs to Him.
2. All my life in trials abounding, suffer wounds so long and deep. Yet His love spurs and comforts me; by His words my wounds are healed. With His presence I am sustained, my soul wings to higher place! Strength upon strength as I walk on, smile across all storms and waves! Strength upon strength as I walk on, smile across all storms and waves!
3. O dear Lord, can I not love You? May my life be love response! Pour out all my heart before You, share my daily life with You. Think of You, call upon Your name, closely follow all the way. Talk and smile to You every hour, deeper friendship grows each day. Talk and smile to You every hour, deeper friendship grows each day.

SongPage.Title: 176 The Lord and I In Love Forever
SongPage.Context:
1. My darling, My bride, My dove, You are altogether beautiful. Your form is lovely and your voice is sweet. My darling, there's no blemish in you. You have ravished My heart with a glance of your eyes, And your eyes have overcome Me. You are like a lily growing mid the thorns. O the fairest one among all, You are the dearest of My heart.
2. My Beloved and my precious Lord, Your love moves my heart so deeply. It's unique, greater than the sky and the sea. All things cannot be compared to it. May You set me as a seal on Your heart Set me as a seal on Your arm. My Beloved, may You return and take me up To the home above You've prepared. Ever to dwell in love with You. |My Beloved, may You come soon!

SongPage.Title: 180 Come Along With Me, Darling
SongPage.Context:
1. O My darling, you are so beautiful! There is no blemish in you! May you come along with Me, My bride, Come with Me from Lebanon. May you come with Me from Lebanon; From the dens of lions, and mountains of leopards; Journey down from the peak. My sister, My bride, you've made My heart beat fast With a glance of your eyes; A strand of your necklace steals My heart.
2. O My darling, My sister, My bride, How beautiful is your love! How much better is your love than wine; And the fragrance of your oils Is better than all kinds of spices. My sister, My bride, you are a garden locked, A rock garden locked, a spring sealed up. You are a garden spring, a well of fresh water, And streams flowing from Lebanon.
3. Awake, north wind, and come, wind of the south, Blow into my garden! Make my garden breathe out fragrance; May my Beloved come and eat All kinds of choice fruits in His garden.

SongPage.Title: 184 Growing Young Along With Me
SongPage.Context:
Grow old along with me, The best is yet to be! The last of life, For which the first was made. Our times are in His hand Who saith, "A whole I planned"; Youth shows but half; trust God; see all, nor be afraid! Grow old along with me, The best is yet to be! The last of life, for which the first was made. Our times are in His hand Who saith, "A whole I planned"; Youth shows but half; trust God; See all, nor be afraid! Youth shows but half; trust God; see all, nor be afraid! Your favour is for life; Lord, I want to see it all! The light that shines more and more Unto the perfect day. Unto the perfect day.
In MTR from Central to Kwai Fong

SongPage.Title: 188 United To The Lord
SongPage.Context:
1. All that I encounter throughout my life Are united to You and Your will; You and I belong to each other, Facing everything together. For Your will though I suffer hardship, Persecutions, slanders and sneers, Yet my heart can rejoice in all these, For Your grace abounds through my journey. Your presence, the warmth in God's family Moves me deeply and gives me joy and rest; Your fervent love compels my heart, Floods and flames to pass I'm steadfast!
2. We' ve fought many fierce battles, yet I find Your wondrous salvation every time; By You, I lift my head and boast, By faith press on toward the goal! Lord, You do appreciate my love for You, On this suff'ring yet glorious journey; Then one day, You'll come to receive me Into Your endless joy and glory! Your presence, the warmth in God's family Moves me deeply and gives me joy and rest; Your fervent love compels my heart, Put on the armour, I march on!
3. May all that I decide throughout my life, Be united to You and Your will; You and I deeply love each other, Walking this life journey together.

SongPage.Title: 192 I Can Face All With Jesus
SongPage.Context: I can face the world with Jesus. I can face today and tomorrow With the risen Lord. Through the storms, thro' life's billows, Thro' the night, long, dark valley, Across the sea, o'er the mountains, He leads me to the glory. He'll walk with me thro' all life's journey Till I see His face.

SongPage.Title: 194 Song Of The Red Sea
SongPage.Context:
1. Lord, when the church has come up to the Red Sea, Way blocked ahead, the foes are getting near. Deep in my heart, I still have the surpassing peace, Knowing Your wonderful salvation 's near! Lord, I give thanks for You are watching from above, Ever holding authority for the church. I can rejoice, seeing You perform miracles! The evidence of Your love to us You show.
2. Lord, I treasure the years of copious journey, Walking with You through floods, flames and valleys. Your words of grace have nourished, enlivened my soul, Make my faith strong and boastful to the end. Your loving hand leads me to go through each distress. My tears and laughters in Your sight are precious. Lord, I give thanks for Your favour and tenderness, Your presence with me is my sweetest sweetness.
3. When I think of the task ahead yet to be done, Lord, You know well the path I have to tread. Thousands of souls, hopeless and lost, are waiting, May Your great love make me firmly go forth. Lord, hold my hand tight as I run my course ahead, In lands of joy, o'er mountains and swift rivers. Bright days or dark, our hearts are drawn closely as one, Rejoice till the day I see You face to face.
4. Lord, I am Yours, and You desire and long for me. O my Beloved, let's go out to the field. Early let's rise, go out to the vineyard and see If the vine's budd'd, its blossoms are open. There I will give, there I will give my love to You. See, at our gates are pleasant fruits, new and old. O my Beloved, I have laid up all these for You. Lord, may Your heart be satisfied in this household.
(Refrain) O Lord, do come, take me to be with You always. Hand in hand we shall sing and dance forevermore.

SongPage.Title: 198 Walk With The Lord The Path Of Suffering And Glory
SongPage.Context:
1. My Lord came down to earth for me, Was in a manger born, Unique, yet He was rejected, Repelled and misunderstood. Lonely He walked on, Fully followed God. No place even to lay His head, He's opposed, defamed and scorned.
2. What a brilliant light my Lord shone In His short earthly span. The Father's glory to man showed, He is fairer than all men. Acquainted with grief, Tempted in all things. He can comfort and understand. He wipes away all my tears.
3. Oh how precious my Lord chose me For this task of glory! His gift and calling not revoked, He will keep me to the end. Thru' the dark valley, My heart shall not fear. His faithfulness reaches to the skies. And He keeps truth forever.
4. He has opened His heart to me - He has revealed His will. Though the foes gather to storm me, My warm dwelling place is He. I have a sure goal; For life I'll press on. Faithful to the heav'nly vision, Follow gladly, no retreat!
5. What a joy to know my Lord's will, And to stay close to Him. The way may be full of hardship, Yet I live abundantly! Is there the 'Red Sea', mud land or high hills? He is the First, He is the Last; He will accomplish His will.
6. Deepest pain He suffered for me, Can I be with no wounds? Follow to the end steadfastly, Look down on all trials and sneers. Suff'rings brief and light, Gladly bear for Him. Let these make up sweet memories, And eternal glory.
7. South wind, north wind; spring or winter; I'll live with my Lord still. World's bitterness, joy in God's house - All are love designs of His. Sufferings will pass, Glory yet will last! He makes all things work together, Moulds me into His likeness.

SongPage.Title: 204 The Jewel In His Heart
SongPage.Context: My Lord sought me, My Lord bought me To be His beloved, I'm on His heart, I'm on His arm, So warm and protected. I'm a jewel in His heart, Ever to Him united, Shining before the Father, I am His delight.

SongPage.Title: 206 The Flaming Love
SongPage.Context:
1. Christ's fervent love does melt my heart, Make me amazed, adore! The thought of it thrills all my soul, Compels me to the end.
2. Such flaming love is my drive - I live my live for you! Rightly I am beside myself And strive to save the world.
3. A self-denying life- For the flaming love of Christ!

SongPage.Title: 1. LET'S CELEBRATE
SongPage.Context: Let us dance and celebrate. For we are God's dear children! And we are the lovers of the Lord! The jewels of Spirit! Ha! Ha! Ha! Ha! Ha! Ha! We're His royal family! Let's live out the love of our hearts, And build His church together. And reign one day with Him!

SongPage.Title: 2. THE DEEPEST AFFECTION!
SongPage.Context:
THE HIGHEST FATHER'S LOVE!
In this whole universe, There's no deeper affection, No higher father's love, Your bosom is my sweet rest. Father, daily You long to see my face, Love to hear my sweet voice calling to You; Daily You long to kiss me with kisses, Embrace me. Abba, Your matchless plan, Full of wisdom and love! As Your child, born of You, I'm carefree and drawn by You. You desire to bring me to great glory, Sit with You on the throne, to inherit all; You ev'n prepare a wedding feast for Your Son, O how sweet! Abba, my heart loves You; I long to know You more, Fully drink of Your love, Daily rejoice before you.

SongPage.Title: 4. WHO AFFECT THE FATHER THE MOST
6. YOU LOVE TO BE ON MY NECK
SongPage.Context:
1. Created in God's image, I was born of His Spirit; His seed abides in my heart. He's my Abba forever! ( I am His child, His delight! )
2. You love to be on my neck! Kissing me, You feel so sweet! You need me on Your bosom; Long to embrace forever.

SongPage.Title: 7. I HAVE CAPTURED MY FATHER'S HEART
SongPage.Context:
1. I've captured my Father's heart, Day and night He thinks of me; His thoughts of love toward me Outnumber the sands or stars.
2. I've captured my Father's heart, He'll gaze on me forever. His eternal love and care Draw me close to His bosom.
3. Abba, Father's heart is mine, He leaps for joy over me; His smile is so bright and warm, In His bosom I rejoice.

SongPage.Title: 8. ABBA, HOW PRECIOUS TO BE YOUR DARLING SON
SongPage.Context:
1. Abba Father, how precious To be Your darling son, You and Your all belong to me, And I'm Yours forever.
2. Abba Father, how precious To sit by Your right hand, Such acceptance and highest love Is my joy forever.
3. Abba Father, how precious To be Your darling child, Jointheir with Christ, inherit all; Fore'er live in Your love.

SongPage.Title: 9. THE LOVE IN THE BEGINNING
SongPage.Context: O the Life in the beginning, Is so boundless, glorious! O the love in the beginning, Colorful, like a rainbow! O Creator, You're self exist, An ever flowing fountain! From eternity, Your heart is sweet With a secret of love. You long that I, Your created one, May unite with You as one In love's deepest union. With Your infinite love, Wisdom and power, You create me for Yourself To be Your most compatible, dearest lover, To fully enjoy Your glorious life, Drink fully of Your passionate, Romantic, rainbow like love! Hallelujah! Hallelujah! Your fantastic dream of stunning love From eternity has now come true! O the upward journey Of this love life with You Is so charming, scenic, like a dream! O how sweet to walk with You in deep love! This carpet of love, paved with pink petals, And the river of love that You drink with me, Will have no end, increasing in glory, Bliss and sweetness forever!

SongPage.Title: 12. LOVE LIKE A RAINBOW
SongPage.Context: It's so precious! You are my beloved! You have fully committed Yourself; You confirm it with Your precious blood, It really deeply touches my heart. Your love is stronger than death, And forever the same. Now You and I are most deeply united. The love's covenant is forever sure. Your love is like a rainbow! Colorful, beautiful, So tender, so beautiful, So unique and personal; From morn to dusk, You're gazing on me, thinking of me! Longing for me, embracing me! Help me to have the bravest faith, And a dancing spirit, To echo Your matchless touching love, And set my love on You!

SongPage.Title: 14. MANIFOLD LOVE
SongPage.Context:
1. Manifold love abides in You, How beautiful! Your heart! Your affection so deep, so sure, Sealed with Your precious blood! Love's union, Love's commitment Will endure forever. One day with You, sit on the throne! Fore'er I'll sing and praise.
2. Now I live in river of love; The bliss I can't express! I long to go to all kingdoms, To praise Your matchless love. My spirit, soul and body Respond with love to You. To wait for You, steadfast I'll be, With faith march on with You.

SongPage.Title: 16. WHO AFFECT THE LORD MOST
SongPage.Context: I am amazed! I affect You so much! For me, You came from heaven to the earth; You love to be a Man forever, Gladly gave Yourself for me on the cross! You love is overwhelming! Melts and captures my heart. You want to have the deepest union with me, And live with me forever more. You are self sufficient, Infinite, ov'rflowing, Because of love You need me most! You long to see my face and hear my voice; You lead me to Your fair inner chambers, To enjoy love's interflow. May I live in freedom and joy As Your darling and friend! Daily lean on Your bosom of love, My heart ever close to You!

SongPage.Title: 18. THE FLAME OF JEHOVAH
SongPage.Context:
1. It's so precious! You are my Beloved! Your love is so passionate, romantic! Set me as a seal up on Your heart, As a seal up on Your arm, O Lord! For love is strong as death! For love is strong as death! Jealousy is cruel as Sheol, as cruel as Sheol, The flashes thereof are flashes of fire. A very flame of Jehovah! A very flame of Jehovah! Many waters can not quench love, Neither can floods drown it. If a man would give all the substance Of his house for love, it would utterly Be contemned, be contemned. Now You and I united forever! Your dream of love comes true. O let me drink fully of Your love; Enthralled in embrace and praise, And set my love on You!
2. It's so precious! You are my Beloved! Your love is my strength and drive, joy and rest. Set me as a seal upon Your heart, As a seal upon Your arm, O Lord! For love is strong as death! For love is strong as death! Jealousy is cruel as Sheol, as cruel as Sheol, The flashes thereof are flashes of fire. A very flame of Jehovah! A very flame of Jehovah! Many waters cannot quench love, Neither can floods drown it. If a man would give all the substance Of his house for love, it would utterly Be contemned, be contemned. Now You and I united forever! Your dream of love comes true. O let me drink fully of Your love; Enthralled in embrace and praise, And set my love on You!

SongPage.Title: 21. THE UNION OF LOVE
SongPage.Context: In this whole universe, There is no higher love, There's no deeper union, Now I'm joined to You as one! I am amazed at Your desire and love, From eternity, forever outflows. It is Your heart's deepest hidden secret, Thrilled am I! Lord, Your sweet dream of love Has gloriously fulfilled, I'm joined with You in love; Forev'r You dwell in my heart! Daily let me live close to You in love, Forev'r live in the bright beautiful spring! It's most precious I am Your dearest lover, O how sweet! Your desire is for me, And I love You dearly; I long to know You more; Daily live in Your rich love!

SongPage.Title: 23. THE DEEP AFFECTION FROM ETERNITY TO ETERNITY
SongPage.Context: From eternity Your desire is for me; I know Your heart's secret; You created and redeemed me To be Your beloved. With this love You came from heav'n to the death And love to be a Man. Your love burns like flame! Overcame cruel death, Despised the cross and shame, So that I can unite with You, Joined in spirit, heart close to heart. O! one day You'll come from heav'n to receive me To Your fairest home prepared with deep love. Today on heaven high, You live for me, Love to think of me, for me You leap for joy; Your love gaze is toward me. Your fairest heart and strong arms all are mine! You're my portion! What a joy to live in love With You forever.

SongPage.Title: 25. THE LORD'S SECRET HIS DESIRE IS TOWARD ME
28. I HAVE STOLEN MY LORD'S HEART
SongPage.Context:
1. I have stolen my Lord's heart, Day and night He thinks of me; His thoughts of love toward me Outnumber the sands or stars.
2. I have stolen my Lord's heart, He'll gaze on me forever; He sets His love forev'r on me, His love draws me close to Him.
3. I have stolen my Lord's heart, He shouts for joy over me, His smile is so bright and warm, His love captures my heart.

SongPage.Title: 29. WONDERFUL CHANGE
SongPage.Context:
1. Who is she who looks forth as the morning, Fair as the moon, clear as the sun, Awesome as an army with banners? Oh! He has changed me like that! Thank You, Lord!
2. You're a lily who dwell among the thorns. All beautiful! No flaw in you! You have stolen My heart, O My love. O, let Me see your fair face, hear your voice.

SongPage.Title: 30. MY LOVER IN THE GLORY
SongPage.Context: In the glory my Lover, My best Friend holds all authority! He's the beloved Son of God, My glorious Savior. For me, He came down to the earth As a man forever. He loved me so much that He gave Himself On the cruel cross for me, But He has risen from the dead And ascended to heaven! Wow! One day, from the glory, He will come back To take me to His most wonderful home. Now in heav'n, He lives for me; From morning to night He's thinking of me; I belong to Him; His desire is toward me! His fairest heart and strong arms all are mine! O I love Him! He's my treasure and portion Incomparable!

SongPage.Title: 32. THE LORD'S PERSONAL LOVE TO ME
SongPage.Context:
1. His personal love to me, (Your personal love to me,) Pure, undying to the end. Great floods can not quench it; Time, ev'n years, can't make it fade, Withstands various trials and tests; It never fails my heart to gain.
2. His personal love to me, Is my drive through all my life. When I'm despaired, His love comforts me; His love overcomes all things. Rich, colorful, tender and soft, I'll boast of His love forever.
3. His personal love to me, Sweet and warm and gives me hope, Shares in my life's sorrows and joy, Gives me courage and gives me faith, Fills my heart like a living spring, In His bosom may I ev'r stay!
4. His personal love to me, Makes the angels admire, amaze. Deeper than the sea, higher than the sky, His love paves my path of live. Grace upon grace I can't number, Beyond compare, no else to find.

SongPage.Title: 34. HIS PERSONAL LOVE TO ME IS MY SWEET PORTION
35. WHOLEHEARTED LOVE
SongPage.Context: It's so precious! I am Your perfect one; I'm Your treasure, Your dearest only one. You love me with Your whole heart and mind; You have set Your love on me forever! In Your admiring eyes, I'm fair, without a flaw. I have captured Your heart; You love to think of me, You leap for joy and sing ov'r me. I am Your living spring, A garden fountain. Gladden Your heart, give You great joy. O north wind, o south wind, blows on my heart, Spreads its fragrance of love to delight You. In love with You, like a sweet dream! May my whole life and eternity Live with You in deep love, Living out the "Love Song" with You, Enthralled in the joy of our love!

SongPage.Title: 37. THE LOVE OF MY BELOVED
SongPage.Context: His love to me, is so pure, so strong, So high, so deep, so beautiful, So romantic, so passionate, Such love so sweet, captured my heart. His thoughts of love, more than the sands, Brighter and more than the stars. I am His love, His joy, His treasure; His heart is mine forever.

SongPage.Title: 38. O LOVE THAT FOLLOWS ME ALL MY LIFE
SongPage.Context:
1. O love that follows me all my life, Sought me, when I from You wandered. Your love comforted and healed my heart, Makes me glad and dance in Your love, And draws my heart to You.
2. O love that follows me all my life. Draws me away from the vain world, Makes me rooted in Your wondrous love; Ever deeper into Your love. May my love rise to You!
3. O love that follows me all my life Surely will follow me to heaven; Brings me through all life billows and storms; Makes me stronger than conquerors. O my heart loves You, Lord!

SongPage.Title: 39. LIVING WITH THE KING OF LOVE IN HIS PALACE
SongPage.Context:
1. The King of love is my Shepherd, For all my life I shall not want. He makes my cup overflow with joy. The best is; He lives with me.
2. Thank You so much my dear Beloved, For Your love's gift and tender care. You make me glad, wonder in Your love. I shall be Yours forever.
3. O what a joy, You are my beloved, To live with You in You palace. From morn to dusk face to face with You, You're my treasure and portion.
4. You're my strength, my song, my Beloved. Your love and desire toward me, Flow from all past to eternity; I lost in wonder and love.

SongPage.Title: 40. ENTHRALLED IN HIS MATCHLESS LOVE
SongPage.Context: Enthralled in His matchless love, Like living in a love dream! His love fairer than flowers, Taste sweeter than honey, No dream can compare, Beyond the thoughts of man, wonder of wonders! But His love is true! His love is true! O His love fills the whole universe, Heav'n and the earth, And my heart which He desires.

SongPage.Title: 41. THE LONG MARCH OF LOVE ?THE ONETIME MARATHON
SongPage.Context: It's so precious, You and I joined in love! Forev'r, You have committed Yourself. Fully You share Your life with my life, What a joy to live with You through the day. You are my life, You change me From glory to glory; From year to year our love grows deep more and more. Live side by side, we fight and dance. This glorious marathon, full of sweet memories, I treasure this unique journey! Burning love drives me to march with You. Let me be true to You, strive to the end Toward the goal, for life, I race. How You treasure my love to You Through all battles and pain, I treasure that I can live for You On earth, give my love to You.

SongPage.Title: 43. MY EVERLIVING HIGH PRIEST
SongPage.Context:
1. My living High Priest is Jesus! He knows my frame but from the dust; None understands me as He does, I will never be disheartened. With joy, on my journey I'll go, I can bravely meet any foes, For He'll save to the utter most; I will never be disheartened.
2. When temptation sorely tries me, Temptation at all points, He knows me; Surely He'll give me victory; I will never be disheartened. Though trials sorely compass me about, Foes assail within and without; Closely He watches me above; I will never be disheartened.
3. Satan may accuse, I don't fear; He's my advocate, His blood speaks! Raising His pierced hand, He will plead! I will never be disheartened. Boldly unto God's throne I'll come; For me His body was broken! A new living way He'd opened; I will never be disheartened.
4. When I am weak, sad and needy, And no one seems to care for me, I know He is praying for me, I will never be disheartened. Woman may forget her baby, On His shoulder He will bear me, On His heart forever seal me, I will never be disheartened.
5. My living High Priest is Jesus! He knows my frame but from the dust; None understands me as He does, I will never be disheartened. With joy, on my journey I'll go, I can bravely meet any foes, For He'll save to the uttermost, I will never be disheartened.

SongPage.Title: 46. THE SHEPHERD OF MY LIFE
SongPage.Context:
1. The King of love is my Shepherd, For all my life I shall not want. He makes me lie down in green pastures, Leads me beside the waters.
2. He restores my soul; He lifts up my head. For His name sake, He leads me To walk in the paths of righteousness Till I see His glorious face.
3. Though I walk through the dreadful valley, I will not fear, for You're with me. Your rod, Your staff, they comfort me. You're my keeper and my Guide.
4. You prepare a table before me In the presence of my enemies; You anoint my head with oil. My cup runs over with joy.
5. Surely goodness and mercy Shall follow me all my life, And I'll dwell in Your wonderful house Forever and forever. (Ps 23)

SongPage.Title: 48. THE LORD IS MY SHEPHERD
SongPage.Context:
1. The Lord is my Shepherd, I shall not want. He makes me lie down in green pastures; He leads me, He leads me beside the still waters. He restores my soul; He restores my soul; He leads me in the paths of righteousness, He leads me in the paths of righteousness For His name's sake.
2. Yea, though I walk through the valley, Of the shadow of death, I will fear no evil, For You're with me, Your rod and Your staff, They comfort me. You're prepare a table before me In the presence of my enemies; You anoint my head with oil; My cup runs over.
3. Surely goodness and mercy shall follow me All the days my life; And I'll dwell in house of the Lord Forever, forever. (Ps 23)

SongPage.Title: 50. MY DOVE, MY DOVE, MY PERFECT ONE
SongPage.Context:
1. O My dove, My love, My perfect one, You shine forth as the dawn, disperse darkness, Beautiful as the moon, clear as the sun, Awesome as an army with banners!
2. O My dove, My love, My perfect one, Is like a lily blooms among the thorns, You are all fair, My love, without a flaw! You look of faith and love, ravished my heart.
3. O My dove, My love, My perfect one, Your love for Me is better than wine! You're garden fountain, a living spring And a flowing stream from Lebanon.
4. I am my Beloved's, He desires me! His heart and arms are mine, in Him I rest. Enthralled in His chambers and His rich feast, And His banner flying ov'r me was love.

SongPage.Title: 52. ETERNAL COMMITMENT
SongPage.Context:
1. Dearest Lord, my Beloved, You have left heav'n's glories; For me You came from heav'n to the earth; For love, You longed to be a Man; Fully committed Yourself! Your love warms and heals my heart.
2. God's beloved Son, O my Beloved, You came down from heav'n high; O Godhood united with manhood! Born in manger; died on the cross! Love that dared death gains my heart! How sweet to live in Your love.
3. Dearest Lord, my Beloved, Your love dream has come true! Now I am Your love forever! Forever You dwell in my heart! I am Yours and You are mine! O sweet love's eternity!

SongPage.Title: 54. YOU ARE WORTHY
55. GLORIOUS SAVIOUR
SongPage.Context:
1. To Him who loved us and washed us From our sins in His own blood, And has made us kings and priests To His God and Father, To Him, to Him be the glory And the power to the ages Of the ages
2. To Him who loved us and washed us From our sins in His own blood, And has made us kings and priests To His God and Father, To Him, to Him be the glory And the dominion to the ages Of the ages. Amen.

SongPage.Title: 56. WHAT YOU AND I TREASURE
SongPage.Context:
1. On the bitter cross You thought of me; You saw the joy and sweetness ahead, And You despised the shame and the cross, That I may rest on Your bosom so sweet!
2. When You sweetly think: You've died for me, And on the cross, You drank the bitter cup; Your heart is filled with ov'rflowing joy, For You treasure that You have died for me.
3. I so treasure that I can love You, And that I can live and suffer for You. It is my joy to echo Your love, Weaving many sweet eternal memories.

SongPage.Title: 57. HIS LOVE'S PURPOSE
SongPage.Context:
1. He died for us! He died for us, That we can be forgiven, That we may be set free from sin; That we may enter heaven.
2. He died for us! He died for us, To remove all barriers of sin; Forev'r the veil was torn in two; I dwell in my Abba's bosom.
3. He died for me! He died for me, To cleanse we whiter than the snow, So that I can unite with Him, And that He may dwell in my heart.
4. He died for us! He died for us, That whether we wake or sleep, We should live together with Him, We should live together with Him. (stanza 4 ?ref: 1 Thes 5:10)

SongPage.Title: 58. ENJOY THE FRUIT OF THE CROSS
SongPage.Context:
AND DEEPLY ENTER INTO HIS BEAUTIFUL HEART OF LOVE
In the Lord and the cross, I rejoice and glory! For He gave Himself for me, Bought me to Him by His blood. This strongest love changes my life, Constrains me, gives me faith. O this greatest, most precious deed Is stronger than the rock, As stable as the throne! The fruits of the cross, sweeter than honey Give me faith, peace and victory. O how precious! Thick clouds and mist vanished, No more hindrance or shadow! In His presence I rejoice! Now I can bathe in His warm glorious light, It's so sweet and life giving! O what a joy To enter deep into His fairest heart, Drink fully of my Beloved's love, Enjoy His all knowing friendship. O what a joy to live with Him! Makes me feel His affection Filling the whole universe, Filling heaven and the earth. Who knows in this dark and suffering world There is heaven on the earth! Who knows in this dark and suffering world Is hidden the deepest love between He and I! It makes me feel His affection Filling the whole universe, Filling heaven and the earth.

SongPage.Title: 61. WHEN I CONSIDER THE CROSS
SongPage.Context:
1. When I see the precious blood, my heart shouts for joy! When I see the precious blood, I am strong with faith! My Lord's precious blood cleanses my conscience; I rely on His blood, boldly come to God. When I think of the cross, His love dissolves my heart, I long to offer my all to my Lord Beloved.
2. When I thought of the cross, my heart was humbled; For me, He faced the cross, rejected of man. He drank the bitter cup, tasted the greatest pain; He gave Himself for me! O how He loves me! When I think of the cross, His love dissolves my heart! Lord, help me to be faithful till I see Your face.

SongPage.Title: 62. COSTLY GRACE
SongPage.Context:
1. The have redeemed me with Your precious blood Lord, help me to cherish and keep myself; Deeply treasure Your costly grace, Faithfully follow You to the end.
2. I dare not make light of Your love and grace, (I had to cherish) And Your glorious perfect salvation. With faith, enjoy the fruits of love, Climb toward the peak and never retreat.
3. Year by year I know more of Your sweet love, And enjoy more of Your great salvation. What joy to feast on Your heart, My heart is free and I rest in You.

SongPage.Title: 63. THE FEAST OF LOVE
SongPage.Context:
1. This is the feast which the Lord has prepared, So full of love, so sweet to me. It reminds me of His wonderful love That He gave Himself for me.
2. He gave Himself for me on the cross That I may be whiter than snow. So that He may live in my heart forever And I may live in heav'n with Him.

SongPage.Title: 64. THE ADORABLE AND CAPTIVATING RISEN LORD
SongPage.Context:
1. Let's rejoice! He is risen! Overcame Satan and death; He swallowed up death, give us glowing hope. The glorious Lord rose from the dead, Forever we should rejoice!
2. My Jesus' tomb is empty, He has overcome death, Manifesting life incorruptible. In life's journey, He walks with me, He is my fountain of joy.
3. The risen Lord lives with me, He clothes me with joy and smile. He's my strength and drive, He's my sweet portion. He lives in my heart; he's my Beloved; With Him, life is warm and sweet.
4. The risen Lord is like the dawn, Like the dew in the bright morn. He is my Beloved; he's my closest Friend, Joined in spirit, we live in love; Life is meaningful and sweet.
5. The risen Lord is full of power, But He is kind and gentle. He shattered my doubts, wiped away my tears; His love's appearance, I so relish. My dear Lord, may You come soon.
(Please read aloud the small print together) 6. Let's rejoice! He is risen! (Ha! Ha!) (O that glorious dawn!) He conquered Satan and death, (Ha! Ha!) Broke the bar of death, brought us light and hope. (O death, where is your victory?) (O death, where is your sting?) "The glorious Lord rose from the dead!" What a glorious news of joy! (Ha! Ha!) (Hallelujah!)

SongPage.Title: 67. REJOICE! THE LORD IS RISEN!
