SongPage.Context: Rejoice! Rejoice! He is risen! Overcame Satan and death, He is risen! Rejoice! Rejoice! He is risen! Overcame Satan and death, He sets me free!

SongPage.Title: 68. LET'S REJOICE! LET'S DANCE!
SongPage.Context: Let's us shout! Let us dance! He has bruised Satan's head! Let's rejoice! Celebrate! He has overcome death! Let not your heart be troubled, But look to the glorious Lord. O let us laugh! Laugh at/in fierce storm! Laugh at/in great waves! Rejoice in Him!

SongPage.Title: 69. MY GLORIOUS SAVIOR AND BELOVED
70. A DAY OF GLORY AND SWEETNESS
SongPage.Context: One day, there's no more suffering and enemies; One day, there's no more tears and dark valley; One day, there's no more darkness and clouded day, No more bleak cold winter. There's only cloudless morning, Eternal beautiful spring. One day, no more sorrow, heart break and death, There's only sweetness eternally. Every where's full of life and warmth, Flooding with love, joy and song. One day I shall see You face to face; Forever I live in the depth of Your heart, Drinking, enjoying Your endless love. Enjoy with Your love's eternity! Glory upon glory to all eternity!

SongPage.Title: 72. I LONG FOR YOU
SongPage.Context:
I long for You! I long for You! My Love, my King, my life, my song. I long for You! My Morning Star,
1. To take me home, to take me home.
2. Come, to take me, in to glory!

SongPage.Title: 73. THE GLORIOUS VISION OF NEW JERUSALEM
SongPage.Context:
1. New Jerusalem! This most glorious vision Captures my heart, is my dream, drive and joy! O sweetest union! The Lord is my Beloved! This love fully satisfies my heart. I'm God's dearest, born of Him; He is my dearest Abba; This highest love satisfies my heart.
2. New Jerusalem is God's tabernacle And our fairest eternal sweet home! Its wall is jasper, with precious stone as its base, There gates are pearls, the street is pure gold; There the river of life flows, pure and clear as crystal, The banks blooming with the trees of life.
3. New Jerusalem is God's tabernacle! 'tis His eternal, sweet resting place, And our fairest, warmest heavenly home! God, man in love, fully satisfied! Enthralled in oneness with God and with one another, Love and joy forever overflow!
4. New Jerusalem is the bride of the Lamb, His love's masterpiece shines forth forever. The union of love between Christ and the church Is most moving! All will call us blessed! Sit with the Lord n the throne, glory forev'r increasing, O most colorful eternity!
5. My Abba wants me to be His most glorious child, To inherit all with His Beloved Son! I'm His dearest child, His dream, joy and glory! His infinite love is my sweet rest. Father and son's mutual love satisfies His heart and mine, (The love of Father and son) Forev'r we'll wonder at His love plan!

SongPage.Title: 75. THE ANSWER AND TREASURE OF MY LIFE
SongPage.Context: I've found the treasure of my life. He is the end of my long search. From now on, let me explore and enjoy His infinite love, riches, power and life. Let me always gaze on His face fully; Drink deeply in the ocean of His love, Till my cup daily overflows.

SongPage.Title: 76. LONGING FOR GOD
77. OVERFLOWING WITH THANKS
SongPage.Context:
1. Thank You for the sunshine, thank You for the cloud, Thank You for the sunset, thank You for the night, Thank You for Your wonderful love! Thank You that You died for me! Now in heaven, ever think of me; You in glory, ever live for me. Lord, I love You; I live for You. May You come back; ever be with You! Ever be with You!
2. Thank You for the sunshine. Thank You for the rain. Thank You for the winter. Thank You for the spring. Thank You for Your wonderful love! Thank You that You died for me! Now in heave, ever think of me; You in glory, ever live for me. Lord, I love You; I live for You. May You come back; ever be with You! Ever be with You!

SongPage.Title: 79. LIVE NORMALLY
80. BE STRONG AND OF GOOD COURAGE
81. REJOICE IN THE LORD ALWAYS
SongPage.Context:
1. The joy of the Lord is your strength. Rejoice always; rejoice always! The joy of the Lord; rejoice in the Lord always; And again I say rejoice.
2. The joy of the Lord is your strength. Rejoice today; rejoice always! The joy of the Lord; rejoice in the Lord always; And again I say rejoice.

SongPage.Title: 82. BE OF GOOD COURAGE
SongPage.Context:
1. I would have lost heart, would have lost heart, Unless I had believed That I'd see the goodness of the Lord In the land of the living. I would have lost heart, would have lost heart, Unless I had believed That I'd see the goodness of the Lord In the land of the living.
2. I would have lost heart, would have lost heart, Unless I had believed That I'd see the goodness of the Lord In the land of the living. Wait on the Lord, be of good courage, And He shall strengthen your heart; Wait, I say on the Lord, on the Lord; Wait, I say on the Lord. (Ref: Ps 27:13,14)

SongPage.Title: 84. TRUST IN HIM
SongPage.Context: The Lord is my strength and my shield; My heart trusted in Him, And I am helped, and my heart exults, And with my song I'll thank Him. (Ref: Ps 28:7)

SongPage.Title: 85. DELIGHT YOURSELF IN THE LORD
SongPage.Context:
1. Trust in Jehovah and do good, Trust in Jehovah and do good, Dwell in the land, and feed on His faithfulness, And feed on His faithfulness.
2. Delight yourself also in Jehovah, And He'll give you heart's desires. Commit your way to the Lord; trust also in Him, And He will bring it to pass. (Ref: Ps 37:35)

SongPage.Title: 86. GOD IS OUR REFUGE
SongPage.Context: God is our refuge and strength, And a very present help. Therefore we will not be afraid, Though the earth be removed, Though the mountain be carried Into the mist of the sea; Though its waters rise and roar, Though the mountains shake and quake. (Ref: Ps 46:13)

SongPage.Title: 87. OUR DEAR ABBA FOREVER
SongPage.Context:
1. For this God is our God, our God, He'll be our Guide even to death. For this God is our God, our God, He'll be our Guide even to death. For this God is our dear Abba! He'll be our Guide till Jesus comes! For this God is our dear Abba! He'll be our Guide till Jesus comes!
2. For this God is our dear Abba! He will carry and provide for us. For this God is our dear Abba! He will always embrace and care for us. For this God is our dear Abba! We will inherit all with Christ Jesus. For this God is our dear Abba! We will reign with Him forever.

SongPage.Title: 89. LIFELONG FAVOR
SongPage.Context:
1. You crown the year with Your goodness; And Your paths drop fatness, drop fatness. You crown the year with Your goodness; And Your paths drop fatness, drop fatness.
2. For His anger endures but a moment, His favor is for life! Weeping may endure for a night, But joy comes in the morning.

SongPage.Title: 90. HE IS MY STRENGTH,
SongPage.Context:
MY SONG AND MY SALVATION
The Lord is my strength and song, And is become my salvation. The Lord is my strength and song, And is become my salvation. (Ref: Ps 118:14)

SongPage.Title: 91. REJOICE IN THIS DAY
92. A RIGHT PLACE FOR GOD'S WORD
SongPage.Context: Your word have I hidd'n in my heart, That I might not sin against You. Your word have I hidd'n in my heart, That I might not sin against You. (Ref: Ps 119:11)

SongPage.Title: 93. LIGHT AND PEACE
SongPage.Context: Your word is a lamp to my feet And a light to my path. Great peace have those who love Your law, And nothing does stumble them. Your word is a lamp to my feet And a light to my path. Great peace have those who love Your law, And nothing does stumble them. (Ref: Ps 119:105, 165)

SongPage.Title: 94. MY KEEPER!
SongPage.Context:
1. I will lift up my eyes to the hills From where shall come my help? My help, my help comes from the Lord, Who made, who made heaven and earth. He will not allow your foot to be moved; He who helps you will not slumber, Will not slumber.
2. Behold, He who keeps Israel Shall neither slumber nor sleep. The Lord, the Lord is your Keeper; The Lord is your shade at your right hand. The sun shall not strike you by day, Nor the moon by night, nor the moon by night, Nor the moon by night.
3. The Lord shall preserve you from all evil; He shall preserve your soul. The Lord shall preserve, the Lord shall preserve Your going out and your coming in From this time forth, and even forevermore, From this time forth, and even forevermore, Forevermore. (Ref: Ps 121)

SongPage.Title: 96. BROTHERLY LIFE AND LOVE
SongPage.Context: Behold, how good and how pleasant For brothers to dwell in love, It's like the precious oil drips from Aaron's head to his garments; It's like the dew of Hermon Descends on the hills of Zion, For there the Lord commanded the blessing Life forevermore. (Ps 133)

SongPage.Title: 97. MY HELP EVERYWHERE
SongPage.Context: If I take the wings of the morning, And dwell in the far side of the sea, Even there Your hand will lead me, And Your right hand will hold me. (Ref: Ps 139:910)

SongPage.Title: 98. HIS THOUGHTS OF LOVE
SongPage.Context: How precious also Are Your thoughts to me! How great is the sum of them! If I'd count them, They're more than the sand! When I awake, O Lord, I am still with You; I am still with You; I am still with You. (Ref: Ps 139:1718)

SongPage.Title: 99. MY INCOMPARABLE BELOVED AND FRIEND
SongPage.Context:
1. My Beloved is bright and ruddy; Me Beloved is white and ruddy, Standing out among ten thousands! His head is like the finest gold; His lacks are bushy, black as a raven. His eyes are like doves by the water brooks, Washed with milk and fitly set.
2. His cheeks are like a bed of spices, A raised bed of sweet smelling herbs. His lips like lilies, dripping liquid myrrh. His hands are like rings of gold, filled with jewels. His body like iv'ry, carved with sapphires. His legs are like pillars of marble Set upon bases of fine gold.
3. His appearance is like Lebanon, Excellent as the cedars. His mouth is most sweet; His mouth is most sweet, Yes, He is altogether lovely. This is my Beloved, and this is my Friend, O daughters of Jerusalem! This is my Beloved, and this is my Friend, (Ref: Songs of Solomon 5:1016)

SongPage.Title: 101. WHITE AS SNOW
SongPage.Context: Though your sins are like scarlet, They shall be as white as snow; The east is from the west, Though they are red like crimson, So far has He removed. They shall be like wool. Our transgressions from us.

SongPage.Title: 102. TRUST IN THE LORD
SongPage.Context:
THE EVERLASTING ROCK
You will keep him in perfect peace, Whose mind is stayed on You; Because he trusts in You, Because he trusts in You, Trust in the Lord forever; Trust in the Lord forever; For in the Lord, Jehovah Is an everlasting rock. You will keep him in perfect peace, Whose mind is stayed on You; Because he trusts in You, Because he trusts in You. (Ref: Isa 26:34)

SongPage.Title: 104. KNOW THAT I AM GOD!
SongPage.Context:
1. Be still, and know that I am God! Be still, and know that I am God! I will be exalted among the nations, I will be exalted in the earth.
2. In returning and rest you shall be saved; And in quietness and trust shall be your strength. In returning and rest you shall be saved; And in quietness and trust shall be your strength.
3. Be still, and know that I am God! In returning and rest you shall be saved. My soul waits silently for God alone; For my expectation is from Him. (Ref: Ps.40:10, Isa 30:15, Ps 62:5)

SongPage.Title: 105. RETURN TO ME!
SongPage.Context:
I HAVE REDEEMED YOU!
I have blotted out as a thick cloud, Your transgressions, And as a cloud, your sins, your sins, And as a cloud, your sins; Return to Me; return to Me; For I have redeemed you. (Ref: Isa 44:22)

SongPage.Title: 106. MT LOVE SHALL NOT DEPART FROM YOU
SongPage.Context: For the mountain shall depart, And the hills be removed; But My kindness, My kindness Shall not depart from you, Neither shall the covenant Of My peace be removed, Says the Lord, says the Lord Who has mercy on you. (Ref: Isa 54:10)

SongPage.Title: 107. HE REJOICES OVER YOU
108. THE GREAT COMMISSION
SongPage.Context:
Read Matt 28:18 " And having come near; Jesus spoke to them, saying, " All authority in heaven and earth has been given to Me."
Go therefore and make disciples of all the nations, Baptizing then in the name of the Father and of the Son And of the Holy Spirit, teaching them, teaching them To observe all things that I have commanded you; And lo, I'm with you always, ev'n to the end of the age. And lo, I'm with you always, ev'n to the end of the age.

SongPage.Title: 109. GOD SO LOVED THE WORLD
SongPage.Context: For God so loved the world, so loved the world That He gave His only begotten Son, That whosoever believes in Him Should not perish But have eternal life; Should not perish But have eternal life; (Ref: John 3:16)

SongPage.Title: 110. GOD SO LOVED YOU AND ME
SongPage.Context: For God so loved the world That He gave His only begotten Son, That whosoever believes in Him Should not perish But have eternal life; Should not perish But have eternal life; (Ref: John 3:16)

SongPage.Title: 111. I AM THE LIGHT OF THE WORLD
SongPage.Context: I am the light of the world. He who follows Me Will not walk in darkness, But will have the light of life. (Ref: John 8:12)

SongPage.Title: 112. UNDYING LOVE
SongPage.Context:
1. Jesus, having love His own Who were in the world, He loved them to the end; He loved them to the end!
2. He will strengthen you to the end; He will never leave you! For you, He lives and prays in heav'n, He will save you to the end.

SongPage.Title: 113. PEACE OF THE LORD
SongPage.Context:
1. Peace I leave with you, My peace I give unto you; Not as the world giveth, Give I unto you.
2. Peace I leave with you, My peace I give unto you; Let no your heart be troubled, Neither let it be afraid. (Ref: John 14:27)

SongPage.Title: 114. ABIDE IN ME
SongPage.Context: I am the vine, you are the branches; He who abides in Me, and I in him, This one bears much fruit; this one bears much fruit; For apart from Me you can do nothing, I gave Myself fro you, that I may live in your heart. Abide in Me day and night; live in My love. (Ref: John 15:5)

SongPage.Title: 115. ALL THINGS WORK
SongPage.Context:
TOGETHER FOR GOOD
And we know that all things Work together for good To those that love God, To those who are the called According to His purpose. (Ref: Rom 8:28)

SongPage.Title: 116. MY GRACE IS SUFFICIENT
SongPage.Context: My grace is sufficient for you! My grace is sufficient for you, For My power is made perfect in weakness. My grace is sufficient for you! (Ref: 2Cor 12:9)

SongPage.Title: 117. FINISHED MY COURSE
118. BY ONE OFFERING!
SongPage.Context:
PERFECTED FOREVER!
For by one offering, for by one offering He has perfected, He has perfected Forever them that are sanctified. For by one off'ring He has perfected Forever them that are sanctified. (Ref: Heb 10:14)

SongPage.Title: 119. HUMBLE YOURSELVES
SongPage.Context: Humble yourselves, humble yourselves In the sight of the Lord. Humble yourselves, humble yourselves In the sight of the Lord. And He shall lift you up. (Ref: James 4:10)

SongPage.Title: 120. HE CARES FOR YOU
SongPage.Context: Casting all your care up on Him, For He cares for you. Casting all your care up on Him, For He cares for you. (Ref: 1Pet 5:7)

SongPage.Title: 121. O SUCH IS THE LOVE OF MY ABBA FATHER
SongPage.Context: I love you with no beginning! I love you with an eternal love from everlasting to everlasting. You are my greatest masterpiece in the universe, from My infinite love, wisdom and power. You are not only created in My image, But you are born of Me; My seed abides in you. We have the deepest union of life. You are My greatest desire from eternity. I desire you to be My darling child, With the greatest delight. I love you as I love My only begotten Son. I love you so much that I even sent My beloved Son To be a Man forever, And even didn't spare Him on the bitterest cross, That you can live in My bosom of love and joy. I am yours. You are My dearest son. I enjoy so much this deepest Father and son relationship. I love to be on your neck. You are my greatest gift to My Son. And I gave My Son to you. You are the coheir with My Son. I also sent the Holly Spirit to comfort you And lead you to glory. My son, drink deep of My love. Live in My love and My joy over you. Live close to My bosom. Place your tiny hand into My mighty hand And let's walk closely together.

SongPage.Title: 123. LORD, I SO TREASURE?.
SongPage.Context:
Lord, I so treasure
Your love from eternity past That unsearchable affection long long ago Lord, I so treasure Your beautiful heart Your romantic attention for me Your existence have no beginning But at the beginning of no beginning I was already in Your deepest mind in Your heart Your thoughts of love toward me outnumbered The sands or stars Because of Your burning affection You long to become a Man forever To be made like me, to be close to me Lord, I so treasure You originally covered with glory But for me, You went to the cross, covered with blood You pour out Your life for me On the cruel cross You thought of me, You saw the joy ahead You despised the shame, and endured the cross That I may have the deepest love's union With You forever Lord, let me treasure Your affection That has been sealed with blood That shed Your blood And let me treasure Your love's covenant in the Song if Songs That is so beautiful, sweet and heart touching That makes me drunk and wonder Lost in sweetness and enjoyment It's more than the sweetest dream Lord, I so treasure That You live for me And totally committed Yourself forever Moreover, it's Your ecstasy to live in my heart Day and night, eternally near, never apart Lord, I so treasure That one day, You will come back To take me to be ever with You O! That creative fantastic appointment in the clouds It's sparking, bright and sweet Make me fancying Lord, I so treasure That endless love's eternity That I can have endless discoveries, amazement And ecstatic taste of Your love O! That endless carpet of love Paved with pink petals And that unending gushing fiver of love That flows upward Towards the ever rising peaks, yes, peaks beyond peaks O Lord, have You in this life and in eternity Is bliss indescribable It's really Your dream of love Accomplished by Your perfect love Your infinite wisdom, Your almighty power And Your death defying affection Lord, I treasure That endless pink carpet That unending song of love Those entrancing scenes that will ever come In succession That river of love that flows on and on And that unbroken dream of love O Lord! It's so precious That from the endless overflow of Your most Beautiful love This is from everlasting to everlasting That You give me this greatest treasure It's too precious, that You embrace me in this river of love And in this life and in eternity I can endlessly drink heartily in Your romantic, Most colorful love Live in the dream of love Lost in wonder; love, bliss and thrill Oh! Eternity! Eternity! Oh! You and I!

SongPage.Title: 2 The Adorable and Captivating Risen Lord
SongPage.Context:
1. Let's rejoice! He is risen! Overcame Satan and death; He swallowed up death, give us glowing hope. The glorious Lord rose from the dead, Forever we should rejoice!
2. My Jesus' tomb is empty, He has overcome death, Manifesting life incorruptible. In life's journey, He walks with me, He is my fountain of joy.
3. The risen Lord lives with me, He clothes me with joy and smile. He's my strength and drive, He's my sweet portion. He lives in my heart; He's my Beloved; With Him, life is warm and sweet.
4. The risen Lord is like the dawn, Like the dew in the bright morn. He is my Beloved; He's my closest Friend, Joined in spirit, we live in love; Life is meaningful and sweet.
5. The risen Lord is full of power, But He is kind and gentle. He shattered my doubts, wiped away my tears; His love's appearance, I so relish. My dear Lord, may You come soon.
(Please read aloud the small print together) 6. Let's rejoice! He is risen! (Ha! Ha!) (O that glorious dawn!) He conquered Satan and death, (Ha! Ha!) Broke the bar of death, brought us light and hope. (O death, where is your victory?) (O death, where is your sting?) "The glorious Lord rose from the dead!" What a glorious news of joy! (Ha! Ha!) (Hallelujah!)

SongPage.Title: 4 The Lord's Personal Love to Me
SongPage.Context:
1. His personal love to me, (Your personal love to me,) Pure, undying to the end. Great floods can not quench it; Time, ev'n years, can't make it fade, Withstands various trials and tests; It never fails my heart to gain.
2. His personal love to me, Is my drive through all my life. When I'm despaired, His love comforts me; His love overcomes all things. Rich, colorful, tender and soft, I'll boast of His love forever.
3. His personal love to me, Sweet and warm and gives me hope, Shares in my life's sorrows and joy, Gives me courage and gives me faith, Fills my heart like a living spring, In His bosom may I e'er stay!
4. His personal love to me, Makes the angels admire, amaze. Deeper than the sea, higher than the sky, His love paves my path of live. Grace upon grace I can't number, Beyond compare, no else to find.

SongPage.Title: 6 The Love of the Beloved
SongPage.Context:
G 6/8 1. O' my Beloved ?so glo-ri-ous, He is a-bove all things. His love to me is high and deep Through-out e-ter-ni-ty. To gain my heart He became flesh. For ma-ny years He suffered much. He did love me and die for me. He de-sires me.
2. O' my Beloved, His fervent love Is like flashes of fire. Many waters cannot quench love. His love is stronger than death. All things may change, His love's the same. His love to me is ever fresh. He lives with me from dawn to dusk. He desires me.
3. O' my Beloved loves me deeply. He suffered all for me. My eyes of faith capture His heart, And make His heart beat faster. I'm His darling, His dearest one. He shouts for joy, dances for me, Quiet for me; His heart is filled. He desires me.
4. O' my Beloved ?His tender love Satisfies all my heart. He is the myrrh between my breasts. That heals the wounds of my heart. His love gives me joy, rest and peace, He draws me. I overcome the world. He gives me faith to pass through all. I desire Him!

SongPage.Title: 9 March on by Faith
10 The Lamb Who was Slain
SongPage.Context: C4/4 You are wor-thy to take the scroll And to o-pen its seals for You were slain And have redeemed us to God by Your blood out of every tribe And tongue and peo-ple and na-tion and have made us kings And priests to our God and we shall reign on the earth Then I looked and I heard the voice of ma-ny an-gels A-round the throne, th' li-ving crea-tures And the el-ders and the num-ber Of them was thousand of thou-sand, say-ing With a loud voice, "Worthy is the Lamb Who was slain to re-ceive po-wer, Riches, wisdom, might, honour, glo-ry, and blessing!" And every crea-ted thing which is in heaven, on the earth And un-der the earth and in the sea and all in them, I heard saying, "Blessing and honour and glory and pow'r To Him who sits on the throne, And to the Lamb for-e-ver!

SongPage.Title: 12 Home, Sweet Home
SongPage.Context:
1.'Tis the most pleasant home, the desire of God and man, Full of fragrance of love, songs of joy everywhere; A home of warmth and grace, o'erflowing rivers of joy, The peaceful dwelling place of God and man forever. Home, sweet, sweet home! The hearts of God and man become one in this sweet home.
2. Through all eternity, in God's plan, "home" is the core, The Father, the Son and the Spirit gave all for this. The Lord came to the earth and was nailed upon the cross. God's heart was pierced. He gave His all for me. Home, sweet, sweet home! This is my vision, my goal, my dream and my rest.
3. Through all eternity, the myst'ry of all ages Has been revealed to me, I've found the greatest treasure. Now, I have understood "Myst'ry of the Universe," I have the goal of life, 'tis my hope and 'tis my aim. Home, sweet, sweet home! The hearts of God and man are fully satisfied.
4. Through all eternity, and throughout the universe. Only in this home God and man can be at rest. God's house is bountiful- rivers of joy, fount of life, This household reveals God's glory and beauty. Home, sweet, sweet home! God's infinite fullness overflows from this household.
5. Gone all sorrows and sighs! Comes this home down on new earth! No more grief and pain! God wipes away every tear. His tab'nacle's with men, His love flows to all the earth; The city of clear gold shines forth beams of jasper. Home, sweet, sweet home! The masterpiece of God, the model of His love.
6. The place of God and man - the city of clear gold, Founder on precious stones, and pearls as its welcome gates. Each one is radiant in this Royal family. The city lights up the new heaven and new earth. Home, sweet, sweet home! The vast ocean of grace ripples with waves of love.

SongPage.Title: 14 Where Love Abides
SongPage.Context:
1. Where love abides, where love abides, Mountains are turned to plains; Where love abides, where love abides, Darkness is turned to day.
2. Where love abides, where love abides, Winter feels just like spring; Where love abides, where love abides, Sweetness whelms over pain.
3. Love your household, love your household, And you will see them change; Don't cease to pray, don't cease to pray, And you'll see God's glory.

SongPage.Title: 15 Grace upon Grace
SongPage.Context:
1. You have crowned the year with Your bounty, And Your paths dripped with fatness. You have crowned the year with Your bounty, And Your paths dripped with fatness.
2. For His anger is but for a moment, His favour is for a lifetime. Weeping may last for the night, But a shout of joy comes at morn.
3. You have helped me, my Lord, You have helped me. Under Your wings I shall shout for joy. Closely, my heart will follow, follow You. You right hand will take hold of me.

SongPage.Title: 16 In the Cross
SongPage.Context:
1. On the cross, my Lord conquered all the foes; On the cross, all my sins He washed away. O' Moving, life yielding love! Its depth and height infinite! By the cross, God's love to me is displayed.
2. On the cross, "It is finished!" He declared; On the cross, the wall of sin He shattered. O' Salvation of glory! I've obtained glorious freedom! By the cross, God and man embrace as one.
3. In the cross, I can see a ray of hope; In the cross, my soul's comforted and healed. O' Tender light of the cross! What encouragement it gives! By the cross, my life has a glorious change.
4. On cross, His off'ring is once for all; On the cross, His blood washed me white as snow. O' Perfected for all time! Full acceptance, endless love! By the cross, God and man are ever close.
5. In the cross, He cast away my load of sin; In the cross, He freed me from the yoke of law. O' How warm and sweet to live In His vast ocean of love! By the cross, God's love on me is outpoured.
6. In the cross, His love kindles my whole life. In the cross, His love gives me faith and might. O' Wondrous love of the cross Shall be my driven and my rest! By the cross, I shout for joy and vict'ry.

SongPage.Title: 18 Rejoice! The Lord is Risen!
SongPage.Context: Rejoice! Rejoice! The Lord is risen! Overcome Satan and death, He is risen! Rejoice! Rejoice! The Lord is risen! Overcome Satan and death, He set me free!

SongPage.Title: 19 At the Sea of Tiberias
SongPage.Context: At the Sea of Tiberias, The risen Lord appeared to me; He prepared a barbecue on the shore, With fish and bread and His tender love. O' Lord! You know that I love You! Though I have failures and weakness. May You strengthen me by the spirit, To follow and love You to the end.

SongPage.Title: 20 One Day the Lord Will Come
SongPage.Context:
1. One day the Lord will come, To take me to the clouds; That day He'll wipe away my tears, I'll dance and sing aloud.
Chorus; O' Lord, I love You. My heart longs for You. Gladly waiting for that day, I'll see Your glorious face.
2. One day the Lord will come, To transform my body. To be like His form of glory, How wonderful and free!
3. One day the Lord will come, I'll marvel and rejoice. To see my Lord's glorious face, Shall be my spring of joy.
4. One day the Lord will come, Take me to Abba's home. I'll see His wondrous love design, For me the new abode.
5. One day the Lord will come, Gone all sorrows and tears! I'll drink from the river of joy, Enthralled in His love.
6. One day the Lord will come, Crowns, rewards to present. We'll reign fore'er, His government Will increase with no end.
7. One day the Lord will come, He is my hope so blest, There'll be new heaven and new earth, In which dwells righteousness.

SongPage.Title: 22 His Gaze of Love
SongPage.Context:
1. Can a woman forget her nursing child? Even these may forget, I won't forget you. Behold, I've inscribed you on My palms. Your adorable countenance's always before Me.
2. The mountains shall depart, the hills be removed; But My kindness shall not depart from you. All things may change, May love is the same. My covenant of love is forever sure.
3. My child, I will never leave you, never forsake you. Till the end of the age, I'm always with you, I love you as the Father loves Me. Day and night I watch over you, fix My eyes on you.

SongPage.Title: 23 The Perfect Salvation
SongPage.Context:
1. My sins more than I can number, His blood washed me white as snow. And He has purged my conscience. Now I am free before God. Precious blood redeemed me. What can I pay Him back? Let me enjoy Your great love Your perfect salvation.
2. I was away from the Father. By His blood, He brought me back. The veil was torn for me fore'er. I can see the Father's face. I dwell in the Holy Place, My home's God's tabernacle. God's perfect love casts out my fear. And I cry, "Lord, may You come!"
3. My Lord's ascended to heaven For me, appears before God. In heaven I sit with Him, Enjoy the Father's delight. Closest to the Father, Closest to the Father, I am His dear child forever. It's so sweet to cry, "Abba!"
4. The bitter way You walked for me. You said, "Finished!" on the cross. You lay down Your life for me Now I can embrace You. Lord, let me see Your heart, Move me to love You more. I offer my life for You, Forever I will love You.

SongPage.Title: 25 This is True Love
SongPage.Context: God send His only Son into the world That we might live through Him, through Him The love of God is shown. His love is shown to all. Not that we who loved God But it's God who loved us, Sent His only Son to be a sacrifice To save us from sin. This is true love (1John 4:919)

SongPage.Title: 26 The Long Expected Embrace
SongPage.Context: When I lifted my head for Your face I wished to see, I met Your gaze on me which was from eternity. I could not realize when You began To put me on Your heart! When I considered that was just our first encounter, Instead it was Your long expected embrace with me. I was surprised with joy when I met You the first time, Yet, all along, You've been deeply loving me. As time goes by, I love You more and more. Since long ago You've desired me, thought of me. O'.... This sweet love that surpasses time and space Is a true experience of You and me.

SongPage.Title: 28 The Glorious Risen Lord
SongPage.Context:
1. In the middle of the lamp stands One like the Son of Man, Clothed a robe reaching to the feet, Gird'd on His chest a golden band. His head and hair were white like wool, As white as snow. His eyes were like a flame of fire, His eyes were like a flame of fire.
2. His feet were like fine brass, as if refined in a furnace. His voice was like sound of waters; His right hand held seven stars. Out of His mouth came a sharp sword, A sharp two-edged sword. His countenance was like the sun Shining in its strength, in its strength.
3. When I saw Him, I fell at His feet Like a dead man, like a dead man. He placed His right hand on me, saying, "Don't be afraid. Don't be afraid. I am the First, I am the Last. I was dead and behold, I am alive forevermore. I am alive forevermore.
4. And I have, and I have the keys of Hades and of death." O Death, where is your victory? where is your victory? O Death, O Death, where is your sting? Where is your sting? Hallelujah! Hallelujah! The glorious Lord has overcome death!
(Ref: nrev1:1318; 1Cor:15:55)

SongPage.Title: 30 Strive for the Lord
SongPage.Context:
1. I Strive even among daily chores, In quietness live for you; I strive even life's busy and tight, Lord, I still walk with You. I strive despite the world's corrupt course, I'm sanctified to you. I strive on! O' Lord, for you I live.
2. I strive even in doubts and worries; Let You comfort my heart. I strive mid the storms of temptation, Lord, keep my heart sincere. I strive in the days of affliction, My love to You I give. I strive on! O' Lord, for You I live.
3. O' Lord, I know that You love me, I have captured Your heart! How precious Your favour, tender love, That's why I'm striving still! Forget not You chose and commissioned me; I'm glad to know Your will. I strive on! O' Lord, for You I live.

SongPage.Title: 32 What a Friendship the Lord with Me
SongPage.Context: My dear Lord, day and night You're by my side; All the years You've carried me Through floods and fires, In the north wind and dark night, On the path of easy life, Walk in love hand in hand You and I. Your calling and Your will can I deny? I will run after You all my life. Thank You that You have revealed Such a love so high and deep! Lord, Your love on the cross compels me. When I look on to the fields, Harvest plentiful and white; Lord, revive my heart anew! Can it be that I should let You grieve in zeal? 'Tis my plea, my Lord, for You I live! Loving You, I'll press on toward the goal!

SongPage.Title: 34 The Lord in the Flesh and Blood
SongPage.Context:
1. In the silent night sky, stars twinkling bright, In the town of Bethlehem my Saviour's born. Lying in a manger, wrapped in cloths, My Lord came in the flesh and blood.
Chorus: The Lord loved me and became flesh, Fully understands my troubles. He became a Man. He feels what I feel. He's full of compassion and love.
2. He once lived on the earth. He once was tired. He once was thirsty, hungry, sad and angry. His heart was once pierced through. He once did weep. He once suffered all pains for me.

SongPage.Title: 35 For Love, Lord, You Came
SongPage.Context:
1. For love, You came from heaven to the earth. You were born in a manger. You became the son of a carpenter. But for love, Lord, You came
2. For love, You endured various temptations. You had no place to lay You head. When You were weary, You thought of my needs. And for love, Lord, You came.
3. For love, You're willing to bear all shame. You were spat on the face. You bore all the stripes, wore the crown of thorns. But for love, Lord, You came.
4. For love, You were willing to be nailed. You bore my sins on the cross. For me, You were forsaken by God. But for love, Lord, You came.
5. For love, You've overcome all pains and trials. Lord, I want to follow You. May I love the world with You all my life. For You love I'll go forward.

SongPage.Title: 37 Consider This Grace
SongPage.Context:
1. "He loved me and died for me!" Consider this grace That changes all my life, Gives me hope and joy! Lord, Your great and tender love, Heals the wounds of men, Yet, You were oft despised, Acquainted with grief.
Chorus: On the cross You bled and died, To ransom my soul. Your heart was wounded for me! There's a living way To the Father's fold! Think'ng of Your love, I'm moved to tears.
2. you were forsaken for me Both by God and men; Lonely, You prayed that night In great agony! Silently, You bore the cross, Walked to Calvary, Bled all the way, and were lifted on the tree!

SongPage.Title: 39 You Gave Yourself for Me
SongPage.Context: Lord, You loved me and died for me! You drank the bitter cup On the cruel cross, You shed Your blood, Brought me to be Your own. My heart gives thanks, I yearn to praise, Praise You forevermore Till all perish, I'll love You still. Belong to You only.

SongPage.Title: 40 The Dawn has Come
SongPage.Context: The dark night is gone and the dawn has come! The Lord left His tomb, leaving the linen wrapping. He thought of Peter and the disciples. He saw their sorrow, their disappointment. He saw all their tears and their wounds. He'll take away shadows. He'll wipe away all tears. He'll destroy all darkness, despair. He'll cover them with gladness. He will give them the glorious hope. And now they know His love - stronger than death, Always the same, never sep'rate from His love. The Lord will be with them always Until the end of the age, Unitl the end of the age.

SongPage.Title: 42 I Love Your Appearing
SongPage.Context:
1. O' Lord, I love Your appearing. You'll meet me face to face! In love for years, no words can tell Such deep love and friendship. Seeing Your face, I will love You even more, The clouds'll be brighter than before. E'er to abide with You and know Your wonder, 'Tis bliss beyond compare!
2. O' Lord, I love Your appearing. The world I lay aside! This world, its lusts will pass away, The toil in God e'er abides. Not far from me I see the coming glory, You'll praise me at the stage of Christ! How You cherish all that I have done for You! All these You bear in mind.
3. O' Lord, I love Your appearing. I don't mind suffering! The glory's of exceeding weight. You have laid up crowns for me! You hold my hand through floods and flames and trials. Soon You'll bring me into glory! Then I will sit with You fore'er on Your throne. With You hold sovereignty.

SongPage.Title: 44 Hope in the Grace of the Lord's Coming
SongPage.Context:
1. You should rest your hope fully on The grace of the Lord's coming, And heed to the prophetic word, Heed to the prophetic word, Till the day dawns, the morn star Rises in your heart. You are drawn by the Lord's coming Longing for future glory.
2. I don't mind the things which are seen, But the things which are not seen. For the things seen are but temporal, Those not seen are eternal. Light affliction for a while, Works for us lasting glory. That's of far more exceeding weight. What a bliss to be with Him!
3. The rich grace of the Lord's coming Surpasses all human dreams, I shall be caught up in the clouds, And be face to face with Him. My body will be transformed To be like His of glory, He'll bring me to the Father's home, Stroll in the holy city.
4. When I see His face of glory, And realize His love so deep, I'll be drawn by His majesty, Changed into marv'llous glory! Love response flows from my heart, Like a spring that ever swells, God's household is full of sweetness. We'll dwell in "the worlds of love"!
5. Thrilling prize-giving at Christ's stage! The toil in Him not in vain. Giving water to little ones, A reward from Him I'll gain. He'll remember all my days, All sweet memories display. So precious He appreciates me. He cherishes my love.
6. The beauty of the Father's home Excels all men's fantasies; Gates of pearl and walls of jasper, Gems as base and gold as street. The river and trees of life, The Lamb as the city's light! The city's filled with warmth and love, Full of life and glory bright.
7. The crowns He gives me won't perish. I will be move glorious. Government and peace of the Lord Shall forevermore increase. I'll sit with Him on the throne, Reign with Him eternally, Soon the glorious "worlds of love" Will spread o'er the universe.

SongPage.Title: 47 Enjoy the Fruits of the Cross and Deeply
SongPage.Context:
Enter into His Beautiful Heart of Love
In the Lord and the cross, I rejoice and glory! For He gave Himself for me, Bought me to Him by His blood. This strongest love changes my life, Constrains me, gives me faith. O' this greatest, most precious deed Is stronger than the rock, As stable as the throne! The fruits of the cross, sweeter than honey Give me faith, peace and victory. O' how precious! Thick clouds and mist vanished, No more hindrance or shadow! In His presence I rejoice! Now I can bathe in His warm glorious light, It's so sweet and life giving! O' what a joy To enter deep into His fairest heart, Drink fully of my Beloved's love, Enjoy His all knowing friendship. O' what a joy to live with Him! Makes me feel His affection Filling the whole universe, Filling heaven and the earth. Who knows in this dark and suffering world, There is heaven on the earth! Who knows in this dark and suffering world Is hidden the deepest love between He and I! It makes me feel His affection Filling the whole universe, Filling heaven and the earth.

SongPage.Title: 50 Enthralled in His Matchless Love
SongPage.Context: Enthralled in His matchless love, Like living in a love dream! His love fairer than flowers, Taste sweeter than honey, No dream can compare, Beyond the thoughts of man, wonder of wonders! But His love is true! His love is true! O' His love fills the whole universe, Heav'n and the earth, And my heart which He desires.

SongPage.Title: 51 Let's Celebrate
SongPage.Context: Let us dance and celebrate. For we are God's dear children! And we are the lovers of the Lord! The jewels of the Spirit! Ha! Ha! Ha! Ha! Ha! Ha! We're His royal family! Let's live out the love of our hearts, And build His church together. And reign one day with Him!

SongPage.Title: 52 The Deepest Affection!
SongPage.Context:
The Highest Father's Love!
In this whole universe, There's no deeper affection, No higher father's love, Your bosom is my sweet rest. Father, daily You long to see my face, Love to hear my sweet voice calling to You; Daily You long to kiss me with kisses, Embrace me. Abba, Your matchless plan, Full of wisdom and love! As Your child, born of You, I'm carefree and drawn by You. You desire to bring me to great glory, Sit with You on the throne, to inherit all; You e'en prepare a wedding feast for Your Son, O' how sweet! Abba, my heart loves You; I long to know You more, Fully drink of Your love, Daily rejoice before you.

SongPage.Title: 54 My Dear Abba
SongPage.Context:
1. God's beloved Son died for me the veil was torn fore'er. Abba ran out to embrace me, covered me with kisses. A robe and a ring He gave me. A feast He prepared for me. He celebrated. He sang and danced I've returned home.
2. My Abba is self-existing, wonderful, glorious. He is all-wise, all-knowing, almighty, all-loving. He is the perfect Creator. His goodness man can't comprehend. He's my Father, my dear Abba, my true Abba.
3. The Lord's Father is my Father; I'm truly born of Him. His seed fore'er abides in me. I can be most like Him. The Lord and I are of one. I am Abba's dearest child, Joint heir with Christ, inherit all forever.
4. I'm the dearest child of Abba. His Spirit dwells in me. I am born of the Spirit; I know I'm Abba's true child. In Abba's love, my heart is free, I know He sings, dances for me. Let me enjoy the Father's love throughout my life.
5. Abba spared not His only Son, for me He gave Him up. How shall He not freely give me all things along with the Lord?! He loves me as He loves the Lord; He welcomes me, delights in me. He wants me to sit at His right, to be glorious.

SongPage.Title: 56 Who Affect the Father the Most
58 I have Captured My Father's Heart
SongPage.Context:
1. I've captured my Father's heart, Day and night He thinks of me; His thoughts of love toward me Out-number the sands or stars.
2. I've captured my Father's heart, He'll gaze on me forever. His eternal love and care Draw me close to His bosom.
3. Abba, Father's heart is mine, He leaps for joy over me; His smile is so bright and warm, In His bosom I rejoice.

SongPage.Title: 59 The Love Song of the Father's Heart
SongPage.Context:
1. My dear child, do you know How joyous I'm for you?! Your countenance and your every move Shines like a precious stone, Dazzling, lovely.
Chorus; I love to embrace you, 'Tis My pleasure and joy, For you I dance and sing The love song of My heart.
2. My dear child, do you know How content I'm with you? Now and fore'er nothing in this world Can ever replace you in My heart.
3. The days ahead are joyous, Come, fully enjoy My all. You can freely lean on My bosom. I'll give you eternal, greatest blessings.

SongPage.Title: 61 The Father's Love
SongPage.Context:
1. I am born of God. I am His dear child. We are closely united. The highest Father's love Is the same forever and ever.
2. He holds me in His arms, He smiles with great content, Kissing me with kisses. His delight towards me Is the same forever and ever.
3. He gazes upon me. His desire is for me. From eternity, His thoughts of love for me Are the same forever and ever.
4. He gave His Son for me. He gives me all freely. He cares for my whole life, gives me endless glory. Father, O' Father, I love You.

SongPage.Title: 62 The Love in the Beginning
SongPage.Context: O' the Life in the beginning, Is so boundless, glorious! O' the love in the beginning, Colorful, like a rainbow! O' Creator, You're self exist, An ever flowing fountain! From eternity, Your heart is sweet With a secret of love. You long that I, Your created one, May unite with You as one In love's deepest union. With Your infinite love, Wisdom and power, You create me for Yourself To be Your most compatible, dearest lover, To fully enjoy Your glorious life, Drink fully of Your passionate, Romantic, rainbow like love! Hallelujah! Hallelujah! Your fantastic dream of stunning love From eternity has now come true! O' the upward journey Of this love life with You Is so charming, scenic, like a dream! O how sweet to walk with You in deep love! This carpet of love, paved with pink petals, And the river of love that You drink with me, Will have no end, increasing in glory, Bliss and sweetness forever!

SongPage.Title: 65 Eternal Commitment
SongPage.Context:
1. Dearest Lord, my Beloved, You have left heav'n's glories; For me You came from heav'n to the earth; For love, You longed to be a Man; Fully committed Yourself! Your love warms and heals my heart.
2. God's beloved Son, O' my Beloved, You came down from heav'n high; O Godhood united with manhood! Born in manger; died on the cross! Love that dared death gains my heart! How sweet to live in Your love.
3. Dearest Lord, my Beloved, Your love dream has come true! Now I am Your love forever! Forever You dwell in my heart! I am Yours and You are mine! O' sweet love's eternity!

SongPage.Title: 67 My Lover in the Glory
SongPage.Context: In the glory my Lover, My best Friend holds all authority! He's the beloved Son of God, My glorious Savior. For me, He came down to the earth As a man forever. He loved me so much that He gave Himself On the cruel cross for me, But He has risen from the dead And ascended to heaven! Wow! One day, from the glory, He will come back To take me to His most wonderful home. Now in heav'n, He lives for me; From morning to night He's thinking of me; I belong to Him; His desire is toward me! His fairest heart and strong arms all are mine! O' I love Him! He's my treasure and portion Incomparable!

SongPage.Title: 69 The Union of Love
SongPage.Context: In this whole universe, There is no higher love, There's no deeper union, Now I'm joined to You as one! I am amazed at Your desire and love, From eternity, forever outflows. It is Your heart's deepest hidden secret, Thrilled am I! Lord, Your sweet dream of love Has gloriously fulfilled, I'm joined with You in love; Forev'r You dwell in my heart! Daily let me live close to You in love, Fore'er live in the bright beautiful spring! It's most precious I am Your dearest lover, O' how sweet! Your desire is for me, And I love You dearly; I long to know You more; Daily live in Your rich love!

SongPage.Title: 71 The Lord's Secret: His Desire is toward Me
SongPage.Context:
1. From eternity past You thought of me; Your precious thoughts of love Outnumber the sands. You have designed my life Up to eternity. O' Your desire of love is toward me!
2. You knew Your life's journey paved with much suffering, From manger to the cross, full of trials and pain; But You longed to come down and love to be a Man, To ever be like me and close to me.
3. When You faced the cruel cross, You thought of me; After You have risen, You thought of me; Now in glorious heaven, all day You think of me; You really long for me! Your heart is mine!
4. One day You come for me! My joy overflows! The wedding feast of love dissolves my heart. In the presence of all You show Your love for me, O' Your desire of love is toward me!

SongPage.Title: 73 I have Stolen My Lord's Heart
SongPage.Context:
1. I have stolen my Lord's heart, Day and night He thinks of me; His thoughts of love toward me Outnumber the sands or stars.
2. I have stolen my Lord's heart, He'll gaze on me forever; He sets His love fore'er on me, His love draws me close to Him.
3. I have stolen my Lord's heart, He shouts for joy over me, His smile is so bright and warm, His love captures my heart.

SongPage.Title: 74 Love like a Rainbow
SongPage.Context: It's so precious! You are my beloved! You have fully committed Yourself; You confirm it with Your precious blood, It really deeply touches my heart. Your love is stronger than death, And forever the same. Now You and I are most deeply united. The love's covenant is forever sure. Your love is like a rainbow! Colorful, beautiful, So tender, so bountiful, So unique and personal; from morn to dusk, You're gazing on me, thinking of me! Longing for me, embracing me! Help me to have the bravest faith, And a dancing spirit, To echo Your matchless touching love, And set my love on You!

SongPage.Title: 76 Manifold Love
SongPage.Context:
1. Manifold love abides in You, How beautiful! Your heart! Your affection so deep, so sure, Sealed with Your precious blood! Love's union, Love's commitment Will endure forever. One day with You, sit on the throne! Fore'er I'll sing and praise.
2. Now I live in river of love; The bliss I can't express! I long to go to all kingdoms, To praise Your matchless love. My spirit, soul and body Respond with love to You. To wait for You, steadfast I'll be, With faith march on with You.

SongPage.Title: 78 Who Affect the Lord the Most
SongPage.Context: I am amazed! I affect You so much! For me, You came from heaven to the earth; You love to be a Man forever, Gladly gave Yourself for me on the cross! You love is overwhelming! Melts and captures my heart. You want to have the deepest union with me, And live with me forever more. You are self sufficient, infinite, o'erflowing, Because of love You need me most! You long to see my face and hear my voice; You lead me to Your fair inner chambers, To enjoy love's interflow. May I live in freedom and joy As Your darling and friend! Daily lean on Your bosom of love, My heart ever close to You!

SongPage.Title: 80 Wholehearted Love
SongPage.Context: It's so precious! I am Your perfect one; I'm Your treasure, Your dearest only one. You love me with Your whole heart and mind; You have set Your love on me forever! In Your admiring eyes, I'm fair, without a flaw. I have captured Your heart; You love to think of me, You leap for joy and sing o'er me. I am Your living spring, A garden fountain. Gladden Your heart, give You great joy. O north wind, o south wind, blows on my heart, Spreads its fragrance of love to delight You. In love with You, like a sweet dream! May my whole life and eternity Live with You in deep love, Living out the "Love Song" with You, Enthralled in the joy of our love!

SongPage.Title: 82 The Bleeding Heart
SongPage.Context:
1. In this world, none can compare; Forever, none can exchange. The Lord's my beloved; I am His darling. This love song shall be sung fore'er. Before time, He thought of me. Full of hope, He created me To be most like Him, be closest to Him. Be in love with Him and share His all.
2. Who knows how high heaven is? He loves me high'r than the sky! From heaven to earth, From His birth to death, He loved me, gave Himself for me. To seek me, He suffered much. To save me, He passed through death. The Lord has opened His bleeding heart to me, His infinite love towards me.

SongPage.Title: 84 Manifold Evidence
SongPage.Context: C 3/4 4/4 The heavens and earth tell me Your love. Your letter of love shows me Your love. Your journey on earth proves me Your love. Your precious blood is the proof that shakes the world. Now and e-ver You live in me, Commit Yourself to af-firm Your love to me. My past jour-ney full of Your grace. All show Your love so ten-der, steadfast to me. O' my Be-loved, for-e'er I'm Yours. Tru-ly, Your heart, Your arms, Your love, Your strength, Your life For-e-ver be-long to me.

SongPage.Title: 86 What I have Gained is so Beautiful
SongPage.Context: What I have gained is so beautiful, More than I can ever dream of, More than I can obtain in this world; I cannot exchange it with anything. Your affection has shown. You have gladly bestowed So that I may know What I have gained is so beautiful, More than all the things You have made. The sky is clear and blue. The clouds tell your message, Much more is Your personal love. You partake in my life, Light up all my days. What I have gained is so beautiful. I am no longer a slave to sin, But my heavenly Father's dear child, And You walk with me in this life journey Through suff'ring to glory. Understand Your heart, Your desire for me, Enjoy the abode with You and the Father, All these make me dance with cheer. What I have gained is so beautiful. One day I'll live in the heav'nly place; All tears, sorrows will pass away. Every day I can see You face to face, Live in eternal sweetness and grace. O' Lord, having You, all are so beautiful!

SongPage.Title: 89 My Warm Dwelling Place
SongPage.Context:
1. In the universe, my heart finds no resting place Only You are my eternal rest. In the universe, to whom can I give my love? Only You're my secure resting place. You are my warm dwelling place. How blessed! We are united! Fore'er we're in the river of love.
2. Apart from You whom do I have in heaven? Only You worth my heart and worship. Apart from You I have no desire on earth. Only Your love captures my heart. You are my warm dwelling place, My eternal resting place, You are my glorious Beloved.

SongPage.Title: 90 Love Getting Deeper and Deeper
SongPage.Context: D 4/4 1. I en-joyed Your love from my youth And now what should I fear? Our relationship is long and deep. You know how to treat Your friend. When You kiss me I for-get the world. Enjoy in Your bo-som of love, Em-brace in ri-ver of love. ? 2. Day by day our friendship grows deep. Now is even better. Your love paved my past journey. All suff'ring is sweet to me. Your love is the same. Now I know it more. Your love and desire ever fresh. Union with You is so sweet.

SongPage.Title: 92 You have Prepared
SongPage.Context: Before I realized it, You had prepared all, Such as the heavens and the earth And the fullness of them all, Such as Your love journey and salvation. Never knew I could ask for Your help, Lord, You have come. My daily bread; clothes for all seasons. In the days I faced endless toils and ceaseless waves, By the Sea of Tiberias, Labouring all night, being hungry and weary, When I was pondering under the fig tree You have come. When I fail and lose hope, surely You and Your help Will come faster to me. O' Lord, You're my Brother. You will take care of me, You will defeat my enemies, You will ease my troubles, lead me in this life journey. O' Lord, I count on You.

SongPage.Title: 94 Only Jesus
SongPage.Context:
Do you know where I can find true smiles? Where does true love hide? Come and go, we live and die, Wand'ring for a thousand miles. Who is willing to share with a true heart, My laughter and tears? Who can lead me to the right path, That I may not spoil my years?
Chorus; Only Jesus! Only Jesus! He is the light of man. He lights up my life journey, Gives me warmth and glorious hope. He walks with me, He dries my tears, Gives me abundant life; Brilliant forever! (Repeat chorus) Brilliant forever!

SongPage.Title: 96 The Faith of a Conqueror
SongPage.Context:
1. My Lord is risen! He has conquered all. He's overcome pain and death, Overcome the world, defeated Satan; Destroyed the power of sin. Ha! Ha! Ha! He's risen. He lives forever more. Ha! Ha! Ha! My Lord Has gained vic'try forever!
2. Who shall sep'rate us from the love of Christ? Shall tribulation, distress, Or persecution? Or nakedness, Or famine, peril or sword? Neither death, nor life, angels, principalities, Can ever sep'rate us from the love of God?
3. Whether gain or loss, whether right or wrong, Whether abound or in want, Whether height or depth, in strength or weakness, Whatever I encounter, I can do all things through Christ who strengthens me. I firmly believe His grace sufficient for me!
4. O' brothers, arise! O' sisters, be strong! Never mind all the scars. Forget things behind and march forward. Triumph o'er trials of life. "He who overcomes, I will make him a pillar In My God's temple, enthrone with Me forever!"

SongPage.Title: 98 Psalm 103
SongPage.Context:
1.Bless the Lord, O my soul, bless the Lord! And all that's within me, bless His holy name. Bless the Lord, O my soul, bless the Lord. And forget none of His benefits. He pardons all your transgressions And heals all your diseases. He redeems your life from death, And crowns you with love and mercies. He satisfies you with good things, So that your youth is renewed like the eagle's
2.The Lord is merciful and gracious, Slow to anger, abounding in mercy. He won't always strive, nor be angry fore'er. He hasn't dealt with us due to our sins. As the heavens are high above, As the heavens are high above, So great is His lovingkindness To those who, those who fear Him. As far as the east's from the west, So far has He removed our transgressions from us. As a father pities his children, So the Lord pities those who fear Him. His lovingkindness on those who fear Him. Is from everlasting to everlasting.

SongPage.Title: 100 A Day of Glory and Sweetness
SongPage.Context: One day, there's no more suffering and enemies; One day, there's no more tears and dark valley; One day, there's no more darkness and clouded day, No more bleak cold winter. There's only cloudless morning, Eternal beautiful spring. One day, no more sorrow, heart break and death, There's only sweetness eternally. Every where's full of life and warmth, Flooding with love, joy and song. One day I shall see You face to face; Forever I live in the depth of Your heart, Drinking, enjoying Your endless love. Enjoy with Your love's eternity! Glory upon glory to all eternity!

SongPage.Title: 102 The Glorious Vision of New Jerusalem
SongPage.Context:
1. New Jerusalem! This most glorious vision Captures my heart, is my dream, drive and joy! O sweetest union! The Lord is my Beloved! This love fully satisfies my heart. I'm God's dearest, born of Him; He is my dearest Abba; This highest love satisfies my heart.
2. New Jerusalem is God's tabernacle And our fairest eternal sweet home! Its wall is jasper, with precious stone as its base, The gates are pearls, the street is pure gold; There the river of life flows, pure and clear as crystal, The banks blooming with the trees of life.
3. New Jerusalem is God's tabernacle! 'Tis His eternal, sweet resting place, And our fairest, warmest heavenly home! God, man in love, fully satisfied! Enthralled in oneness with God and with one another, Love and joy forever overflow!
4. New Jerusalem is the bride of the Lamb, His love's masterpiece shines forth forever. The union of love between Christ and the church Is most moving! All will call us blessed! Sit with the Lord on the throne, glory fore'er increasing, O' most colorful eternity!
5. My Abba wants me to be His most glorious child, To inherit all with His Beloved Son! I'm His dearest child, His dream, joy and glory! His infinite love is my sweet rest. Father and son's mutual love satisfies His heart and mine, (The love of Father and son) Fore'er we'll wonder at His love plan!

SongPage.Title: 104 My True Abba
SongPage.Context: Abba, You are more real than all things. You are ever overflowing. You and I are fore'er united. I am Yours. You are mine. Because of Your love, Abba, You need me most. Now and fore'er You hold my hand, Enjoy the deepest love.

SongPage.Title: 105 Wonderful Miracle
SongPage.Context:
G 6/4 1. O' 'tis God's greatest mi-ra-cle! Al-migh-ty mi-ra-cle! I have become the true child of God; Born of Him, He's my Ab-ba! Who can describe my bliss!
2. I can enjoy the Father's love Toward His beloved Son, And the Father's deepest affection! Let me sing and dance with joy, Have the heart of a child.
3. My heart is free, delight'd and sweet- I can cry out, "Abba!" In His bosom I'm delight'd and warm. Joyfully I work with Him, To build Abba's household. (One day I'll see His face.)

SongPage.Title: 106 My Wonderful Abba
SongPage.Context: Cm 3/4 The Cre-a-tor of the u-ni-verse, The most high God who rules all things, Who is and who was and who is to come, Is my dear-est Ab-ba. I am the je-wel of His heart, Cre-a-ted in His own im-age. I am born of Him, I am born of Him; I am His dear-est child.

SongPage.Title: 107 You Love to be on My Neck
SongPage.Context:
1. Created in God's image, I was born of His Spirit; His seed abides in my heart. He's my Abba forever! ( I am His child, His delight! )
2. You love to be on my neck! Kissing me, You feel so sweet! You need me on Your bosom; Long to embrace forever.

SongPage.Title: 108 Born To Be Dearest
SongPage.Context:
F 4/4 1. I trea-sure Your beau-ti-ful heart, Ab-ba. I am more than Your best cre-at-ion; I'm born of You! Dear-est, close-st to You. I en-joy with the Lord Deepest love, highest af-fect-ion of Yours.
2. Now I can inherit all with the Lord. He is not ashamed to call me brethren, Because I was born of You, born of You. I am dearest to You. My Abba, Your work is so wonderful. (My Abba, Your work satisfies my heart.)
3. My Abba, I treasure Your wondrous work. Your seed forever abides in me. So I can bear pleasant fruit for You - Infinitely glorious! Shining ever brighter till perfect day.
4. I treasure Your beautiful heart, Abba - Eternal love thoughts, deepest affection, Full attention, love from the beginning. Your thoughts exceeding all stars, Gaze of love and Your delight towards me.
5. Every day joyfully I go to You, Run to Your open arms, bosom of love. Sweetly I taste this deepest affection, Most beautiful, highest love. Leaping with joy, I embrace You.

SongPage.Title: 110 This Deepest Affection Is True!!
SongPage.Context:
D4/4 1. It's most precious I am born of You. Your seed a-bides in me. Your life and my life for-e-ver u-nit-ed! I am Your bo-som dear child.
2. Father, You have numbered my hair. Your love thoughts are more than stars. Over me, You shout for joy and dance! O' what a father I have.
3. Father, You have committed Yourself, Forever I affect You! Your calling is so glorious. Your love plan is beautiful.
4. You are the only normal Abba. Nothing can compare Your love. Father-son affection satisfies our hearts! (Abba and me) For this affection is true!!

SongPage.Title: 112 The Father's Passionate Love
SongPage.Context: Abba, since eternity You have thought of me. Your great love was fully revealed on the cross. You indeed suffered the deepest pain for me. On the cross You forsook Your begotten Son. You opened a way; I can go to Your bosom. You love to be on my neck. You are overjoyed for me. Abba, I treasure so much that You need me most, And Your passion to me, Your fatherly love.

SongPage.Title: 113 Daily Fireworks
SongPage.Context:
1. I think of the vast universe, all stars, Your greatness, power and infinite glory, You've named heavenly stars many as seashore. Heavens show Your way and speak of Your glory. How great and holy! Who can compare with You? Glorious! Beautiful! You're the endless fountain! Daily You light fireworks, cause all stars to dance, Celebrate our union, Your love dream's come true.
2. Abba, it is precious I see Your glory. How blessed and glorious to be Your dear child. You've prepared a playground for all of Your sons. Reign with You fore'er, Your sovereignty'll increase. How great and holy! My Abba's glorious! Glorious! Beautiful! My Abba's joyous heart! Daily You light fireworks, cause all stars to dance, Celebrate our joy and the deep affection.

SongPage.Title: 115 Gaze Of Love And Joy
SongPage.Context: D3/4, 4/4 Ab-ba, Your gaze of af-fect-ion, Love and joy, ad-mi-rat-ion Has drawn my heart, made me re-joice, Gaze on You. (Fly to You.) Your fervent love, passion, em-brace Are my joy, delight and rest For-e-ver.

SongPage.Title: 116 The Flame of Jehovah
SongPage.Context: It's so precious! You are my Beloved! Your love is so passionate, romantic! Set me as a seal up-on Your heart, As a seal up-on Your arm, O' Lord! For love is strong as death! For love is strong as death! Jealousy is cruel as Sheol, as cruel as Sheol, The flashes thereof are flashes of fire. A very flame of Jehovah! A very flame of Jehovah! Many waters can not quench love, Neither can floods drown it. If a man would give all the substance Of his house for love, it would utterly Be contemned, be contemned. Now You and I united forever! Your dream of love comes true. O' let me drink fully of Your love; Enthralled in embrace and praise, And set my love on You!

SongPage.Title: 118 Your Love Dream- To Live In My Heart
SongPage.Context:
G3/4 1. O' Lord, You are more real than all things. You're in-fi-nite, e-ver o'er-flowing. You and I are deeply u-nit-ed. One spi-rit, heart to heart. For Your end-less love, O' Lord, You need me most. Your dream of love to live in my heart, Live with me day and night. (Live a love life with me.)
2. O' Lord, You are more real than all things. You're infinite, overflow with life. You and I are deeply united. I've Your precious presence. (It is so warm and sweet) For Your endless love, O' Lord, You need me most. Hand in hand we walk this path of love. Fore'er we fall in love.

SongPage.Title: 120 The Lord's Personal Love And Affection To Me
SongPage.Context:
Bb 3/4 4/4 1. His per-son-al love to me Is from e-ter-ni-ty past. Which made Him long to be a Man, To be like me, clos-est to me, Des-pise all shame, en-dure the cross, To u-nite with me for-e-ver.
2. His personal love to me Is wholehearted, committed, Full of passion, warmth and romance. It's the flame of Jehovah, It's the love from the beginning. I'm enthralled in this great love.
3. His personal love to me Is the secret in His heart, His eternal sweet dream of love, His joy ahead on the cross, His desire and flames of love. He embraces me to His heart.

SongPage.Title: 122 What A Glorious Beloved
SongPage.Context: D4/4 I have such a glorious Be-loved. He is the Son of the Most High God. He's so gen-tle, hum-ble, friendly, Per-fect, a-do-ra-ble. He once calmed the rag-ing wa-ter. He cast a-way Satan's po-wer. He up-holds all things; He raised the dead. He healed the sick and He filled the hunger. O'He's God and the Son of Man. He died but He rose a-gain. He died for me to bear my sins, And to-day He lives in my heart!

SongPage.Title: 124 You in My Life
SongPage.Context:
1. You in my life, I'm no longer lonely or afraid. You in my life, I rejoice, overflow with hope. Your love compels me, it is my sweet rest. Your heart, Your arms are mine. My heart is Yours. March on with You. We fight and dance, Accomplish Your will, await Your coming.
2. You in my life it's so blessed, warm and beautiful. With You I can use problems and challenge all things. You are my life, giving me the drive. We'll finish Your glorious commission with joy. We're hand in hand, with love interflows, To fight the battle, accomplish Your will.

SongPage.Title: 126 My Intimate Friend
SongPage.Context: What a Friend I have in You, Faithful and true. If men are faithless, Your love is always sure. Whenever I need You, You give Your hand to carry me through. Even men do wrongs to You, The wounds You still can endure. Your love makes me lift my head. Your grace makes me walk ahead. Having such a Friend like You, All my life I'm content. You accompany me to the end, Never leave me, my intimate Friend.

SongPage.Title: 128 Eternal Dance of Love
SongPage.Context:
1. My Abba stretches out His hand, Invites me gladly to join Him and the Lord and the Spirit In Their eternal dance of love. Such love who can fathom, Such joy who can describe, Enter into God's circle of love, My bliss and joy overflow.
2. Daily from morning to night, Abba, the Lord and the Spirit Abide with me and surround me; They walk, work and dance with me. They share Their all with me; Enter deep into my life. Live in such warm and deep fellowship, They are my life and sweet portion.

SongPage.Title: 130 Emmanuel - God Is Forever Man
SongPage.Context:
C4/4 1. Lord, You did know You would suffer much on the earth. Lord, You did know You'd be nailed on the cross. My glorious Lord, You never had a sin-gle doubt. For love You longed to be a Man fore'er. O' my dear Lord, it's so precious You have come. Fore'er a Man, that deeply comforts my heart. You take a-way all my fears and dis-tance. You want to be the closest, closest to me. (O' Lord, now and for-e-ver You dwell in my heart.)
2. Fore'er a Man, You make me know my own value And my precious position in Your heart. O' Lord, You came. It shook the heavens and the earth, And the angels are forever amazed. O' my dear Lord, it's so precious You have come. You have decid'd to commit Yourself fore'er. Such fervent love comforts my heart and gives me warmth. May I enjoy Your presence now and forever. Emmanuel, You're worthy of my love fore'er.

SongPage.Title: 132 Such Great Love
SongPage.Context:
1. You became flesh, dwelt among men, Full of grace and full of truth. You came from heaven to seek me, And to give me hope. You had no place to lay Your head. You suffered much pain and grief. To fully sympathize with me, You offered Yourself.
Chorus: Such love as Yours ?so wide and deep; It will always stay the same ?everlasting! I can't measure this great love. My heart is amazed. You deserve my love.
2. Nailed on the cross, God forsaken, Who could understand Your pain? Hands, feet were nailed, and blood was shed; You gave up Your all. In that while I was a sinner, Christ gave His life for me; God shows His own love toward me O' such love as yours!

SongPage.Title: 134 What You and I Treasure
SongPage.Context:
1. On the bitter cross You thought of me; You saw the joy and sweetness ahead, And You despised the shame and the cross, That I may rest on Your bosom so sweet!
2. When You sweetly think: You've died for me, And on the cross, You drank the bitter cup; Your heart is filled with o'erflowing joy, For You treasure that You have died for me.
3. I so treasure that I can love You, And that I can live and suffer for You. It is my joy to echo Your love, Weaving many sweet eternal memories.

SongPage.Title: 135 What the Lord Treasures
SongPage.Context:
1. The Lord longs to see my face. One thing I will seek. I need to choose the good part Face to face with my dear Lord. There're indeed trials on earth But in Him I have peace. With the Lord, my heart can rest, For He has overcome all.
Chorus O' Lord, I love You. Draw me close to You. Make me the closest to You, respond to Your love.
2. There're indeed trials on earth; My Lord'll carry me through. He is moved with compassion. His love can heal me. All things happen for my good Cause me to know Him more. His love, wisdom, power, His heart and arms are mine.
3. He loved me and died for me. His true love I cherish. For the Lord I'll break my flask Offer my perfume for Him. (Respond to Him in this life.) He treasures what Mary did. He missed Bethany. He desires my heart for Him, For He yearns for my love most.

SongPage.Title: 137 His Love's Purpose
SongPage.Context:
1. He died for us! He died for us, That we can be forgiven, That we may be set free from sin, That we may enter heaven.
2. He died for us! He died for us, To remove all barriers of sin; Fore'er the veil was torn in two; I dwell in my Abba's bosom.
3. He died for me! He died for me, To cleanse we whiter than the snow, So that I can unite with Him, And that He may dwell in my heart.
4. He died for us! He died for us, That whether we wake or sleep, We should live together with Him, We should live together with Him. (stanza 4 ?ref: 1 Thes 5:10)

SongPage.Title: 138 One More Time, One More Time
SongPage.Context:
1. Love again, trust again, let's shout for joy. Pray again, do again, give again, Hope and rejoice again, more passion, Sing and worship again, fly on high. (Once again!)
2. One more time, One more time, more abundant, One more time, One more time, love Him more. One more time, One more time, become glorious. One more time, One more time, be like Him. (One more time)
3. For the Lord, for the Church, I will strive on. Joyfully and bravely I march on. Lift my head, I am of good courage. Trusting Him, we'll finish His work. (Unstoppable!)
4. Raise my hand, lift my head, clap hands and shout. We march on forward with joy. Overflowing with hope, we sing along. We press toward the goal with gladness. (Long to see the Lord's face in the clouds!) (Hallelujah! Clap hands!)

SongPage.Title: 140 It's the Lord, the Author and Finisher, Who Commissioned Us
SongPage.Context:
1. It's so precious the glorious Lord Commissioned us in the age! Your grace is sufficient for me, You'll grant me the Holy Spirit! You'll be with us! You'll cowork with us, Followed with Your miracles. Revive Your work, accomplish Your will. There will be a glorious bride waiting for You!
2. You in my life, my hope overflows, I fear no valleys, floods or fires. You are my Beloved and Shepherd, You've fully committed Yourself; You are the First, You are the Last, You'll take care until the end. O Lord, I love You, deeply love Your Church. Faithfully I'll follow You till the end. (May Your bride love You and welcome Your coming!)

SongPage.Title: 142 Strive for the Lord till the End
SongPage.Context:
1. O' let us rejoice in God, Walk the everlasting way, Bring forth a lasting revival, Accomplish God's glorious will. Daily practice godliness, Live to Him from morn to night. Glory and joy ever increasing, Offer aroma of love.
2. Never stray from the right way, Pressing on towards the goal. Ne'er deny the heavenly vision. Finish the last beautiful race. Let us all arise, Strive for Him till the end. Be faithful to the Lord unto death, Till we meet Him in the clouds.
"I will strive for the Lord till the end!"

SongPage.Title: 144 The Long March of Love - The One-Time Marathon
SongPage.Context: It's so precious, You and I joined in love! Fore'er, You have committed Yourself. Fully You share Your life with my life, What a joy to live with You through the day. You are my life, You change me From glory to glory; From year to year our love grows deep more and more. Live side by side, we fight and dance. This glorious marathon, full of sweet memories, I treasure this unique journey! Burning love drives me to march with You. Let me be true to You, strive to the end Toward the goal, for life, I race. How You treasure my love to You Through all battles and pain, I treasure that I can live for You On earth, give my love to You.

SongPage.Title: 146 O' Lord, Thank You
SongPage.Context:
You've Brought Me to Vancouver
1. O' Lord, Thank You You've brought Me to Vancouver. You know deeply what are my needs. Under the blue sky, You appear to me, That heals, encourages me. Your love lights up my heart, Makes me smile in darkness and storms. We have love interflow in the white snow, Leaving Your footprints and mine.
2. O' Lord thank You You've brought me to Vancouver. You know deeply what are my needs. You long for me to enter Your love, desire, And the secret of Your heart. You want me to lay down all, To have sweet rest in Your love. You renew my strength, I'll mount up with wings, Go from glory to glory.

SongPage.Title: 148 He Walks with Me through Valleys to the Land of Abundance
SongPage.Context:
Eb 4/4 1. My dear Lord holds my hand To walk on this glorious ma-ra-thon. He is faithful in His commission. Step by step, He leads me to His heart.
2. My dear Lord holds my hand To walk on this warm and joyful path. This path of love paved with pink petals - O' how sweet, my heart is satisfied.
3. He holds me tight to pass through Floods and fires, slanders, long dark valleys. Abundant feast He lays for me. He leads me to the abundant land.
4. Long, dark valleys are over! He's brought forth lasting revival. He will stretch out His mighty right hand To finish His most beautiful will! (A glorious bride to welcome Him back!) Hallelujah!

SongPage.Title: 149 Living in God's Circle of Love
SongPage.Context: G 4/4 The e-ter-nal dance of Ab-ba, the Lord, And the Spi-rit ?sweet, full of love. They in-vite me and long for me to join Their e-ter-nal dance of love. I'm so blessed to take part in this, To be em-braced by Them all. Dai-ly You light fireworks, cause all stars to dance, Ce-le-brate our deep-est love. (Join in our e-ter-nal dance.)

SongPage.Title: 150 Living in the Embrace of Abba, the Lord and the Holy Spirit
SongPage.Context: Eb 3/4,4/4 Ab-ba, the Lord, the Spi-rit Day and night em-brace me. I'm sur-round'd by Ab-ba With His deep af-fect-ion; Embraced by the Lord With His ro-man-tic love; And the Spi-rit bore me and car-ries me With ten-der love. I'm so blessed, I can take part in Their E-ter-nal dance, en-joy deep-est u-nion. We sing and dance for-e'er.

SongPage.Title: 151 The Utmost of My Abba
SongPage.Context: D 3/4 From e-ter-ni-ty past when there's no be-gin-ning To e-ter-ni-ty which has no end, You're thinking a-bout me, You've gi-ven me the best: You gave me Your on-ly be-loved Son. You e-ven for-sook Him on the cross. You once suffered the great-est pain. Your heart was pierced through with ma-ny ar-rows I en-ter the ho-ly place. You want me to en-ter the depth of Your heart; In one spirit I am joined with You I am Your dear-est one, You love me as the Lord. I en-joy Your high-est Father's love. Now I taste Your deep-est af-fect-ion. I'm born of You, dear-est to You. I am most glo-rious, the most blessed one. You want me to be like the Lord. Ab-ba, You're o-verwhelmed with joy for me Because You've gained what You have long de-sired. Out of Your boundless love You real-ly need me most. You tru-ly need me the most. Your love is wholeheart-ed, com-mit-ted. Be-cause You are in-fi-nite, Your love to me is the most per-son-al. I give thanks to You, my Ab-ba. I tru-ly af-fect You the most!

SongPage.Title: 154 The Eternal Love, the Deepest Affection and the Happy Family
SongPage.Context: Bb 2/4,3/4,4/4 You loved me most from e-ter-ni-ty past. You pre-des-tined me to be Your child. You longed to be my dear-est Ab-ba. You love me as Your on-ly be-got-ten. I am Your dear-est trea-sure. You gave me to Your Son. I'm Your great-est de-light. For me, You dance and sing. All ce-le-brate, and sing a-loud, "Your love dream has come true. Your lost son has come home To en-joy Your deep af-fect-ion." My Abba, I trea-sure this af-fect-ion. We're close-ly u-nit-ed in one spi-rit. You hold my hand, walk to glo-ry. May I live in free-dom and joy As Your dear-est child. Dai-ly en-joy fa-mi-ly life with You. My heart's e-ver close to You. You and I, heart to heart, walk towards The glo-rious e-ter-ni-ty.

SongPage.Title: 156 The Heart of My Dear Abba
SongPage.Context: Bb 2/4, 3/4, 4/4 Out of His love, Abba needs me most. It is His joy to kiss me, embrace me. My smi-ling face is His great de-light. For me He sings and danc-es, shouts for joy. We en-joy this af-fect-ion And our hearts feel so warm. The past journey, sweet me-mo-ries, He trea-sures. Seeing the fu-ture, we leap for joy.
