We're close-ly u-nit-ed, Hand in hand walk for-ward To glo-ry. It is so sweet. The glor-y and grace Ab-ba saves for me Are pre-cious and great as the bound-less sea. Their height and depth can't be mea-sured. How blessed it is ?He is my dear Ab-ba! This deep-est af-fect-ion Sa-tis-fies His heart and mine. Long to embrace for-e-ver!

SongPage.Title: 158 The Father's Affection
SongPage.Context:
C 2/4,3/4 1. Such af-fect-ion is my trea-sure of the u-ni-verse. Unsearch-a-ble! It's the great-est mi-ra-cle of God. I'm God's cre-a-tion, yet I'm born of Him. His life and my life are close-ly u-nit-ed. The boundless God is my Ab-ba, I am His dear-est child.
2. Such affection is the treasure of Abba and mine. Fatherly love is what He and I treasure most. For His great love He needs me most. He enjoys embracing me and kissing me. In Your bosom, closely we walk Upward journey of love. Now and ever Abba and I Walk on the path of love.

SongPage.Title: 160 The Deepest Affection
SongPage.Context: Bb 2/4,3/4,4/4 It's so pre-cious You are my dear Ab-ba. I am Your dear-est child, dear-est child. What we treasure most is this deep af-fect-ion, We enjoy this af-fect-ion for-e-ver. Sweet-ly You and I em-brace In the high-est love. 'Tis Your sweet dream of love through all E-ter-ni-ty Bring forth the most won-der-ful plan. For You, I was cre-at'd, Born a-gain. I'm for You. Your love, Your heart - reserved for me. How glorious! Your love dream has now come true! I am in Your bo-som, Your be-loved one, And I'm joint heir with Christ. With my dear Lord, I in-he-rit all, Sit with You on the throne! You love me as You love the Lord! It's my e-ter-nal sweet rest!

SongPage.Title: 162 Rest and Rejoice in Your Bosom
SongPage.Context:
G 4/4 1. I'm the dear-est one in Your bosom. You love me as You love the Lord. My beau-ti-ful smile glad-dens Your heart. Ev-ery mo-ment You treasure. My Ab-ba, You en-joy lov-ing me. Your hand holds my lit-tle hand. My heart's content in this af-fection and love, Rest 'n rejoice in Your bo-som.
2. Day and night You long to see my face. You love to hear my sweet voice. Abba, my joy is also Your joy. You want me to enjoy all. You meet me with Your love and Your smile. Your gentleness makes me great. You desire to give me infinite blessings, Bring me into glory.
3. Abba, I treasure this deep affection And You are my dear Abba. Calling You "Abba" makes my heart feel sweet. Your bosom is my rest. This affection ?precious, warm and sweet. You make all stars dance with You. I rejoice in Your circle of love, And eternal dance of love. (Dance of the Royal family!)
Daily You light fireworks, cause all stars to dance, Celebrate our union! (Join in our eternal dance!)

SongPage.Title: 164 Living in the Father's Delight
SongPage.Context:
C4/4 1. You sent Your Son to be a Man, To die for me on the cross, So I can live in Your bo-som. Now I know You de-light in me.
2. The veil was torn, and You dashed out, Embraced me to Your heart. You kissed me, rejoiced for me. Now I know You delight in me.
3. Abba Father, You have inscribed My name fore'er on Your palm. I am Your beloved son. Now I know You delight in me.
4. You meet me with Your mercy. You help me with Your count'nace. Your thoughts for me exceed the stars. Now I know You delight in me.
5. You gave me to Your beloved Son As Your most precious gift. I am the Lord's dearest darling. Now I know You delight in me.

SongPage.Title: 166 His Attention of Love
SongPage.Context:
Bb 6/8 1. Day and night my Ab-ba sur-rounds me. He lays His hand on me. From young to old He car-ries me, Holds me on His lap. His thoughts of love to me Are so precious, are so ten-der, More than the stars and the sand. O' He is my dear Ab-ba! (I'm so blessed to have You/Him!)
2. My Abba is acquainted with My path and my lying down. When I smile, clap hands and shout for joy, Abba admires me. Day 'n night He thinks of me, Attends to me, knows me deeply. O' He shouts for joy for me. I am His delight and joy. (It's so precious I have You/Him!)
3. When I lift my head and raise my hand, Abba looks at me sweetly. When I think of Him and sing to Him, Abba's heart is ravished. Precious fatherly love! It is Your joy to embrace me. You are my dearest Abba. We walk hand in hand fore'er.

SongPage.Title: 168 Father Welcomes Me Home
SongPage.Context: Bb 4/4 Once I was lost, away from home, Wand'ring, grieving in sins. Abba sent His beloved Son To become a Man. He's forsaken by the Father. He drank the bitter cup. The Lord cried, "It's finished!" It is finished! Forever the veil is torn! I have a new, living way. I enter the Holy Place, See Abba face to face, behold His glory. He presses me deeply into His Heart. The lost son's come home. Let's celebrate!

SongPage.Title: 170 My Eternal Father
SongPage.Context:
C 4/4 1. Parents and friends may forsake me, You're my eternal Father! You're Father of the fatherless. Your eternal bosom is mine! You carry me forever!
2. Your big hand holds my little hand. I entrust my life to You. You will perfect all things for me. Abba, Your time must be the best.
3. Let me always enjoy with You This Father-son affection, Live in the depths of Your heart. Abba, Your heart is satisfied.

SongPage.Title: 172 I'm so Precious in Your Heart, O' Lord
SongPage.Context: I'm so precious in Your heart, O' Lord. You do not just call me Your friend. You want me to be Your darling. Forever and ever You desire me. For me You came from heav'n. You longed to be a Man. My florious Lord, You passed through death for me. You love me. You're willing To die for me. You were chastised and forsaken by God. You bore all shame for me and gave Your life. On the cross, You opened Your heart. Freely I live In Your deepest love.

SongPage.Title: 174 Your Love, Dream and Glory
SongPage.Context: Eb 3/4 4/4 You are fair-er than hea-ven, Be-yond com-pare on earth. All the stars in heaven And the flow-ers on earth Speak of Your glo-ry, Your beau-ty, dream and love. My heart treasures your journey of love. It warms my heart. Your de-sire, Your flames of love to me Is the myst'ry of this whole u-ni-verse. O' You are the Lamb who once was slain! Joyful young stag! You're worthy of my heart. O' You are a glo-ri-ous young stag! My true Beloved! We enjoy our u-nion.

SongPage.Title: 176 The Infinitely Glorious Lord is Most Deeply United with Me
SongPage.Context:
G 4/4 1. Je-hovah is Your name, You're "I am who I am". You are "who is and who was and who is to come", In-fin'te-ly glorious per-son. Your love is person-al. I love Your wonder-ful name. You're my greatest treasure.
2. You self-exist ?infinite, wonderful, glorious, Like a waterfall flowing; Your glory's above all. Thru' eternity I'll have surprising discov'ries. Your heart belongs to me. We're closely united. (We can embrace as one.) (Enthralled in love embrace.)

SongPage.Title: 177 The Unique, Self-existing, Infinite and Incomparable Lord
SongPage.Context:
G 4/4 1. You're boundless, self-ex-ist-ing. Your glory - I'm a-mazed. You're the on-ly ho-ly One, who can compare with You? On-ly You're always with me, love me with all Your heart. You always at-tend to me. Your love thoughts - more than stars.
2. Only You have desired me since eternity past. Your thoughts of love towards me - ever active and fresh. Your love is infinitely personal towards me. You make all things work together; Nothing can distract You.
3. Lord, Your love never changes, it's forever steadfast. I forever treasure Your desire towards me. Your joy and affection overflow like a fall. Your fervent, beautiful love Makes me desire, adore. (Draws my heart towards You.)

SongPage.Title: 178 Infinitely Personal Love
SongPage.Context:
Eb 3/4 1. Lord, You're the in-fi-nite God, at-tend ful-ly to me. Lord, Your beauti-ful love is the most person-al. O' Lord, I love You. You're my treasure. I cherish Your true love. It's beyond measure.
2. Infinitely personal is Your Love to me. Your wholehearted, committ'd love Draws me and captures my heart. O' Lord, I love You. You're my treasure. In heav'n, on earth there's no one who can compare to You.
(Lord, You desire me! You long for me. Your ever o'erflowing love how can I deny?)

SongPage.Title: 179 The Love of the Son of God
SongPage.Context: Eb 3/4 4/4 The love of the Son of God ? Is from e-ter-ni-ty past. I'm in His dream of love. I'm His se-cret of love! 'Tis the love of God! He's longed for this u-nion In one spi-rit, joined heart to heart as one, In love with Him! He and I walk on this path of love With pink pe-tals, in the r-iver of love. He is God! His love of true Beloved ? Beyond compare! Embrace me to His heart. (I rest in His bo-som.)

SongPage.Title: 180 The Deepest AFfection of the Son of God.
SongPage.Context:
His River of Joy (Melody: Who Affect the Lord the Most)
O' Lord, Your life, affection and joy Is like an ever rushing falls. Ever overflows, overwhelms my heart. Now I can drink from Your river of joy. Day'n night You attend to me, Gazing with Your longing. Your love's full of passion, romance and beauty. The very flame of Jehovah. Your reaction is like volcanic eruption. Your thoughts of love are more than stars. For me You shout for joy; You sing and dance. You delight in me, You desire me. You meet me with lovingkindness. You in my life, infinite bliss and joy. In the depth of Your heart, I enjoy living in love with You. I feel satisfied and warm. (My heart ever overflows.)

SongPage.Title: 182 To Live in Me
SongPage.Context:
Eb 4/4 1. To live in me is Your deepest de-sire. Facing the cross, You sweetly thought of this. The Spirit came, You glad-ly live in me. Sweetest u-nion ?You're with me for-e-ver.
2. To live in me is Your eternal dream. You creat'd me to be closest to You. Living union! My life's bound up in Yours. Union of love ?we're ever heart to heart. (Deepest union ?our hearts are satisfied.)
3. Now is better ?You're forever in me. Glory upon glory, You are my life. Deepest union surpasses all things. One day You'll come. I'll see you face to face.

SongPage.Title: 183 I'm for You, Your Heart is Reserved for Me
SongPage.Context: D 4/4 I ap-pear in Your love. I'll stay in Your love for-e-ver. I ex-ist be- cause of You. Your heart has long been re-served for me. I've been on Your mind E-ver since e-ter-ni-ty past. E-ter-ni-ty is ours - Re-joice in our em-brace of love. Walk on the path of end-less love. You have dreamed of me since eter-ni-ty past. For-e-ver we will live in love, The end-less dream!

SongPage.Title: 184 His Delight and Desire
SongPage.Context:
C 4/4 The song of songs re-veals Your heart, So I can en-joy Your heart. You lead me to in-ner chambers. Now I know You de-light in me.
2. I have captured Your heart and sight. I'm Your lily among thorns. Your banner o'er me is love. Now I know You delight in me.
3. Forever, Lord, You are a Man. You came leaping on mountains To see my face and hear my voice. Now I know You delight in me.
4. Abba prepares a wedding feast, Gives me to You as "beloved". I'm Your greatest treasure and joy. Now I know You delight in me.
5. You praise me, "You are all fair, No blemish, capture My heart." I satisfy You the most. Now I know You delight in me.
6. My eyes have overcome You. I've captured Your heart and sight. I'm Your only perfect one. Now I know You delight in me.
7. From feet to head You praise me I am Your delight and joy, Capture Your heart. You desire me. Now I know You delight in me
8. May we embrace forever. Your heart is reserved for me. I was creat'd to satisfy You. Now I know You delight in me
9. I'm set as a seal on Your heart, As a seal upon Your arm. The flames of love is strong as death. Now I know You delight in me

SongPage.Title: 187 Living in the Lord's Delight
SongPage.Context:
C4/4 1. You leaped with joy, came as a child. You saw the joy a-head, Despised all shame, endured the cross. Now I know You de-light in me.
2. Your personal love towards me Made You give Yourself for me. Your desire, Your flame of love, Now I know You delight in me.
3. Your eternal dream of love is To live fore'er in my heart. My heart is Your favourite dwelling. Now I know You delight in me.
4. How can I not respond to You? I long to love You only, Day and night draw near to You. O' Lord Jesus, may You come soon.

SongPage.Title: 188 Your Desire and Gazing Day and Night
SongPage.Context:
F4/4 1. Day and night, think of me, desire me, dear Lord, You al-ways at-tend to me. You long to see my face, hear my voice, dear Lord, Sweet-ly and close-ly live with me. Since e-ter-ni-ty You have loved me, dear Lord, Un-chang-ing, o'erflowing, e-ver fresh. Living in the depth of Your heart and embrace, I feel so sweet. My heart o'erflows.
2. Fully You involve Yourself in my life, Lord, Now and through all eternity. Forever live with You, in love with You, Lord, Nothing can compare my joy. Now I live in Your love and desire, dear Lord, My heart's satisfied, overflowing. With all my heart I'll respond to You, dear Lord. Forever we embrace in love.

SongPage.Title: 190 I am Your Sweet Heart
SongPage.Context:
D 3/4 1. I am Your hap-pi-ness. I am Your great de-light. I am the sweetness of Your heart. I am the dearest in Your heart.
2. I am Your great work. I am Your glory. I am Your model of love. I am the dearest in Your heart.
3. I think of You - You rejoice. I praise You - You enjoy. Your heart is sweetened by my songs. I'm in Your heart forever.

SongPage.Title: 191 How to Behold Hime - Your Most Real True Beloved
SongPage.Context:
G 4/4 1. My Lord is now in glo-ry and He is every-where. He is surrounding me and living in my heart. He is more real than all things, deep-ly unit'd with me. I have His special presence, the most blessed u-nion.
2. My Lord is now in glory and He is everywhere. He is surrounding me and living in my heart. His personal love to me is ever infinite. His wholehearted, commit'd love is warm and draws my heart.
3. We are ever united ?deepest, closest union. This love union's beautiful, romantic, colourful. My heart's warm, overflowing as we're on this love path. The love of my true Beloved fills my heart, heav'n and earth. (It's my rest. I'm content.)

SongPage.Title: 192 Daily You are before Me
SongPage.Context:
Eb 4/4 1. Search no more, for dai-ly You're before me, Close-ly, closely You look at me, hear me, With a big smile, full of delight and joy. You are ev-ery-where, Yet I have Your spe-cial presence.
2. There's not a moment You're not gazing at me. You surround me, fully commit Yourself. Unceasingly, we have love interflow. I'll be anchored in Your infinite, personal love.

SongPage.Title: 193 Rebuild David's Tabernacle
SongPage.Context: Cm 4/4 After this I will return, I will re-turn And I will build a-gain David's taber-na-cle, Which has fall-en down. I'll re-build its ruins And I will set it up.

SongPage.Title: 194 The Lord's Desire and Mine
SongPage.Context:
Ab 3/4,4/4 1. Fa-ther, I de-sire that they whom You have gi-ven me Be with Me where I am, be with Me where I am So that they may see My glory which You have given Me, For You loved Me be-fore the foundat-ion of the world. I de-sire to be in them, Be one spi-rit with them, Most deeply united, live with them day and night, En-joy the sweetest u-nion, Live in the ri-ver of love.
2. Father, I desire that wherever the Lord is I'll be with Him forever, with Him forever To see the Lord's glory which You have given to Him. For You loved me and the Lord before the world was. I treasure the Lord lives in me, I'm in the depth of His heart. Most deeply united, we are in one spirit, Enjoy the sweetest union.
(ref. John 17:24)

SongPage.Title: 196 That is the Day
SongPage.Context: Bb 4/4 That is the day, the wedding feast of the Lamb. That is the feast set by Abba, the core of His plan. That is the day of the glad-ness of His heart - The Lord waits ev-ery day. We are not in-vit-ed to the feast, but indeed We are the glorious bride of the Lamb, Com-pa-ti-ble to the Lord. He died for us - He used His blood And His true love to be-troth us. How joy-ous He is that He has gained my heart. And on that day my dear Lord'll come to hold my hand. Before all things He'll declare His heart is for-e-ver mine. We are al-ways the je-wel of His heart. His love is in our hearts. No one can e-ver set us a-part. For-e'er we are heart to heart. He has poured forth His high-est love. He won't turn back; to Him I be-long. We are in love for-e'er.

SongPage.Title: 1. MY EYES OF FAITH BEHOLD
SongPage.Context:
1. My eyes of faith behold The Lamb that's slain for me Covered with wounds! You suffered much for me, Longing my face to see; I should love You always, cherish Your face
2. My eyes of faith behold The risen, good Shepherd With mighty power! You're with me all my days, Through trials, floods and flames; I should live with courage and joy acclaim!
3. My eyes of faith behold My Beloved in glory With love and grace! You set me on Your heart, Think of me day and night. In Your bosom I stay, rest with delight.
4. My eyes of faith behold The Bridegroom coming soon Full of glory! You'll take me by Yourself To be with You always. Firmly, I'll watch and wait until that day!

SongPage.Title: 3. LOVE JOURNEY OF THE CROSS
SongPage.Context:
1. My Lord came down from heaven to the earth Humble as the Son of Man. A man of sorrows, acquainted with grief, Despised, forsaken of men. In all things was tempted to sympathize me; And faced all evil enemies. He trod a lonely path. Few did know His heart, And walked toward the cross for my part. Pain, sin, death, and Satan He faced these for me on the cross. He bore my sins and was Forsaken, chastened by God. He cried in victory, "It is finished, finished!" Sufferings and death He'd overcome for me, Hence to ravish all my heart.
2. The blood of Jesus washed away all my sins; Now I am whiter than snow. He cleansed my conscience, now that I cry out "Abba!" ?'Tis so warm and close!. One spirit with Lord, I'm united with Him; He will uphold me all my days. The Lord is my Beloved, my elder Brother, My Company till the end of age. When I trace the journey, My heart is melted by His love. My Lord's passion and grace, Move me to march on with faith. Gladly bear the cross with Him, Through suff'rings enter glory, Sing all the way, with gratitude in my heart, "O Lord, I long for You!"

SongPage.Title: 5. I AM REALLY RICH
SongPage.Context:
1. I am really rich, Almighty God is my Father; Jesus Christ has thousand names; To satisfy my every need; Holy Spirit abides in me, He is my helper forever; I have a warm, eternal home, And the bible dearer than gold.
2. See the sky and clouds so bright, Flowers and trees, mountains and seas; Birds and bugs give tunes so nice, The moon and stars light up the night. My Lord walks with me all the way, Giving me joy, faith, hope and love. I have glad tidings of glory, For thousands souls in misery.
3. O Lord, make me give, give, give; Make me a giver all my life. More I have as more I give, Till overflowing in my heart. Giving water to little ones, Eternal reward will bring me. "Better to give than to receive," Five loaves, two fish can feed many.

SongPage.Title: 7. GAIN CHRIST
SongPage.Context:
1. I was lost in worldly pleasures, And indulged in mortal things; Strayed from "Fount' of Living Water," Bound in sin, how miserable! Now, the glory of Christ draws me, My heart's melted in His great love; Forget things behind, reach forward, Press on to the goal ahead.
2. All things that are under the sun, Are vanity, toils in vain. The world and its lusts will soon pass, As the mist, none will remain. Only the Lord will never change. He alone satisfies my heart. Whom do I've in heaven but Christ? None on earth that I desire.
3. Whatever things were gain to me, Those I have counted as loss For the excellence for the knowledge Of Christ Jesus my Lord; For whom I have suffered the loss Of all things, and count'd them as dross, That I may gain Christ my Lord, That I may gain Christ my Lord.

SongPage.Title: 9. REVIVAL HARVEST
SongPage.Context: Brethren, let's arise! Unto the fields lift our eyes! May we offer our first love to Him all this life! Pour out our heart and strength, We give ourselves to Him. Let's face His commission. The harvest is plenty and white. We will toil in one mind, And lay all fears aside; (never tired!) Reap joyfully and sing together. Dance and celebrate. Shout for joy!

SongPage.Title: 10. WITH LOVE WE SHALL OVERCOME
11. TELL HIS NAME
SongPage.Context:
1. To all nations I'll tell His name; His love amazing to proclaim. Though I'm so weak, have none but poverty His power is perfected in me.
2. He loves me, what else should I love? I will remain faithful to Him! I'm always young because of His love. I'll tell His name till I die.
Chorus : Let our feet walk across oceans and lands To build the Church after His heart everywhere. Let us spread the witness to the earth's end. "Oh Lord, do come. I long for You to come soon."
3. Yes, we must go and tell His name To raise the cup of salvation. Facing even thousands of enemies, Yet we see His greater glory.
4. Sending me, He must be with me. Thousands to love Him,'tis my plea. Fight the good fight, be brave and not ashamed; Onward, let's strive to tell His name.

SongPage.Title: 13. WHERE LOVE ABIDES
SongPage.Context:
1. Where love abides, where love abides, Mountains are turned to plains; Where love abides, where love abides, Darkness is turned to day.
2. Where love abides, where love abides, Winter feels just like spring; Where love abides, where love abides, Sweetness whelms over pain.
3. Love your household, love your household, And you will see them change; Don't cease to pray, don't cease to pray, And you'll see God's glory.

SongPage.Title: 14. MY STRONG HOLD
SongPage.Context: O Lord of hosts, You are my strength, I love You, I love You. O Lord of hosts, You are my Rock, My Fortress, my Saviour. You are my God, and my Rock, In whom I take refuge. You are my Shield and my strong hold. My Shield and my strong hold. O Lord of hosts, You are my strength, And You are y song. And You have been my salvation. You are my Deliverance.

SongPage.Title: 15. GRACE UPON GRACE
SongPage.Context:
1. You have crowned the year with Your bounty, And Your paths dripped with fatness. You have crowned the year with Your bounty, And Your paths dripped with fatness.
2. For His anger is but for a moment, His favour is for a lifetime. Weeping may last for the night, But a shout of joy comes at morn.
3. You have helped me, my Lord, You have helped me. Under Your wings I shall shout for joy. Closely, my heart will follow, follow You. You right hand will take hold of me.

SongPage.Title: 16. WHAT SHALL I RENDER TO THE LORD
SongPage.Context:
1. What shall I render to the Lord For all His benefits to me? I'll lift up the cup of salvation, Call upon the name of the Lord. Call upon the name of the Lord. Call upon the name of the Lord. I'll lift up the cup of salvation, Call upon the name of the Lord.
2. What shall I render to the Lord For all His benefits to me? I'll lift up the cup of salvation, Call upon the name of the Lord. I will sing, I will sing to the Lord, For He is gracious to me. I will sing, I will sing to the Lord, For He is gracious to me.

SongPage.Title: 17. UNDYING LOVE
SongPage.Context: Jesus having loved His own Who were in the world, He loved them unto the end. He loved them unto the end.

SongPage.Title: 18. CHRIST IS MY LIFE
SongPage.Context:
1. If then you were raised with Christ, Seek those things above, Where Christ is sitting at the right hand of God.
2. Set your mind on things above, Not on the things on earth; For you died, and your life is hidd'n with Christ in God.
3. When Christ who is our life, Christ our life appears, Then you also will appear with Him in glory.

SongPage.Title: 19. THOUGH YOU HAVE NOT SEEN HIM
SongPage.Context: And though you have not seen Him, You love Him, you love Him. Though you do not see Him now, Yet believing in Him, You greatly rejoice with joy, You greatly rejoice with joy, With joy in expressible And full of glory.

SongPage.Title: 20. THE THRILL IN THE LOVE OF THE CROSS
SongPage.Context:
1. O Lord, keep me near the cross, May I perceive Your heart. Let Your love pierce through my soul I shall never be free. The love of the cross Thrills my heart immensely! Could I still live for myself? Should I ignore Your love?
2. God's own Son walked to the cross, Such love is amazing! I am captured by His cross, I surrender myself. The love of the cross Thrills my heart immensely! This love conquers, compels me To be same heart with You

SongPage.Title: 22. IN THE CROSS
SongPage.Context:
1. On the cross, my Lord conquered all the foes; On the cross, all my sins He washed away. Oh? Moving, life yielding love! Its depth and height infinite! By the cross, God's love to me is displayed.
2. On the cross, "It is finished!" He declared; On the cross, the wall of sin He shattered. Oh? salvation of glory! I've obtained glorious freedom! By the cross, God and man embrace as one.
3. In the cross, I can see a ray of hope; In the cross, my soul's comforted and healed. Oh? Tender light of the cross! What encouragement it brings! By the cross, my life has a glorious change.
4. On cross, His off'ring is once for all; On the cross, His blood washed me white as snow. Oh?Perfected for all time! Full acceptance, endless love! By the cross, God and man are ever close.
5. In the cross, He cast away my load of sin; In the cross, He freed me from the yoke of law. Oh? How warm and sweet to live In His vast ocean of love! By the cross, God's love on me is outpoured.
6. In the cross, His love kindles my whole life. In the cross, His love gives me faith and might. Oh?Wondrous love of the cross Shall be my driven and my rest! By the cross, I shout for joy and victory.

SongPage.Title: 24. REJOICE! THE LORD IS RISEN!
SongPage.Context: Rejoice! Rejoice! The Lord is risen! Overcome Satan and death, He is risen! Rejoice! Rejoice! The Lord is risen! Overcome Satan and death, He set me free!

SongPage.Title: 25. AT THE SEA OF TIBERIAS
SongPage.Context: At the Sea of Tiberias, The risen Lord appeared to me; He prepared a barbecue on the shore, With fish and bread and His tender love. O Lord! You know that I love You! Yet, I have failures and weakness. May You strengthen my heart by the spirit, To love You and follow to the end.

SongPage.Title: 26. STRIVE TILL HE COMES
SongPage.Context:
Chorus : My dearest Lord, may You come soon! May You return quickly from the blue. Bright morning Star, may You come soon! Take me in the clouds to meet with You.
1. Lord, I have been waiting for so long, Even dark hair now become grey. The night of this world is far spent, How much longer should all groan and wait?
2. You should guard your heart with all your strength, Watching, waiting for His coming. Strive for God, abound in His work; For our toil in Him is not in vain.
3. Things of this world soon will pass away. The night's far spent, the dawn's at hand. Lift our heads and bravely march on. Run the race for Him unto the end.

SongPage.Title: 28. ONE DAY THE LORD WILL COME
SongPage.Context:
1. One day the Lord will come, To take me to the clouds; That day He'll wipe away my tears, I'll dance and sing aloud.
Chorus; O Lord, I love You. My heart longs for You. Gladly waiting for that day, I'll see Your glorious face.
2. One day the Lord will come, To transform my body. To be like His form of glory, How wonderful and free!
3. One day the Lord will come, I'll marvel and rejoice. To see my Lord's glorious face, Shall be my spring of joy.
4. One day the Lord will come, Take me to Abba's home. I'll see His wondrous love design, For me the new abode.
5. One day the Lord will come, Gone all sorrows and tears! I'll drink from the river of joy, Enthrall in His love.
6. One day the Lord will come, Crowns, rewards to present. We'll reign fore'er, His government Will increase with no end.
7. One day the Lord will come, He is my hope so blest, There'll be new heaven and new earth, In which dwells righteousness.

SongPage.Title: 30. REJOICE! ETERNAL SPRING!
SongPage.Context:
1. Rejoice! Rejoice! The Lord shall reign. Rejoice! Rejoice! Rule o'er all things. Rejoice! Rejoice! We'll reign with Him. The Lord will forever reign, the King of kings.
2. Rejoice! Rejoice! Eternal spring. Rejoice! Rejoice! Endless mornings; Rejoice! Rejoice! Bright eternity. I am fellow-heir with Christ, inherit all.
3. Rejoice! Rejoice! New Jerusalem. Rejoice! Rejoice! New heav'n, new earth; The Lord and we shall dance and sing, Drink from the river of life, fore'er in love.

SongPage.Title: 31. THE APPLE TREE AND THE LILY
SongPage.Context:
1. Like a lily among the thorns, So is My love mid the maidens, My love, you're all fair; you have ravished My heart with your eye of faith. O My darling, let Me see your face, And let Me hear your voice; For your voice is sweet, and your face is lovely. Day and night I think of you.
2. Like an apple tree mid the forest trees, So is my beloved mid the men. In His shade I sit down with great delight. His fruit is sweet to my taste. He brings me to the banquet hall Of His salvation and grace. He brings me to the banquet hall of love. His banner o'er me is love.

SongPage.Title: 33. SMILE FOR THE LORD
SongPage.Context:
1. Smile all the day, for You are by my side. Smile all the day, for Your love surrounds me. I'm of good cheer even in various trials, For You are holding all authority.
2. While I'm tempted, let me smile to You still, For You've overcome the world and the foes! Your grace's enough. The Spirit gives me life, You uphold me walking on life's billows!
3. In days of trouble, You carry me through. Even in battles, I can smile by You. Pressed by the foes, I still see Your face. Before the foes You lay a feast for me.
4. With You I pass through floods and flames of life; Our friendship's deeper as the days go by. Suffering with You makes sweetest memories, And works for me the eternal glory.
5. My dear brethren, we can only live once. Let's bear the cross for Him in this brief life. Break the vial, offer perfume today. Anoint Him with love, give our heart to Him.

SongPage.Title: 35. A LIFE OF PRAISE
SongPage.Context:
1. I should praise God every day. Then I live the normal way, For He is great and worthy to be praised. His greatness can't be measured.
2. I should praise God every day. Think of His love and His grace. My heart is strengthened, always it's fervent, Till He comes that glorious day.
3. I should praise God every day. Look upon His glorious face, Give praises of faith. Weak ones become brave. Not a word the foes can say.
4. I should praise God every day. Always glorify His name; Joyfully clap hands, dance sing and give thanks, Rejoice before Him always.

SongPage.Title: 36. YOUR GRACE MAKES ME STRONG AND BRAVE
SongPage.Context:
1. Lord, Your grace makes me strong and brave, Makes me steadfast to walk ahead. Thinking of Your love, bountiful grace, How can my heart slide back?
Chorus: Arise now, O my spirit! I fear no giants, mountains! Arise now, O my spirit! Heed the voice of the Lord.
2. Lord, Your grace makes me strong and brave. You change dry bones into big troops, Turn the dead into life, naught into being, And weakness into strength.
3. Lord, Your grace makes me strong and brave. I despise all trials, and pains. You make me full of hope, sing boldly at night! By You I can do all things.

SongPage.Title: 38. PRESS ON TOWARD THE GOAL
SongPage.Context:
Whatever things were gain to me, For Christ I have counted as loss, For the surpassing value of knowing Christ. To gain Christ I count all as dross. Not that I have laid hold of it. There's only one thing in my heart Forget what's behind, reach forward to what's ahead, I press on toward the goal.
Chorus; Yet, I am continually with You; You hold me by my right hand. With Your counsel You'll guide me. Then receive me to glory. Besides You there's nothing I desire. Now, I press on toward the goal, For the prize of the upward call, For the prize of the upward call of God in Christ, I mind not the world and its all.

SongPage.Title: 40. THE BEAUTIFUL OF HEAVEN
SongPage.Context:
1. What'd be the heaven's beauty If You were not there? I desire no more this heavenly place.
2. Fairer is the heav'nly home, 'Cause by You prepared. One day You and I'll live in the new place.

SongPage.Title: 41. LEAN ON THE FATHER BOSOM
SongPage.Context:
1. Father, let me lean on Your bosom, In Your love let me be healed. Rest in Your bosom of love, Enjoy Your kisses.
2. Father, let me lean on Your bosom To feel Your beautiful heart, From which flows Your endless love. 'Tis the spring satisfies me.
3. Father, let me lean on Your bosom To hear the words from Your heart. Your love and Your bosom Forever capture my heart.

SongPage.Title: 42. EVERY BY YOUR SIDE
SongPage.Context:
1. My dear child, do not fear, For I'm by your side; I'll never forsake you, Through all trials with you.
2. My dear child, I love you. I'm with you always; Long for you, hold you tight, You are My delight.

SongPage.Title: 43. BITTER LOVE JOURNEY
SongPage.Context:
1. Slapping, scourging, purple robe, crowns of thorns! The Lord bore the anguish alone. On Calvary He was nailed on the cross, Suffered willingly for us all. The Saviour poured out Himself, His life, His love for me; He was earnest to gain my heart, Even died for me on the cross.
2. Huge tides of love shattered the wall of sin, A guilt-purging fountain opened. "It's finished!" He finished this great work! When I consider His heart, I'm moved by His great love. For Christ's fervent love and His cross, I'll respond with love forever!

SongPage.Title: 45. TASTE THE PERFECT FRUIT OF THE CROSS
SongPage.Context:
1. My eyes of faith behold the Father's heart Let me trust in the great power of the blood! Boldly with faith, come to the throne of grace, See with my eyes the Father's sweet welcome; Enjoy the bliss of sitting in heav'n with the Lord, And fully taste the perfect, sweet fruit of the cross.
2. May I behold the worth of Jesus' blood, Gladly receive the Father's sweet welcome; My spirit's free. Dwell in His love all day. My eyes of faith ever capture His heart. Fully respond, inspired by grace, compelled by love, Fix on Jesus and His cross, press on the goal.
3. How warm and sweet is the fruit of the cross, Sets free my soul to sing and leap with joy! The Father's heart, welcoming face, how warm! The Lord's embrace, smile, gracious words, how sweet! In fellowship of love with Father, Son, Spirit, On earth as heav'n, I foretaste the heavenly bliss.

SongPage.Title: 4. REST PLACE OF MY HEART
SongPage.Context:
1. May I oft realize With me forever You abide. My heart is the place of Your desire. Day and night You are there by my side.
2. May I oft think of You, Set You always before me eyes, My heart's glad and steadfast for Your presence. I have captured Your heart with faith.
3. May I have eyes of dove That see You living in heav'n for me, And realize that You live in my heart too; Let my mind and my love be to You.
4. May You gain every day My mind, my love and my will; You are the glorious vision of my heart; In Your love I rest in great delight.
5. When I awake from sleep, Let my heart first see You in heaven; And realize that You are with me always, Walking with me toward each new day.

SongPage.Title: 6. BE STRONG AND COURAGEOUS
SongPage.Context:
1. Christ, the Victor, holds on high all authority; He gives you the power to trample enemies. Be awesome as an army with its banners bold; Sing your praise, and use the power to conquer all the foes. He prepares a feast for you before your enemies; Lift your head with glory, With your heart set free.
2. Facing various trials you should Be more rejoicing; 'Tis the way to grow fast, To receive glory! Be strong and courageous, Face the fight with joy; Cast not away your confidence To gain great reward. Through the valley of death, He is with you, Protects you with His rod, Guides you with His staff.

SongPage.Title: 8. THE LAST COMMISSION
SongPage.Context: Hear, may you hear This unfinished triumph song, let me finish! See, may you see This long years of marathon. Let me take this relay, run to the end! I won't disobey the heav'nly vision, Lord, I won't fail Your heart's desire. Hold tight the final task You've given me, The last commission to complete. Lift up the banner of truth in all land! Kindle the fire of revival! Let's place the last stone on the temple top! Be found to praise before Christ's stage. Hear, may you hear This unfinished triumph song, I must finish! Think, may you think This long years of building work, In this generation, let us complete.

SongPage.Title: 10. STRIVE FOR THE LORD
SongPage.Context:
1. I Strive even among daily chores, In quietness live for you; I strive even life's busy and tight, Lord, I still walk with You. I strive despite the world's corrupt course, I'm sanctified to you. I strive on! O Lord, for you I live.
2. I strive even in doubts and worries; Let You comfort my heart. I strive mid the storms of temptation, Lord, keep my heart sincere. I strive in the days of affliction, My love to You I give. I strive on! O Lord, for You I live.
3. O Lord, I know that You love me, I have captured Your heart! How precious Your favour, tender love, That's why I'm striving still! Forget not You chose and committ'd me; I'm glad to know Your will. I strive on! O Lord, for You I live.

SongPage.Title: 12. WHAT A FRIENDSHIP THE LORD WITH ME
SongPage.Context: My dear Lord, day and night You're by my side; All the years You've carried me Through floods and fires, In the north wind and dark night, On the path of easy life, Walk in love hand in hand You and I. Your calling and Your will can I deny? I will run after You all my life. Thank You that You have revealed Such a love so high and deep! Lord, Your love on the cross compels me. When I look on to the fields, Harvest plentiful and white; Lord, revive my heart anew! Can it be that I should let You grieve in zeal? 'Tis my plea, my Lord, for You I live! Loving You, I'll press on toward the goal!.

SongPage.Title: 14. THE WORLDS OF LOVE
SongPage.Context:
1. I have beheld "the worlds of love" Shining all o'er the universe; The Lord and I shall ever reign Flying with joy ?"the worlds of love".
2. I have beheld "the worlds of love", More than the sand and the stars; His government and His peace Will increase with no end

SongPage.Title: 15. THE LORD WHO ACCOMPANIES ME
SongPage.Context: O God! How precious Are Your thoughts unto me! How great is the sum of them! If I should count, They out number the sand. When I awake, I am still with You, I am still with You, I am still with You.

SongPage.Title: 16. THE LOVE OF THE SON OF GOD
SongPage.Context: I'll marvel and cherish forevermore God's fervent love to men. He became flesh and took the form of slave, Humbled for the lowly men. Talked to the Samaritan woman, Touched the leper with His hand; Dined with the sinners, Healed the lame and blind, And the demon possessed man. How He longs to enter into our needs! His great love has drawn my heart! May I not be one just thronging the way. Let me stay close to His heart.

SongPage.Title: 18. CONSIDER THIS GRACE
SongPage.Context:
1. "He loved me and died for me!" Consider this grace That changes all my life, Gives me hope and joy! Lord, Your great and tender love, Heals the wounds of men, Yet, You were oft despised, Acquainted with grief.
Chorus: On the cross You bled and died, To ransom my soul. Your heart was wounded for me! There's a living way To the Father's fold! Think'ng of Your love, I'm moved to tears.
2. you were forsaken for me Both by God and men; Lonely, You prayed that night In great agony! Silently, You bore the cross Walked to Calvary, Bled all the way, and were lifted on the tree!

SongPage.Title: 20. MY RESPONSE TO "IT'S FINISHED!"
SongPage.Context:
1. "Sing, my spirit!" My response to "it's finished!" Great is the Lord! By Jesus' name, I've got perfect salvation, Become child of God! Taste the Father's eternal love, full acceptance, Fore'er I can drink from His vast ocean of grace!
2. "Be bold and free!" My response to "it's finished!" Worship with joy! How beautiful and precious is God heart! How sweet is His love! Salvation grace of the cross, removed all hindrance; I long to draw closer to the Lord who loves me!
3. "Shout for joy!" My response to "it's finished!" Hallelujah! The Lord's risen, ascended to God's right hand, To be my High Priest! Now, the Father accepts me as He does the Lord; Christ carries me and appears for me before God.
4. "Be full of faith" My response to "it's finished!" Fearless and bold! The Lord has solved my greatest problem of life! My heart rests in peace. Authority in heaven, on earth is all His! His grace must be greater than my difficulties!
5. "Fully love Him!" My response to "it's finished!" Rightly I should! The Lord bought me with His blood to be His own, His love moves my heart! With the highest and wholehearted love He loves me! I can have love response to Him ?O, how precious!

SongPage.Title: 22. YOU GAVE YOURSELF FOR ME
SongPage.Context: Lord, You loved me and died for me! You drank the bitter cup On the cruel cross, You shed Your blood, Brought me to be Your own. My heart gives thanks, I yearn to praise, Praise You forevermore Till all perish, I'll love You still. Belong to You only.

SongPage.Title: 23. IF THE LORD COMES TODAY
SongPage.Context:
1. My Lord Jesus when will you return? How much longer we still have to wait? The night is far spent. The dawn is at hand. We know You will soon return!
Chorus: Maybe today, I'll see my Lord face to face! Maybe by next day! Let's adorn ourselves to watch and wait.
2. "Tis our only want for many years, The hope of the saints who fell asleep. And the one same cry through all the ages, "Come quickly, O Lord Jesus!"
3. Soon our home above will be ready. The Son of Man will come in glory! Let us build God's household after His heart, Bearing love and unity!

SongPage.Title: 25. I LOVE YOUR APPEARING
SongPage.Context:
1. O Lord, I love Your appearing. You'll meet me face to face! In love for years, no words can tell Such deep love and friendship. Seeing Your face, I will love You even more, The clouds 'll be brighter than before. E'er to abide with You and know Your wonder, 'Tis bliss beyond compare!
2. O Lord, I love Your appearing. The world I lay aside! This world, its lusts will pass away, The toil in God e'er abides. Not far from me I see the coming glory, You'll praise me at the stage of Christ! How You cherish all that I have done for You! All these You bear in mind.
3. O Lord, I love Your appearing. I don't mind suffering! The glory's of exceeding weight. You have laid up crowns for me! You hold my hand through floods and flames and trials. Soon You'll bring me into glory! Then I will sit with You fore'er on Your throne. With You hold sovereignty.

SongPage.Title: 27. HOPE IN THE GRACE OF THE LORD'S COMING
SongPage.Context:
1. You should rest your hope fully on The grace of the Lord's coming, And heed to the prophetic word, Heed to the prophetic word, Till the day dawns, the morn star Rises in your heart. You are drawn by the Lord's coming Longing for future glory.
2. I don't mind the things which are seen, But the things which are not seen. For the things seen are but temporal, Those not seen are eternal. Light affliction for a while, Works for us lasting glory. That's of far more exceeding weight. What a bliss to be with Him.
3. The rich grace of the Lord's coming Surpasses all human dreams, I shall be caught up in the clouds, And be face to face with Him. My body will be transformed To be like His of glory, He'll bring me to the Father's home, Stroll in the holy city.
4. When I see His face of glory, And realize His love so deep, I'll be charmed by His majesty, Changed into marv'llous glory! Love response flows from my heart, Like a spring that ever swells, God's household is full of sweetness. We'll dwell in "the worlds of love"!
5. Thrilling prize-giving at Christ's stage! The toil in Him not in vain. Giving water to little ones, A reward from Him will gain. He'll remember all my days, All sweet memories display. So precious He appreciate me. He cherishes my love.
6. The beauty of the Father's home Excels all men's fantasies; Gates of pearl and walls of jasper, Gems as base and gold as street. The river and trees of life, The Lamb as the city's light! The city's filled with warmth and love, Full of life and glory bright.
7. The crowns He gives me won't perish. I will be move glorious. Government and peace of the Lord Shall forevermore increase. I'll sit with Him on the throne, Reign with Him eternally, Soon the glorious "worlds of love" Will spread o'er the universe.

SongPage.Title: 31. ENJOY THE FRUIT OF THE CROSS
SongPage.Context:
AND DEEPLY ENTER INTO HIS BEAUTIFUL HEART OF LOVE
In the Lord and the cross, I rejoice and glory! For He gave Himself for me, Bought me to Him by His blood. This strongest love changes my life, Constrains me, gives me faith. O this greatest, most precious deed Is stronger than the rock, As stable as the throne! The fruits of the cross, sweeter than honey, Give me faith, peace and vict'ry. O how precious! Thick clouds and mist vanished, No more hindrance or shadow! In His presence I rejoice! Now, I can bathe in His warm glorious light! It is so sweet and life giving! O what a joy to enter deep Into His fairest heart, Drink fully of my Beloved's love, Enjoy His all knowing friendship. O what a joy to live with Him! Makes me feel His affection Filling the whole universe, Filling heavens and the earth! Who knows in this dark and suff'ring world, There is heaven on the earth! Who knows in this dark and suff'ring world Is hidden the deepest love between He and I! It makes me feel His affection Filling the whole universe, Filling heaven and the earth.

SongPage.Title: 34. ENJOY THE LORD
SongPage.Context: Like an apple tree of the woods, So is my beloved among the sons. I sit down in His shade with joy; His fruit is sweet to my taste. He brings me to the banquet hall; His banner over me is love. Provide me with cakes of raisins To sustain me, sustain me. Give me apples to refresh me, Because I am love sick. His left hand is under my head; His right hand embraces me. O daughters of Jerusalem, I charge you by the gazelles, Or by the does of the field, Do not stir up nor awaken love; Wait until it pleases.

SongPage.Title: 36. HOW CAN I?
SongPage.Context: Lord, You've poured all Your love upon me, How can I deny Your boundless grace? You draw near to me each day, How can I miss the good part? You incline Your ear to me, How can I be mute, not pray? This household needs me, How can I live my life in vain? Hear the cry of thousands thirsty souls, How can I ignore their life and death? Now sufficient is Your grace, I will offer my life to You.

SongPage.Title: 38. MY EYES OF FAITH SEE HIS HEART
SongPage.Context:
1. My eyes of faith see the Lord's heart Engraved with my glorious name. See His precious thoughts and longing toward me; His smiling face and His bosom Are my joy, delight, contentment And sweet rest.
2. My eyes of faith see the Lord's arm Sealed with my lovable name, See His mighty, gracious hand upholding me; His hand of love embraces me. His embrace can heal my heart. Oh, how warm!
3. My eyes of faith see the Father's Smiling face, love and welcome; He's waiting to embrace me With sweet kisses. The Father's love satisfies me. I feel His affection o'er heavens and earth.

SongPage.Title: 40. THE PATH OF FAITH
42. TAKE UP THE TASK AND SOJOURN FOR THE LORD
SongPage.Context:
1. I'm a stranger, a pilgrim on earth I desire the better home above; Gladly would I sojourn all my life, March to war where'er He sends me. I would rather be homeless, like the Lord Who had no place to lay His head; By faith reach to the end of the earth, Be one whom the world's not worthy.
2. Take the last commission of the Lord. Build the church according to His will; Spread the truth to all nations and lands, The church to restore and revive. By faith, cross over mountains, the Red Sea; By faith, speak and shout for joy. By faith, give forth thanks and praises, By faith, satisfy His heart.
3. For the Lord, I count all things as loss. May the Lord keep my heart to the end. Ever be faithful and pure to Him, Love Him more than my first love. By faith, I feed on His faithfulness, Fortress and giants are my food. By faith, march on with joy always. Live my life by faith for the Lord.

SongPage.Title: 44. THE LOVE SONG OF THE FATHER'S HEART
SongPage.Context:
1. My dear child do you know How joyous I'm for you?! Your countenance and your every move Shines like a precious stone, Dazzling, lovely.
Chorus: I love to embrace you, T'is my pleasure and joy, For you I dance and sing The love song of My heart.
2. My dear child, do you know How content I'm with you? Now and fore'er nothing in this world Can ever replace you in My heart.
3. The days ahead are joyous, Come, fully enjoy My all. You can freely lean on My bosom. I'll give you eternal, greatest blessings.

SongPage.Title: 46. I AFFECT YOU MOST. YOU NEED ME MOST
SongPage.Context:
1. You're self existing, self sufficient, Yet, I'm the bone of your bones; You long to be united deeply with me, Be one spirit, heart to heart.
2. For Yourself You have created me, Gladly You became a Man, You suffered much and were nailed on the cross, Only to gain my heart.
3. For me You came from heaven to the earth, Your love journey is touching! You ran through all pains and poured out Your life, Love covenant proved by blood.
4. For love You saw the joy ahead, You went to the Mt. of myrrh; You despised the shame, endured the bitter cross, To be in love with me!
5. For love You passed the shame, endured the bitter cross, For love You rejoice o'er me; You'll quiet for me. Your heart beats faster. O, I affect You so much!
6. In Your love I find peace and rest, I know how much You need me; I'm fore'er amazed I affect You so much I truly know Your heart's mine.
7. For love You need me infinitely, Without me Your heart's lacking! In the universe, throughout the ages, Who could fill this empty space?
8. For love You're thinking of me day and night, Your love thoughts are more than stars; Your fervent love draws me and captures my heart; How sweet to live in Your love!

SongPage.Title: 48. THE BLEEDING HEART
SongPage.Context:
1. In this world, none can compare; Forever, none can exchange. The Lord's my beloved; I am His darling. This love song shall be sung fore'er. Before time, He thought of me. Full of hope, He created me To be most like Him, be closest to Him. Be in love with Him and share His all.
2. Who knows how high heaven is? He loves me high'r than the sky! From heaven to earth, From His birth to death, (from manger to the cross) He loved me, gave Himself for me. To seek me, He suffered much. To save me, He passed through death. The Lord has opened His bleeding heart to me, His infinite love towards me.

SongPage.Title: 50. WHAT I HAVE GAINED IS SO BEAUTIFUL
SongPage.Context: What I have gained is so beautiful More than I can ever dream of More than I can obtain in this world I cannot exchange it with anything Your affection has shown. You have gladly bestowed So that I may know What I have gained is so beautiful More than all the things You have made The sky is clear and blue The clouds tell your message Much more is Your personal love You partake in my life Light up all my days What I have gained is so beautiful I am no longer a slave to sin But my heavenly Father's dear child And You walk with me in this life journey Through suff'ring to glory Understand Your heart, Your desire for me Enjoy the abode with You and the Father All these make me dance with cheer. What I have gained is so beautiful One day I'll live in the heav'nly place All tears, sorrows will pass away Every day I can see You face to face Live in eternal sweetness and grace O Lord, having You, all are so beautiful!

SongPage.Title: 53. MY WARM DWELLING PLACE
SongPage.Context:
1. In the universe, my heart finds no resting place Only You are my eternal rest. In the universe, to whom can I give my love? Only You're my secure resting place. You are my warm dwelling place. How blessed! We are united! Forev'r we're in the river of love.
2. Apart from You whom do I have in heaven? Only You worth my heart and worship. Apart from You I have no desire on earth. Only Your love captures my heart. You are my warm dwelling place, My eternal resting place, You are my glorious Beloved.

SongPage.Title: 54. YOU HAVE PREPARED
SongPage.Context: Before I realized it, You had prepared all, Such as the heavens and the earth And the fullness of them all, Such as Your love journey and salvation Never knew I could ask for Your help, Lord, You have come. My daily bread; clothes for all seasons. In the days I faced endless toils and ceaseless waves, By the Sea of Tiberias, Labouring all night, being weary and hungry, When I was pondering under the fig tree You have come. When I fail and lose hope, surely You and Your help Will come faster to me. O Lord, You're my Brother. You will take care of me, You will defeat my enemies, You will ease my troubles, lead me in this life journey. O Lord, I count on You.

SongPage.Title: 56. THE LORD'S LOVE IS DEEP
SongPage.Context:
1. Lord Jesus Your desire is for me. You have loved me since eternity past. Your loves deeper than the sea, high'r than the sky; Surpasses love of this world. Lord Jesus, though I had gone as tray, Your love is forever the same, Because this love flows from Your beautiful heart, Forever overflowing. To seek the lost, You once left the heavenly home, And bore sorrows and grief; To save me from the eternal destruction, You were forsaken by God. Lord Jesus, Your love is so touching. Such love deeply thrills and melts my heart. I will give my heart to You.
2. Lord Jesus, You always care for me. Though in heaven, You always pray for me. Your love thoughts outnumber the sand and the stars. I am engraved in Your heart. Lord Jesus, though You are in glory, Your heart's desire is always towards me, Beautiful this love flows from Your beautiful heart, Forever overflowing. For me to be ever closest to You, You want to dwell in me. For me to enjoy the eternal blessings, You'll receive me into glory. Lord Jesus, Your love kindles my heart. Because of You, I can sing in dark nights Your love compels me to strive on bravely. I'll follow You all my life.

SongPage.Title: 59. ONLY JESUS
SongPage.Context:
Do you know where I can find true smiles? Where does true love hide? Come and go, we live and die, Wand'ring for a thousand miles. Who is willing to share with a true heart, My laughter and tears? Who can lead me to the right path, That I may not spoil my years?
Chorus; Only Jesus! Only Jesus! He is the light of man. He lights up my life journey; Gives me warmth and glorious hope; He walks with me, He dries my tears, Gives me abundant life; Brilliant forever! (Repeat chorus) Brilliant forever!

SongPage.Title: 61. THE LONGING OF LOVE
SongPage.Context:
1. My darling, my beautiful one, Rise up and come along with me. The winter's past, the rain's over and gone, Flowers appear, the time of singing has come, The voice of turtle dove is heard, The fig tree puts forth her green figs, And the vines with the tender grapes. My love, my fair one, rise up and come away.
2. My Beloved's mine and I am His, He feeds His flock among the lilies. Turn, my beloved until the day breaks, And the shadows flee away, And be like a gazelle Or a young stag on the mountains of Bether. Turn, my beloved like a gazelle Or a young stag on the mountains of Bether.

SongPage.Title: 63. THIS IS THE DAY THAT THE LORD HAS MADE
SongPage.Context:
1. This is the day that the Lord has made. We will rejoice, be glad in it. This is the day that the Lord has made. We will rejoice, and be glad in it.
2. His mercy and loving kindness Are new and fresh every morning. Love and mercy will follow me today, And my Beloved will be with me.
3. He holds authority for me. He causes all things works for me. No good thing will He withhold from me. I have a good inheritance.
4. Sufficient for the day its own trouble. Do not worry for tomorrow. Enjoy every day, every stage, every step. Enjoy, admire your whole journey.

SongPage.Title: 64. THE FAITH OF CONQUEROR
SongPage.Context:
1. My Lord is risen! He has conquered all. He's overcome pain and death, Overcome the world, defeated Satan; Destroyed the power of sin. Ha! Ha! Ha! He's risen. He lives forever more. Ha! Ha! Ha! My Lord Has gained vic'try forever!
2. Who shall sep'rate us from the love of Christ? Shall tribulation, distress, Or persecution? Or nakedness, Or famine, peril or sword? Neither death, nor life, angels, principalities, Can ever sep'rate us from the love of God?
3. Whether gain or loss, whether right or wrong, Whether abound or in want, Whether height or depth, in strength or weakness, Whatever I encounter, I can do all things through Christ who strengthens me. I firmly believe His grace's sufficient for me!
4. O brothers, arise! O sisters, be strong! Never mind all the scars. Forget things behind and march forward. Triumph o'er trials of life. "He who overcomes, I will make him a pillar In My God's temple, enthrone with Me forever!"

SongPage.Title: 66. PSALM 103
SongPage.Context:
1.Bless the Lord, O my soul, bless the Lord! And all that's within me, bless His holy name. Bless the Lord, O my soul, bless the Lord. And forget none of His benefits He pardons all your transgressions And heals all your diseases. He redeems your life from death, And crowns you with love and mercies. He satisfies you with good things, So that your youth is renewed like the eagle's
2.The Lord is merciful and gracious, Slow to anger, abounding in mercy. He won't always strive, nor be angry fore'er He hasn't dealt with us due to our sins. As the heavens are high above, As the heavens are high above, So great is His loving kindness To those who, those who fear Him. As far as the east's from the west, So far has He removed our transgressions from us. As a father pities his children, So the Lord pities those who fear Him. His loving kindness on those who fear Him. Is from everlasting to everlasting.

SongPage.Title: 1. TAKE UP THE TASK
SongPage.Context:
1. The morn light shines on this sleeping land, Awakens thousand souls. God's great love is vast as boundless ocean; Deep in you, deep in me, the same we feel His love the best and real. Let us grow together, With our songs send off the winter, Vines giving fragrance, Voice of turtle doves getting louder. Let us rise, and say goodbye To all fancies, pride and sighs; To the promised land, Fairest resting place, let us stride!
2. Why stay in dreams of passing splendors? Soon they'll all disappear! Oh my dear, don't look back and keep sighing; Bear in mind Jesus Christ's precious calling, Pursue with all your strength. Come along! Come along! Take the task upon your shoulder. Keep our faith in Him, Let all hardships be turned to power! Come along! Come along! Take the task upon your shoulder. With our hearts steadfast Let's strive for His will together. Come along! Come along!

SongPage.Title: 3. LORD, I SURRENDER ALL
SongPage.Context: I surrender my all to satisfy You, Lord. Though rugged is the way, follow the trails of Your flock. Every step as I see more my weakness, I will praise Your love more and more. Your banner over me is love. I'm conquered. You are my heart's desire, I lay down riches and fame. You are full of grace; Your bosom's my resting place. Lord, put me like a seal over Your heart. Put me like a seal upon Your arm. For love is as strong as death, all the world can't replace. Oh Lord, I long for You, long to see Your glorious face. Take up my cross today. Till You come I'll watch and wait.

SongPage.Title: 5. MARCH ON BY FAITH
6. HOME, SWEET HOME
SongPage.Context:
1. 'Tis the most pleasant home, the desire of God and man, Full of fragrance of love, songs of joy everywhere; A home of warmth and grace, o'erflowing rivers of joy, The peaceful dwelling place of God and man forever. Home, sweet, sweet home! The hearts of God and man become one in this sweet home.
2. Through all eternity, in God's plan, "home" is the core, The Father, the Son and the spirit gave all for this. The Lord came to the earth and was nailed upon the cross. God's heart was pieced. He gave His all for me. Home, sweet, sweet home! This is my vision, my goal, my dream and my rest.
3. Through all eternity, the myst'ry of all ages Has been revealed to me, I've found the greatest treasure. Now, I have understood, I've found the greatest treasure. Now, I have understood "myst'ry of the Universe," I have the goal of life, 'tis my hope and 'tis my aim. Home, sweet, sweet home! The hearts of God and man are fully satisfied.
4. Through all eternity, and throughout the universe, Only in this home God and man can be at rest. God's house is bountiful ?rivers of joy, fount of life, This household reveals God's glory and beauty. Home, sweet, sweet home! God's infinite fullness overflows form this household.
5. Gone all sorrows and sight! Comes this home down on the new earth! No more grief and pain! God wipes away every tear. His tabernacle's with men, His love flows to all the earth; The city of clear gold shines forth beams of jasper. Home, sweet, sweet home! The masterpiece of God, e'r the model of His love.
6. The place of God and man ?the city of clear gold, Founded on precious stones, and pearls as its welcome gates. Each one is radiant in this Royal family. The city lights up the new heaven and the new earth. Home, sweet, sweet home! The vast ocean of grace ripples with waves of love.

SongPage.Title: 9. HIS GAZE OF LOVE
SongPage.Context:
1. Can a woman forget her nursing child? Even these may forget, I won't forget you. Behold, I've inscribed you on My palms. Your adorable countenance's always before Me.
2. The mountains shall depart, the hills be removed; But My kindness shall not depart from you. All things may change, May love is the same. My covenant of love is forever sure.
3. My child, I will never leave you, never forsake you. I am always with you, till the end of the age. I love you as the Father loves Me. Day and night I watch over you, fix My eyes on you.

SongPage.Title: 10. THE TABERNACLE OF GOD IS WITH MEN
SongPage.Context: Now i saw a new heaven and a new earth, For the first heaven and the first earth Had passed away, had passed away. And there is no more sea. Then I saw the New Jerusalem, Coming down out of heaven from God, Prepared as a bride adorned for her husband, Prepared as a bride. And i heard a loud voice from heaven saying, "Behold, God's tabernacle's with men." He will dwell among them, And they shall he His people. God Himself will be with them, And be their God. God will wipe away every tear from their eyes. There shall be no more death, There shall be no more sorrow, crying or pain, For the former things have passed a way. And He who sits on the throne said, "Behold, I make all things new!"

SongPage.Title: 12. THE ETERNAL BLISS
SongPage.Context: The angel showed me a pure river Of water of life clear as crystal, Coming from the throne of God And of the Lamb in the middle of its street. One either side of the river, Was the tree of life bearing twelve fruit, Every month yielding its fruit. The leaves for the healing of the nations. There will no longer be any curse, The throne of God and of the Lamb will be in it. His bond servant will serve Him, they will see His face. His name will be on their foreheads. There will no longer be any night, They need no lamp nor light of the sun, For the Lord God will give them light. They will reign forever and ever. (rev.22:15)

SongPage.Title: 14. THE LORD CREATED ME TO BE HIS BELOVED
SongPage.Context: For Yourself You have created me, You must have made me the best. To be most like You, closest to You And satisfy You most. I am fearfully and wonderfully made As Your compatible beloved. You even want to be a Man forever To b like me, the closest to me. You desire to live in my heart forever. Day and night we're closest. You are always by my side. We love and live together, this life and eternity. Heart to heart, we share everything. Oh, You are my Beloved.

SongPage.Title: 15. THIS IS TRUE LOVE
SongPage.Context: God send His only Son into the world That we might live through Him, through Him The love of God is shown. His love is shown to all. Not that we who loved God But it's God who loved us, Sent His only Son to be a sacrifice To save us from sin. This is true love (1John 4:919)

SongPage.Title: 16. THE LONG EXPECTED EMBRACE
SongPage.Context: When I lifted my head for Your face I wished to see, I met Your gaze on me which was from eternity. I could not realize when You began To put me on Your heart! When I considered that was just our first encounter, Instead it was Your long expected embrace with me. I was surprised with joy when I met You the first time, Yet, all along, You've been deeply loving me. As time goes by, I love You more and more. Since long ago You've desired me, thought of me. Oh.... This sweet love that surpasses time and space Is a true experience of You and me.

SongPage.Title: 18. THE GLORIOUS RISEN LORD
SongPage.Context:
1. In the middle of the lamp stands One like the Son of Man, Clothed a robe reaching to the feet, Gird'd on His chest a golden band. His head and hair were white like wool, As white as snow. His eyes were like a flame of fire, His eyes were like a flame of fire.
2. His feet were like fine brass, as if refined in a furnace. His voice was like sound of waters; His right hand held seven stars. Out of His mouth came a sharp sword, A sharp twoedged sword. His countenance was like the sun Shining in its strength, in its strength.
3. When I saw Him, I fell at His feet Like a dead man, like a dead man. He placed His right hand on me saying, "Don't be afraid. Don't be afraid." I am the First, I am the Last. I was dead and behold, I am alive forevermore. I am alive forevermore.
4. And I have, and I have the keys of Hades and of death. O Death, where is your victory? where is your victory? O Death, O Death, where is your sting? Where is your sting? Hallelujah! Hallelujah! The glorious Lord has overcome death! (Ref: nrev1:1318; 1Cor:15:55)

SongPage.Title: 20. THE LORD IN THE FLESH AND BLOOD
SongPage.Context:
1. In the silent night sky, stars twinkling bright, In the town of Bethlehem my Saviour's born. Lying in a manger, wrapped in cloths, My Lord came in the flesh and blood.
Chorus: The Lord loved me and became flesh, Fully understands my troubles. He became a Man. He feels what I feel. He's full of compassion and love.
2. He once lived on the earth. He once was tired. He once was thirsty, hungry, sad and angry. His heart was once pierced through. He once did weep. He once suffered all pains for me.

SongPage.Title: 22. FOR LOVE, LORD, YOU CAME,
SongPage.Context:
1. For love, You came from heaven to the earth. You were born in a manger. You became the son of a carpenter. But for love, Lord, You came
2. For love, You endured various temptations. You had no place to lay You head. When You were weary, You thought of my needs. And for love, Lord, You came.
3. For love, You're willing to bear all shame. You were spat on the face. You bore all the stripes, wore the crown of thorns. But for love, Lord, You came.
4. For love, You were willing to be nailed. You bore my sins on the cross. For me, You were forsaken by God. But for love, Lord, You came.
5. For love, You've overcome all pains and trials. Lord, I want to follow You. May I love the world with You all my life. For You love I'll go forward.

SongPage.Title: 24. THE DAY THAT YOU'LL CROWN ME
SongPage.Context: When I think of the day You will crown me, Which is the day You come to take me, I can't imagine how I'll be Overwhelmed with joy. In the presence of all You'll show Your love for me. Your desire for me thrills heavens and earth. All tears and sorrows will pass away. You know well all my labour. The wounds on me will change to be Prints and marks of love. Oh? my love for You, No words can tell but You know well My heart feel sweet. My dear Lord, for Your love, I'll cast my crowns before You on that day.

SongPage.Title: 26. THE FATHER'S LOVE
SongPage.Context:
1. I am born of God. I am His dear child. We are closely united. The highest Father's love Is the same forever and ever.
2. He holds me in His arms, He smiles with great content, Kissing me with kisses. His delight towards me Is the same forever and ever.
3. He gazes upon me. His desire is for me. From eternity, His thoughts of love for me Are the same foreverand ever.
4. He gave His Son for me. He gives me all freely. He cares for my whole life, gives me endless glory. Father, O Father, I love You.

SongPage.Title: 27. ALL THINGS CHEER AND CELEBRATE
SongPage.Context: My dear Lord, day and night I think of Your glory. Your desire and Your love capture my heart. Live in Your river of love, feel like in the spring, Like in the morning light, in th' beauty of love. The sun, the moon and the stars, the clouds and the sky, The flowers and the robins All are singing and whispering. They all cheer and celebrate the love between us. Oh! Let me forever live in Your desire.

SongPage.Title: 28. MY TRUE ABBA
SongPage.Context: Abba, You are more real than all things. You are ever overflowing. You and I are fore'er united. I am Yours. You are mine. Because of Your love, Abba, You need me most. Now and fore'er You hold my hand, Enjoy the deepest love.

SongPage.Title: 29. THE FATHER'S PASSIONATE LOVE
SongPage.Context: Abba, since eternity You have thought of me. Your great love was fully revealed on the cross. You indeed suffered the deepest pain for me. On the cross You forsook Your begotten Son. You opened a way; I can go to Your bosom. You love to be on my neck. You are overjoyed for me. Abba, I treasure so much that You need me most, And Your passion to me, Your fatherly love.

SongPage.Title: 30. DAILY FIREWORKS
SongPage.Context:
1. I think of the vast universe, all stars, Your greatness, power and infinite glory, You've named heavenly stars many as seashore. Heavens show Your way and speak of Your glory. How great and holy! Who can compare with You? Glorious! Beautiful! You're the endless fountain! Daily You light fireworks, cause all stars to dance, Celebrate our union, Your love dream's come true.
2. Abba, it is precious I see Your glory. How blessed and glorious to be Your dear child. You've prepared a playground for all of Your sons. Reign with You fore'er, Your sovereignty'll increase. How great and holy! My Abba's glorious! Glorious! Beautiful! My Abba's joyous heart! Daily You light fireworks, cause all stars to dance, Celebrate our joy and the deep affection.

SongPage.Title: 32. YOU ARE THE CONCLUSION OF MY DREAMS
SongPage.Context: You are the conclusion of my dreams! I love You! I pursue You! In You, all of my dreams come true! There's no better stories. No other endings can be as perfect. From the beautiful heart of Yours. Comes this exquisite, perfect plan, Your love and affection Make up all of my days. It makes all so fair; it makes all so sweet. There may be tears, but joy comes at last. What a wonderful life! Because of You and Your will, I treasure my everyday.

SongPage.Title: 34. YOU IN MY LIFE
SongPage.Context:
1. You in my life, I'm no longer lonely or afraid. You in my life, I rejoice, overflow with hope. Your love compels me, it is my sweet rest. Your heart, Your arms are mine. My heart is Yours. March on with You. We fight and dance, Accomplish Your will, Await Your coming.
2. You in my life it's so blessed, warm and beautiful. With You I can use problems and challenge all things. You are my life, giving me the drive. We'll finish Your glorious commission with joy. We're hand in hand, with love interflows, To fight the battle, Accomplish Your will.

SongPage.Title: 36. MY INTIMATE FRIEND
SongPage.Context: What a Friend I have in You, Faithful and true. If men are faithless, Your love is always sure. Whenever I need You, You give Your hand to carry me through. Even men do wrongs to You, The wounds You still can endure. Your love makes me lift my head. Your grace makes me walk ahead. Having such a Friend like You, All my life I'm content. You accompany me to the end, Never leave me, my intimate Friend.

SongPage.Title: 38. WALKING WITH ME
SongPage.Context: I treasure Your calling! You never forget Your promise. Walk with me throughout my journey. You are my closest friend. My past journey was full of Your grace. You have carried me through The long dark valley. No matter in north wind; Or in the south wind; You've always walked with me, Never left me. In my future journey I want to walk with You. Lord, You will keep my heart Until the end.

SongPage.Title: 40. LIVING WITH THE FATHER, THE LORD AND THE SPIRIT
SongPage.Context:
(ETERNAL DANCE OF LOVE)
1. My Abba stretches out His hand, Invites me gladly to join Him and the Lord and the Spirit In Their eternal dance of love. Such love who can fathom, Such joy who can describe, Enter into God's circle of love, My bliss and joy overflow.
2. Daily from morning to night, Abba, the Lord and the Spirit Abide with me and surround me; They walk, work and dance with me. They share Their all with me; Enter deep into my life. Live in such warm and deep fellowship, They are my life and sweet portion.

SongPage.Title: 42. SUCH GREAT LOVE
SongPage.Context:
1. You became flesh, dwelt among men, Full of grace and full of truth. You came from heaven to seek me, And to give me hope. You had no place to lay Your head. You suffered much pain and grief. To fully sympathize me, You offered Yourself. Chorus: Such love as Yours ?so wide and deep; It will always stay the same ?everlasting! I can't measure this great love My heart is amazed. You deserve my love.
2. Nailed on the cross, God forsaken, Who could understand Your pain? Hands, feet were nailed, and blood was shed; You gave up Your all. In that while I was a sinner, Christ gave His life for me; God shows His own love toward me Oh, such love as yours!

SongPage.Title: 44. ONE MORE TIME, ONE MORE TIME
SongPage.Context:
1. Love and trust again, shout for joy again. Pray again, do again, give again, Hope and rejoice again, more passion, Sing and worship again, fly on high. (Once again!)
2. One more time, One more time, more abundant, One more time, One more time, love Him more. One more time, One more time, become glorious. One more time, One more time, be like Him. (One more time)
3. For the Lord, for the Church, I will strive on. Joyfully and bravely I march on. Lift my head, I am of good courage. Trusting Him, we'll finish His work. (Unstoppable!)
4. Raise my hand, lift my head, clap hands and shout. We march on forward with joy. Overflowing with hope, we sing along. We press toward the goal with gladness. (Long to see the Lord's face in the clouds!) (Hallelujah! Clap hands!)

SongPage.Title: 46. IT'S THE LORD, THE AUTHOR AND FINISHER, WHO COMMISSIONED US.
SongPage.Context:
1. It's so precious the glorious Lord Commissioned us in the age! Your grace is sufficient for me, You'll grant me the Holy Spirit! You'll be with us! You'll cowork with us, Followed with Your miracles. Revive Your work, accomplish Your will. There will be a glorious bride waiting for You!
2. You in my life, my hope overflows, I fear no valleys, floods or fires. You are my Beloved and Shepherd, You've fully committed Yourself; You are the First, You are the Last, You'll take care until the end. O Lord, I love You, deeply love Your Church. Faithfully I'll follow You till the end. (May Your bride love You and welcome Your coming!)

SongPage.Title: 48. O LORD, THANK YOU YOU'VE BROUGHT ME TO VANCOUVER
SongPage.Context:
1. O Lord, thank You You've brought me to Vancouver. You know deeply what are my needs. Under the blue sky, You appear to me, That heals, encourages me. Your love lights up my heart, Makes me smile in darkness and storms. We have love interflow in the white snow, Leaving Your footprints and mine.
2. Oh Lord thank You You've brought me to Vancouver. You know deeply what are my needs. You long for me to enter Your love, desire, And the secret of Your heart. You want me to lay down all, To have sweet rest in Your love. You renew my strength, I'll mount up with wings, Go from glory to glory.

SongPage.Title: 1. Such Love As Yours
SongPage.Context:
C 2/4, 3/4
1. Such love as Yours makes me know the true worth in me. Such love as Yours makes me see the beauty of all thins. Life's full of mean-ing worth well to live. Then I un-der-stand why there's e-ter-ni-ty, And I know why Your de-sire is to a-bide in me.
2. Such love as Yours gives me rest in days dim or bright. Such love as Yours makes me live in tender morning light, Gives me hope to run my course with delight. Thorns and swords I conquer overwhelmingly. Lord, in Your love, there is never fear but sweetness only.
3. Such love as Yours teaches me what beauty really means. Such love as Yours teaches me to praise and to give thanks. Turns me into'a poet, a morning bird, Melts me into'a river, vast and flood'd with love, Ever flowing, toward the earth's end, till eternity.
4. Such love as Yours abounds in deeds, warmth and thoughts so deep. Such love as Yours keeps my spirit alive, ever-fresh, Cheering me to climb up the highest peak, Blowing me to sail toward the boundless sea, Ever love You, follow You to the corners of the world.
5. Such love as Yours makes me long for the heavenly home. Such love as Yours makes me long to see Your glorious face. O Lord Jesus, may You come, may You come! In the holy city of light 'nd love we live, Sharing with You, endless songs and mornings eternally.

SongPage.Title: 3. The Love Of The Beloved
SongPage.Context:
G 6/8
1. O, my Beloved ?so glo-ri-ous, He is a-bove all things. His love to me is high and deep Through-out e-ter-ni-ty. To gain my heart He became flesh. For ma-ny years He suffered much. He did love me and die for me. He de-sires me.
2. O, my Beloved, His fervent love Is like flashes of fire. Many waters cannot quench love. His love is stronger than death. All things may change, His love's the same. His love to me is ever fresh. He lives with me from dawn to dusk. He desires me.
3. O, my Beloved loves me deeply. He suffered all for me. My eyes of faith capture His heart, And make His heart beat faster. I'm His darling, His dearest one. He shouts for joy, dances for me, Quiet for me; His heart is filled. He desires me.
4. O, my Beloved ?His tender love Satisfies all my heart. He is the myrrh between my breasts. That heals the wounds of my heart. His love gives me joy, rest and peace, He draws me. I overcome the world. He gives me faith to pass through all. I desire Him!

SongPage.Title: 6. The Lamb Who Was Slain
SongPage.Context: C4/4 You are worthy to take the scroll And to o-pen its seals for You were slain And have redeemed us to God by Your blood out of every tribe And tongue and peo-ple and na-tion and have made us kings And priests to our God and we shall reign on the earth Then I looked and I heard the voice of ma-ny an-gels A-round the throne, th' li-ving crea-tures And the el-ders and the num-ber Of them was thousand of thou-sand say-ing With a loud voice, "Worthy is the Lamb Who was slain to re-ceive po-wer, Riches, wisdom, might, honour, glo-ry, and blessing" And every crea-ted thing which is in heaven, on the earth And un-der the earth and in the sea and all in them I heard saying, "Blessing and honour and glory and pow'r To Him who sits on the throne And to the Lamb for-ev-er!"

SongPage.Title: 8. The Perfect Salvation
