SongPage.Context:
1. My sins more than I can number, His blood washed me white as snow. He has purged my conscience. Now I am free before God. Precious blood redeemed me. What can I pay Him back? Let me enjoy Your great love And Your perfect salvation.
2. I was away from the Father. By His blood, He brought me back. The precious veil was torn for me. I can see the Father's face. I dwell in the Holy Place, My home's God's tabernacle. God's perfect love casts out my fear. And I cry, "Lord, may You come!"
3. My Lord's ascended to heaven For me, appears before God. In heav'nly place I sit with Him, Enjoy the Father's delight. Closest to the Father, Closest to the Father, I am His dear child forever. It's so sweet to cry, "Abba!"
4. The bitter way You walked for me. You said, "Finished!" on the cross. You lay down Your life for me That I can embrace You. Lord, let me see Your heart, Move me to love You more. I offer my life for You, Forever I will love You.

SongPage.Title: 10. Love Never Fails
SongPage.Context: D 4/4 Love! Love has no end, it never fails "Tis my spi-rits's ex-peri-ence. Sometimes, I even find myself or-di-na-ry. Yet, beyond the sky, in this u-ni-verse, There is a gaze of ten-der love on me. Each time when I lift up my head, The mo-ment we meet, I know that I am no or-di-na-ry, Be-cause I have ravished His heart. (For He is a man for-e-ver.)

SongPage.Title: 11. My Life Response
SongPage.Context: D 2/4, 3/4 Eve-ry stage of my life is my opportu-ni-ty To show my love to the Lord, In my youth, I loved you; enjoyed heaven on earth. My vi-sion was clear and bright, I strived for you in my twen-ties. Thru' all trials, I built the church in my prime- So pre-cious to strive for You! I am will-ing to love You more From now to the day I see Your face. Let me go from peak to peak. O Lord, I thank You for taking care of my life; Pav-ing my path with Your great love and grace, Making my path shine until the perfect day, E-ver bright-er! See You one day, I'll love You more, Not that I can i-ma-gine!

SongPage.Title: 13. Let's Dance And Shout For Joy
SongPage.Context:
Bb 4/4 1. Let us dance for the joy-ful news! Christ a-rose from the dead! He's ri-sen! He's ri-sen! We shall rejoice. Let us dance! For the Lord is ri-sen! For the Lord lives for-ev-er-more!
2. Let us dance. He rules over all. He loves me forever. He's ascend'd. He's ascend'd. We shall rejoice, shout for joy! For the Lord is glorified. For the Lord is glorified forever!
3. Shout for joy! He's coming quickly To take us to His home. He's coming! He's coming! This is our wish, t'is our wish! May the Lord Jesus come soon! We'll live together in heav'n forever!
4. Shout for joy! He will come to reign, To restore all things. The Lord reigns! The Lord reigns! All lands rejoice, shout for joy! For the Lord Jesus will reign! For the Lord Jesus will reign forever!

SongPage.Title: 15. Walk Hand In Hand
SongPage.Context: Eb 4/4 Side by side, marching for-ward, With love, I respond to His grace. Heart to heart we are, hand in hand follow Him. For Him, I'll pour out my whole life. With faith, ne-ver give up, To-ge-ther we strive for the breakthrough, Fac-ing our goal, stride o-ver all hardships, His will let us ac-com-plish. March on, ne-ver turn back, O-ver-come thousands of storms, Pass thru' all trials toge-ther, With one mind, ne-ver part; Hand in hand, with-out a-ny fear For the love of the Lord's in my heart. For my life, I won't turn back.

SongPage.Title: 17. The Father's True Child
SongPage.Context:
D 4/4 1. I am the true child of the Fa-ther. He knew me be-fore all cre-at-ion. All the days of my life, My Fa-ther has al-rea-dy well planned.
2. I am the true child of the Father. The Father's love nourishes my heart. Daily I behold the Father. Live out a life of the Father's dear child.
3. I should have the heart of a child, Enjoy His bosom of love, care-free, Full of glory, I shine forth. Live out and build the Father's sweet household.
4. How precious to be His beloved child! All that the Father has belongs to me. Rich men, presidents can't compare- The Father's eternal kingdom is mine!

SongPage.Title: 18. The Lord's Grace And Love Accompany Me All My Life
SongPage.Context:
D 4/4 1. Lord, Your grace and love are higher than the sky. You've al-rea-dy plan-ned my life's path. E-ven though va-ri-ous trials trouble me, Your gracious hands will sure-ly lead me. For the will of the Father, You came to this world; For this household, You gave out Your all. And though the bit-ter cup was hard to bear, For love, You despised the cross. You humbled Your-self to live me up; Your sa-cri-fice has made me rich. On the cross, You denied Yourself, So that we can be u-nit-ed. For Your commission, I de-ny my-self; I give my all to respond to Your love. On this path, I'll hold on-to Your hands, Trusting deeply, You will surely lead me.
2. My Lord, Your fervent love has melted my heart. No longer do I live for myself. There's nothing in heaven that I admire, Nor any on earth that I can desire. This friendship between You and me is long and deep. All words cannot describe this feeling. It's precious that You now dwell in my heart. You know me and understand my deeply. Your gentle voice does encourage me. Your precious words can comfort me. I can never forget the time ? I draw near to You, share with You. It's precious that one day, You will come back, I can behold Your deep wounds of love. Your love indeed has never changed. All pains and tears will turn to glorious crowns.

SongPage.Title: 21. I Will Love You, Not Be Shy
SongPage.Context: Eb 4/4 May my love be fer-vent to You. May I pour out my love to You. I will lift up my hands. I will dance and I will sing. I'll joy-ful-ly pro-claim: (He is risen!) No more hid-ing; no more fear. I don't mind how peo-ple feel. With pass-ion, I jump and laugh. O-ver and o-ver I say it a-gain: I love You! I love You! I will love You with my all, not be shy. With all my strength, I'll te=ll eve-ry-one You're wonderful. You're li-ving with me. I en-joy You; You en-joy me. It is so free and sweet ?A life of love!

SongPage.Title: 23. Wonderful Miracle
SongPage.Context:
G 6/4 1. O God's greatest mi-ra-cle! Al-migh-ty mi-ra-cle! I have become the true child of God; Born of Him, He's my Ab-ba! Who can describe my bliss!
2. I can enjoy the Father's love Toward His beloved Son, And the deepest father's affection! Let me sing and dance with joy, Have the heart of a child.
3. My heart is free, delight'd and sweet- I can cry out, "Abba!" In His bosom I'm delight'd and warm. Joyfully I work with Him, To build Abba's household. (One day I'll see His face.)

SongPage.Title: 25.This Deepest Affection Is True!!
SongPage.Context:
D4/4 1. It's most precious I am born of You. Your seed a-bides in me. Your life and my life for-e-ver u-nit-ed! I am Your bo-som dear child.
2. Father, You have numbered my hair. Your love thoughts are more than stars. Over me, You shout for joy and dance! O what a father I have.
3. Father, You have committed Yourself, Forever I affect You! Your calling is so glorious. Your love plan is beautiful.
4. You are the only normal Abba. Nothing can compare Your love. Father-son affection satisfies our hearts! (Abba and me) For this affection is true!!
10-1-2007 Translated from the author's Chinese hymn, Home in Laguna City, HK

SongPage.Title: 27. How Precious-God Is My Abba
SongPage.Context: D4/4 How precious ?God is my Ab-ba, His smile's so bright to me. His bosom of love is so warm. I en-joy His love and rich-es. Abba's af-fect-ion satisfies my heart. I rest and rejoice in this love, Abba's love captures my heart.

SongPage.Title: 28. Gaze Of Love And Joy
SongPage.Context: D3/4, 4/4 Ab-ba, Your gaze of af-fect-ion, Love and joy, ad-mi-rat-ion Has drawn my heart, made me re-joice, Gaze on You. (Fly to You.) Your fervent love, Passion, em-brace Are my joy, delight and rest For-e-ver.

SongPage.Title: 29. Your Love Dream- To Live In My Heart
SongPage.Context:
G3/4 1. O Lord, You are more real than all things. You're in-fi-nite, e-ver o'er flowing. You and I are deeply u-nit-ed. One spi-rit, heart to heart. For Your end-less love, O Lord, You need me most. Your dream of love-to live in my heart, Live with me day and night. (Live a love life with me.)
2. O Lord, You are more real than all things. You're infinite, overflow with life. You and I are deeply united. I've Your precious presence. (It is so warm and sweet) For Your endless love, O Lord, You need me most. Hand in hand we walk this path of love. Fore'er we fall in love.

SongPage.Title: 31. The Lord's Love Dream: His Gaze Of Love
SongPage.Context:
G3/4
My dear Lord, You're a-bove all, more real than all things. In heav'n You live for me and You sur-round me; You e-ven live in my heart, You're close-st to me. I trea-sure day and night You're gaz-ing on me. I'm a-mazed from long a-go, Your love dream was me; In the universe, You want me to be Your dearest darling! With You, I live a life of sweet-ness and beau-ty, You love thoughts are e-ver ac-tive to-wards me.

SongPage.Title: 32. What A Glorious Beloved
SongPage.Context:
D4/4
I have such a glorious Be-loved. He is the Son of the Most High God. He's so gen-tle, hum-ble, friendly, Per-fect, a-do-ra-ble. He once calmed the rag-ing wa-ter. He cast a-way Satan's po-wer. He up-holds all things; He raised the dead. He healed the sick and He filled the hunger. Oh?He's God and the Son of Man. He died but He rose a-agin. He died for me to bear my sins, And to-day He lives in my heart!

SongPage.Title: 34. The Scene Of Revival
SongPage.Context:
Ab 3/2
1. Till the Spi-rit is poured on us From on high, from on high. The de-sert be-comes a rich field, Which seems like a for-est.
2. May You pour the Holy Spirit Upon us, upon us. The desert becomes a rich field, Which seems like a forest.
(Ref: Isa. 32:15)

SongPage.Title: 35. Emmanuel ?God Is Forever Man
SongPage.Context:
C4/4
1. Lord, You did know You would suffer much on the earth. Lord, You did know You'd be nailed on the cross. My glorious Lord, You had not a sin-gle doubt. For love You longed to be a Man fore'er. O, my dear Lord, it's so precious You have come. Fore'er a Man, that deeply comforts my heart. You take a-way all my fears and dis-tance. You want to be the closest, closest to me. (O Lord, now and for-e-ver You dwell in my heart.)
2. Fore'er a Man, You make me know my own value And my precious position in Your heart. Lord, Your coming shook the heavens and the earth, And the angels are forever amazed. O my dear Lord, it's so precious You have come. You've decided to commit Yourself fore'er. Such fervent love comforts my heart and gives me warmth. May I enjoy Your presence now and forever. Emmanuel, You're worthy of my love fore'er.

SongPage.Title: 37. Skipping Thru The Mountains, He Came With Joy
SongPage.Context:
Bb6/8
A heav'nly Child was born for me! His dear name is Je-sus! Leaping thru mountains He came with joy! He loves to be a Man for-e-ver! His gen-tle-ness shows His great-ness! His ten-der love captures my heart!
1-2-2007 Translated form the author's Chinese hymn, La Chi Kok Bay meeting place

SongPage.Title: 38. A Child Was Born Unto Us
SongPage.Context:
D3/4
1. A hea-ven-ly Child was born to me! His dear name is Je-sus! O He had come! Skipping thru mountains He came with Joy! O He loves to be a Man-close-st to me.
2. You are infinite, so glorious! Yet became a lovely Child, You draw near to us. Lord, Your gentleness shows Your greatness! Your warm love and tenderness captures my heart.
1-2-2007 Translated form the author's Chinese hymn, La Chi Kok Bay meeting place

SongPage.Title: 39. The Feast Of Love
SongPage.Context:
D2/2
1. This feast of love is pre-pared by the Lord, Full of love, warmth and sweet-ness, That I re-member Him and the love of the cross, En-ter deep-er in-to His love. (Respond to His love all my life.)
2. On the cross, the Lord gave Himself for me, That I'm alive, whiter than snow, That He may forever live in my heart. Now and ever, I live with Him.

SongPage.Title: 40. Walk The Way Of Eternal Life Together
SongPage.Context:
E4/4
1. Let us feed on the faithfulness of God, And re-joice in Him eve-ry day. Walk the e-verlasting way to-gether To bring forth a lasting re-vi-val. (To finish the Lord's will with glory.)
2. Let us rejoice greatly in the Lord, Set Him always before us. Draw near to Him and walk with Him daily. Live with Him and love Him day and night.
3. Begin each glorious day with the Lord, Lift your head, raise your hands, pray to Him. Sing to Him, shout for joy, leap and dance, Gaze on Him, smile to Him always.

SongPage.Title: 41. Drink From A Brook By The Wayside
SongPage.Context:
Eb4/4
From the brook by wayside: I drink and lift my head. On-ward I march. Walk with Him day and night; Walk on-to high place. Glo-ry up-on glo-ry, Of-fer my love. (We both re-joice.)

SongPage.Title: 42. Cherish All Days Living With The Lord In This Life
SongPage.Context:
D4/4
1. O Lord, You are my dwelling place. I've no rest beside You. Teach me to number our days, To gain a heart of wisdom. Lord, help me hold fast My first love for You. Fill me ear-ly with Your love, By You, re-joice eve-ry day.
2. Make us glad accord'ng to the days You have afflicted us. Revive Your work and manifest Your glory to each of us. May Your beauty and glory rest on us; Guide and bless us and establish The work of our hands for us.

SongPage.Title: 44. Striving For The Lord My Whole Life
SongPage.Context:
D4/4
1. O let us rejoice in God, Walk the e-ver-last-ing way, Bring forth a last-ing re-vi-val, Ac-com-plish God's glo-ri-ous will. Let's practice god-li-ness, Day and night live to Him. Glo-ry and joy e-ver in-creas-ing, Let's of-fer our love to Him.
2. Never stray from the right way, Pressing towards the goal. Ne'er deny the heavenly vision. Finish the last beautiful race. May you and I arise, Strive for Him all through our life. Be faithful to the Lord unto death, Till we meet Him in the clouds.
"I will strive for the Lord my whole life!"

SongPage.Title: 46. The Song Of Deborah
SongPage.Context:
G6/4
1. O De-borah, you should awake. A-wake! Awake! And sing! O my brethren, may you arise. And lead your captives a-way. Leap o'er a wall of Him. (For Him, run through a troop.)
2. O my brethren, why stand aside, With only thoughts and plans? O my brethren, why stay in rest, Waiting, sitting, piping, And not cowork with Him?
3. O my spirit, march on in faith! Strive on and on in strength! For Him run to the front and fight! Forceful, daring, with might! Be strong, take great courage!
4. Brothers, sisters, unit'd in love, Let's stand as one person. Together as charcoals on fire, Prevail o'er gates of foes, Kindle revival fire!
5. O Lord of hosts, may all Your foes Retreat, scatter, perish! He who loves You be like the sun, Shines forth in all its strength, Glory upon glory!
6. In this last period of the Church, Many aren't cold nor hot. May you arise, strive for the Lord, Bring forth greatest revival. Let's accomplish God's will.

SongPage.Title: 48. The Night Is Far Spent And The Dawn Is coming
SongPage.Context:
D4/4
Trials and darkness aren't for-ev-er. Dark vales will have their end. He cause' all things work for my good, Guide me to a-bun-dant land. The night is far spent. The dawn is at hand. A small cloud can bring hea-vy rain, He will show His glorious works.

SongPage.Title: 49. Living In The Father's Delight
SongPage.Context:
C4/4
1. You sent Your Son to be a Man To die for me on the cross, So I can live in Your bo-som. Now I know You de-light in me.
2. The veil was torn, and You dashed out, Embrace me to Your heart. You kiss me, rejoice for me. Now I know You delight in me.
3. Abba Father, You have inscribed My name fore'er on Your palm. I am Your beloved son. Now I know You delight in me.
4. You meet me with Your mercy. You help me with Your count'nace. Your thoughts for me exceed the stars. Now I know You delight in me.
5. You gave me to Your beloved Son As Your most precious gift. I am the Lord's dearest darling. Now I know You delight in me.

SongPage.Title: 51. The Deepest Affection Of The Son of God.
SongPage.Context:
His River Of Joy
(Melody: Who Affect the Lord the Most)
O, Lord Your life, affection and joy Is like an ever rushing fall. Ever overflows, overwhelms my heart. Now I can drink from Your river of joy. Day'n night You attend to me, Gazing with Your longing. Your love's full of passion, romance and beautiful. The very flame of Jehovah. Your reaction is like volcanic eruption. Your thoughts of love are more than stars. For me You shout for joy. You sing and dance. You delight in me, You desire me. You meet me with lovingkindness. You in my life, infinite bliss and joy. I live in th'depth of Your heart. I enjoy a love life with You. I feel satisfied and warm. (My heart ever overflows.)

SongPage.Title: 52. Living In The Lord's Delight
SongPage.Context:
C4/4
1. You leap with joy, came as a child. You saw the joy a-head, Despised all shame, endured the cross. Now I know You de-light in me.
2. Your personal love towards me Made You give Yourself for me. Your desire, Your flame of love, Now I know You delight in me.
3. Your eternal dream of love is To live fore'er in my heart. My heart is Your favourite dwelling. Now I know You delight in me.
4. How can I not respond to You? I long to love You only, Day and night draw near to You. O Lord Jesus, may You come soon.

SongPage.Title: 54. Your Desire And Gazing Day And Night
SongPage.Context:
F4/4
1. Day and night, think of me, desire me, dear Lord, You al-ways at-tend to me. You long to see my face, hear my voice, dear Lord, Sweet-ly and close-ly live with me. You have loved me since e-ter-ni-ty, dear Lord, Un-chang-ing, o'erflowing, e-ver fresh. Living in the depth of Your heart and embrace, I feel so sweet. My heart o'erflows.
2. You fully involve Yourself in my life, Lord, Now and through all eternity. Forever live with You, in love with You, Lord, Nothing can compare my joy. Now I live in Your love and desire, dear Lord, My heart's satisfied, overflowing. With all my heart I'll respond to You, dear Lord. Forever we embrace in love.

SongPage.Title: 56. Fruit Of His Precious Blood
SongPage.Context:
(Melody: Who Affect the Lord the Most)
Infinite thanks for the blood Your Son! O what a full glorious salvation! Take away my sins, fully purged my conscience. Set me free! Give me vict'ry o'er Satan! Lift up my head, make me smile, Give me peace and boldness. O, now I can abide in the Holiest. Nesting under Your wings, I rest. O how sweet to nest in the warmth of Your bosom, Daily enjoy Your affection. The bliss that I live in, I can't describe! Dear Abba, it's the best to be Your child, Co-heir with Christ to inherit all. O what a bright eternity, Endless love journey. Sit on the throne, with You and the Lord; Fore'er together live in love.
10-1-2007 Sai Fa Road Tennis Court's Round building, HK

SongPage.Title: 1. Lift Up Your Head And Rejoice
SongPage.Context:
Bb 3/4
1. All the trees raise their hands. All the flow'rs lift up their heads. Oh, my soul, Be-hold the Lord. He is glo-ry!
2. The trees are making music. The birds are singing aloud. Oh, my soul, Rejoice! Rejoice! Be glad in the Lord!
3. Vict'ry leaves say, "It's finished!" Heart-shaped leaves speak of His love. Oh, my soul, Enjoy God's love, the fruits of the cross!

SongPage.Title: 2. Wing To The Air
SongPage.Context:
D 4/4
Though the Morning Star has not appeared, The world's signs, Bi-ble pro-phe-cies Make it clear the dawn is near; Let me face the fight dai-ly! In my heart is the hope of glo-ry. Be stead-fast till the task's a-chieved. To-day and to-mor-row march on still, For the toil in God is not in vain. Be faith-ful till death the crown to gain. When the last trumpet we'll hear that day, Lift our eyes, and see His glo-rious face. End-less ju-bi-lat-ion! Our bo-dy will be changed! We'll ex-ult and glo-ry. We'll be filled with o-ver-whelm-ing joy, Winging to the air with all the saints. O, what a glo-ri-ous mo-ment! To the air I long to wing my flight!

SongPage.Title: 4. Manifold Evidence
SongPage.Context:
C 3/4 4/4
The heavens and earth tell me Your love. Your letter of love shows me Your love. Your journey on earth proves me Your love. Your precious blood is the proof that shakes the world. Now and e-ver You live in me, Commit Yourself to af-firm Your love to me. My past jour-ney full of Your grace. All show Your love so ten-der, steadfast to me. O my Be-loved, for-e'er I'm Yours. Tru-ly, Your heart, Your arms, Your love, Your strength, Your life For-e-ver be-long to me.

SongPage.Title: 6. Love Getting Deeper And Deeper
SongPage.Context:
D 4/4
1. I en-joyed Your love from my youth And now what should I fear? Our relationship is long and deep. You know how to treat Your friend. Whenou kiss me I for-get the world. Enjoy in Your bo-som of love, Em-brace in th' ri-ver of love.
2. Day by day our friendship grows. Now is even better. Your love paved my past journey. All suff'rings are sweet to me. Your love is the same. Now I know it more. Your love and desire ever fresh. Union with You is so sweet.

SongPage.Title: 8. I Can Only Live In His Love And Grace
SongPage.Context:
D 4/4
I can on-ly live in His love and grace And grow in His de-sire for me. Dai-ly let me live in His joy over me And drink ful-ly in His love. I love be-cause He first loved me.

SongPage.Title: 9. Rejoice In The Lord Always
SongPage.Context:
D 4/4
Rejoice, re-joice in the Lord al-ways And I say a-gain, re-joice; For the joy of the Lord is your strength. The joy of the Lord is your strength.

SongPage.Title: 10. I Affect Abba The Most
SongPage.Context:
Bb 2/4 3/4 4/4
It's so pre-cious, I af-fect You the most From e-ver-last-ing to e-ver-last-ing. For You and me You have the plan of love. You creat'd the a-bun-dant u-ni-verse, The stars dance ev-ery-day. Your handi-work is de-li-cate and wonder-ful. Ev'n e-lec-trons sing, praise and dance. They praise; You're all wise, Al-migh-ty, all lov-ing. All things work to-ge-ther for me. You de-sire me to be co-heir with Christ And share His glo-ry, in-her-it all, And sit with You on the throne. I trea-sure this af-fect-ion most. We are deep-ly u-nit'd. You are my dear Ab-ba for-e-ver! Our hearts are filled, o-ver-flow!

SongPage.Title: 12. The Love Thoughts Of Abba
SongPage.Context:
Bb 2/4 3/4 4/4
I am a-mazed I af-fect You the most! You thought of me from e-ter-ni-ty past. Your thoughts of love to me are so precious. They are more than all the sand or the stars. Ab-ba, Your beau-ti-ful heart, Full of love and deep thoughts. You yearn for me to be Your child, And Your heir. We're u-nit-ed. You want me to Be con-formed to the Im-age of Your Son, To be like Him, share Your glo-ry. Every day You re-joice and sing for me. You meet me with Your love. You smile to me. You hold my hand to-wards the peak. I work with You, and press to-ward the goal. To ac-complish Your will. One day, the Lord will take me home. I'll see You face to face.

SongPage.Title: 14. Gaze Of Love, Ever - Active Thoughts
SongPage.Context:

SongPage.Title: 35 Lullaby Of Love
SongPage.Context:
D 3/4
My Be-loved, my best Friend, May You kiss my eye-lids. Let me sleep in Your bo-som, I may dream of You to-night. I trea-sure You're with me, Surround and look af-ter me. In the morn, I wake up And You are still with me.

SongPage.Title: 36 The Land of Affliction Prospers, Rejoices And Shines Forth
SongPage.Context:
D 3/4
1. O Lord, thank You - You raised this glorious movement. You are the First and the Last. You ful-ly un-der-stand our suff'rings of the past, Per-se-cu-tion and slan-der. May You vin-di-cate us And stretch out Your migh-ty right hand. We'll pros-per in the land of af-flict-ion, Show Your glo-ry and vict'-ry.
2. O Lord, thank You for Your love and faithfulness. Your grace is sufficient for us. Let us see ahead the joy and the glory; Fill us with hope and laughter. Lord, You formed us, You'll use us. You will never forget us. We're like the sun coming out in full strength, Light up and bless the whole world. You'll bless this last heat of th'race, The lasting revival's kindled. There'll be the most glorious church to welcome Your glorious second coming. O Lord, may You come quick-ly!

SongPage.Title: 1 The Jewel In Abba's Heart
SongPage.Context:
D 4/4
1. Ab-ba lays a wed-ding feast for His Son, Gives me to His be-loved Son, Through Him now I can co-heir with Christ, In-he-rit and rule all things.
2. He needs me most in the whole universe. Father, I affect You most! You ran out and kissed me with many kisses; For me, You rejoiced and danced.

SongPage.Title: 2 Born To Be Dearest
SongPage.Context:
F 4/4
1. I trea-sure Your beau-ti-ful heart, Ab-ba. I am more than Your best cre-at-ion, I'm born of You! Dear-est, close-st to You. I en-joy with the Lord Deepest love, highest af-fect-ion of Yours.
2. Now I can inherit all with the Lord. He is not ashamed to call me brethren, Because I was born of You, born of You. I am dearest to You. My Abba, Your work is so wonderful. (My Abba, Your work satisfies my heart.)
3. My Abba, I treasure Your wondrous work. Your seed forever abides in me. So I can bear pleasant fruit for You - Infinitely glorious! Shining forth light that shines ever brighter.
4. I treasure Your beautiful heart, Abba - Eternal love thoughts, deepest affection, Full attention, love from the beginning, Your thoughts exceeding all stars, Gaze of love and Your delight towards me.
5. Every day joyfully I go to You, Run to Your open arms, bosom of love. Sweetly I taste this deepest affection, Most beautiful, highest love. Leaping with joy, I embrace You.

SongPage.Title: 4 "Golden Fish" Above Dark Clouds
SongPage.Context:
Ab 3/4
One day on Lam-ma Is-land, The sun was set-ting; I saw one glorious "golden fish" Rid-ing a-bove dark clouds. Lord, thank You for Your Won-der-ful pic-ture To en-cour-age, pro-mise me - I'll triumph o-ver dark clouds.

SongPage.Title: 5 He Walks With Me Through Valleys To Land Of Abundance
SongPage.Context:
Eb 4/4
1. My dear Lord holds my hand To walk on this glorious ma-ra-thon. He is faithful in His commission. Step by step, He's led me to His heart.
2. My dear Lord holds my hand To walk on this warm and joyful path. This path of love paved with pink petals - O how sweet, my heart is satisfied.
3. He holds me tight to pass through Floods and fires, slanders, long dark valleys. Abundant feast He lays for me. He leads me to the abundant land.
4. Long, dark valleys are over! He's kindled lasting revival. He will stretch out His mighty right hand To finish His most beautiful will! (A glorious bride to welcome Him back!) Hallelujah!

SongPage.Title: 7 Long Dark Valleys Are Over
SongPage.Context:
Eb 4/4
1. You won't for-get Your com-miss-ion; You are the First and the Last. You make all things work to-ge-ther. Your faith-ful-ness is my rest.
2. Long, dark valleys are over; You've brought me to th' fairest land. Vale of weeping is turned to spring; The way ahead is glorious.
3. By faith march forward with You. Run towards the goal with joy. You pour down the Holy Spirit - Wilderness becomes forest. (A fairest bride welcomes You.)
4. Long, dark valleys are over; You've brought me to th' fairest land. Vale of weeping is turned to spring; The way ahead is glorious.

SongPage.Title: 9 The Wonderful Eternal Dance Of Love
SongPage.Context:
D 3/4,4/4
The e-ter-nal dance of Ab-ba and the Lord And the Ho-ly Spi-rit - won-der-ful and sweet! You are boundless; You self- ex-ist, O-ver-flow-ing with life and love. I par-take in this cir-cle of love. What a blessing to live in this love! Let me worship Ab-ba and the Lord. My joy is full; my heart rests, o-ver-flows. My heart rests, o-ver-flows.

SongPage.Title: 10 Living In The Embrace Of Abba, The Lord And The Holy Spirit
SongPage.Context:
Eb 3/4,4/4
Ab-ba, the Lord, the Spi-rit Day and night em - brace me. I'm sur-round'd by Ab-ba With His deep af-fect-ion; Embraced by the Lord With His ro-man-tic love; And the Spi-rit bore me and car-ries me With ten-der love. I'm so blessed I can take part in Their E-ter-nal dance, en-joy deep-est u-nion. We sing and dance for-ev'r.

SongPage.Title: 12 Dearest Abba, How Great You Are!
SongPage.Context:
G 3/4
1. Dear-est Ab-ba, How great You are! You once sent Your be-loved Son, And on the cross You chastised Him. O, You love me dear-ly! Your gen-tle-ness and Your great love Make me re'-lize how great You are! You love me as You love the Lord. How beau-ti-ful is Your heart!
2. Abba, who can measure Your love? You once sent Your beloved Son, And on the cross You chastised Him, For You need me the most. Your love - boundless, Your heart - all fair, Make me re'lize how great You are! You embrace me into Your heart And in Your love I feel so warm. (In Your bosom my heart is sweet.)
3. Dearest Abba, how great You are! You love me as You love the Lord! I'm born of You though I'm creat'd; I now co-heir with Christ. You are my true Ab-ba! Your affection and Your great love Make me re'lize how great You are. Let me deeply enter Your love. Love You forev'r, love You the most.

SongPage.Title: 14 The Utmost Of My Abba
SongPage.Context:
D 3/4
From e-ter-ni-ty past when there's no be-gin-ning To e-ter-ni-ty which has no end, You're thinking a-bout me, You've gi ven me the best: You gave me Your on-ly be-loved Son. You e-ven for-sook Him on the cross. You once suffered the great-est pain. Your heart was pierced through with ma-ny ar-rows - I en-ter the ho-ly place. You want me to en-ter the depth of Your heart; In one spirit I am joined with You - I am Your dear-est one, You love me as the Lord. I en-joy Your high-est Father's love. Now I taste Your deep-est af-fect-ion. I'm born of You, dear-est to You. I am most glo-rious, the most blessed one. You want me to be like the Lord. Ab-ba, You're o-verwhelmed with joy for me Because You've gained what You have long de-sired. Out of Your boundless love You real-ly need me most. You tru-ly need me the most. Your love is wholeheart-ed, com-mit-ted. Be-cause You are in-fi-nite, Your love to me is the most per-son-al. I give thanks to You, my Ab-ba. I tru-ly af-fect You the most!

SongPage.Title: 17 The Tender Love And Footsteps Of The Lamb
SongPage.Context:
C 4/4
O my dear Lord, Your love to me is so precious. You're in-fi-nite; who can tell Your glo-ry? Yet, Lord, You came with joy, leaping through moun-tains; Be-came a Man, You're born in a man-ger. Na-za-reth was Your home town. Des-pised by men, A car-pen-ter, dai-ly You faced wood and nails. You've long de-cid'd to die for me on the cross. Lord, I trea-sure Your beau-ti-ful journey on earth. O Lord, be-sides You to whom would I be-long? You were chastised and for-sa-ken by God. You bore all shame for me and gave Your life. On the cross, You o-pened Your heart. Free-ly I live In Your deep-est love.

SongPage.Title: 20 The Lord Treasures To Have Me
SongPage.Context:
G 3/4
I de-sired you be-fore time be-gan. You are the love se-cret of My heart. You're My love dream, My joy a-head. I longed to gain you. I be-came a Man Bore the cruel cross for you. (I keep My wounds of love.) I be-trothed you with My precious blood. I'm o-ver-joyed for you! For you I shout for joy. For you I sing and dance. I treasure to have you for-e-ver. We're close-ly u-nit-ed. Now I live in your heart, Day and night live with you. Sweet-ly We live a love life of joy In the ri-ver of love.

SongPage.Title: 22 I'm For You, Your Heart Is Reserved For Me
SongPage.Context:
D 4/4
I ap-pear in Your love. I'll stay in Your love for-e-ver. I ex-ist be- cause of You. Your heart has long been re-served for me. I've been on Your mind E-ver since e-ter-ni-ty past. E-ter-ni-ty is ours - Re-joice in our em-brace of love. Walk on the path of end-less love. You have dreamed of me since eter-ni-ty past. For-e-ver we will live in love, The end-less dream!

SongPage.Title: 24 I Am Your Sweet Heart
SongPage.Context:
D 3/4
1. I am Your hap-pi-ness I am Your great de-light I am the sweetness of Your heart I am the jew'l of Your heart.
2. I am Your great work I am Your glory I am Your model of love I am the jew'l of Your heart
3. I think of You - You rejoice I praise You - You enjoy Your heart is sweetened by my songs I'm in Your heart forever.

SongPage.Title: 25 By You Now Is The Best
SongPage.Context:
Bb 4/4
By You, now is the best, For You're bet-ter than all. I'm not ashamed when I re-ly on You. By You I will re-joice. I once be-lieved The past's bet-ter than now. And I for-got You are with me now, Your love is surround-ing me. You're lov-ing me, em-brac-ing me. Your love has ne-ver changed. For You are bet-ter than all, By You now is the best.

SongPage.Title: 27 He Loves Me And He Chose Me
SongPage.Context:
C 4/4
1. Lord, You chose me; it moves my heart. Your per-son-al love to me! I am Your cho-sen ves-sel. May I close-ly co-work with You - By Your will serve this ge-ne-rat-ion, Fi-nish Your will with glo-ry and joy.
2. Among thousands, Lord, You chose me, Gave me this glorious commission. Your wonderful, personal love Touches my heart, captures my heart.
3. Lord, what can I render to You? I'll follow You to the end. I'll live for You, strive to the end, Sing all the way, love You only.

SongPage.Title: 28 Rebuild David's Tabernacle
SongPage.Context:
Cm 4/4
After this I will return, I will re-turn And I will build a-gain David's taber-na-cle Which has fall-en down I'll re-build its ruins And I will set it up
(ref. Acts 15:16)

SongPage.Title: 29 The Lord's Desire And Mine
SongPage.Context:
Ab 3/4,4/4
1. Fa-ther, I de-sire that they whom You have gi-ven me Be with Me where I am, be with Me where I am So that they may see My glory which You have given Me For You loved Me be-fore the foun-dat-ion of the world I de-sire to be in them Be one spi-rit with them, Most deeply united, live with them day and night, En-joy the sweetest u-nion, Live in the ri-ver of love.
2. Father, I desire that wherever the Lord is I'll be with Him forever, with Him forever, To see the Lord's glory which You have given to Him. For You loved me and the Lord before the world was. I treasure the Lord lives in me, I'm in the depth of His heart. Most deeply united, we are in one spirit, Enjoy the sweetest union.
(ref. John 17:24)

SongPage.Title: 31 That Is The Day
SongPage.Context:
Bb 4/4
That is the day, the wedding feast of the Lamb. This is the feast set by Abba, the core of His plan. That is the day of the glad-ness of His heart - The Lord waits ev-ery day. We are not in-vit-ed to the feast, but indeed We are the glorious bride of the Lamb, Com-pa-ti-ble to the Lord. He died for us - He used His blood And His true love to be-troth us. How joy-ous He is that He has gained my heart. And on that day my dear Lord'll come to hold my hand. Before all things He'll declare His heart is for-e-ver mine. We are al-ways the je-wel of His heart. His love is in our hearts. No one can e-ver set us a-part. For-ev'r we are heart to heart. He has poured forth His high-est love. He won't turn back; to Him I be-long. We are in love for-ev'r.

SongPage.Title: 33 40-Year Glorious Journey
SongPage.Context:
Ab 9/8
Long ways train a man. Time tests faith -ful - ness. Tri-als show en-d'rance. Tes-ti-mon-ies win. Flam-ing in cold world. New journey a-head, let us love Him back - Rejoice, sing and dance, walk glorious jour-ney. Press on to the goal, accomplish His com-miss-ion. Ce-le-brate in the clouds.

SongPage.Title: 2. Sit in Heaven with the Lord
SongPage.Context:
D 4/4 1. What a-ma-zing grace! Im-mense and bound-less! I am in Christ - Died with You, live with You, sit in heaven with You. Your love journey on earth was all for me.
2. In heav'n I sit with You! I am whiter than snow! My sins no more! I'm holy as the Lord, dwell in the Holy Place. Forever Abba's smiles brighten my heart.
3. In heav'n I sit with You! What amazing grace- Beyond measure! The Father welcomes me as He welcomes the Lord. Forever I live in this grace and love.
4. My perfect Christ for me appears before God. You're my High Priest! Perfectly You've brought me to the Father's bosom. This highest Father's love belongs to me.
5. In heav'n I sit with You. This wondrous love and grace Makes me amazed. I'm closest to Abba and He delights in me. I'm precious as the Lord in Abba's heart.
6. In heav'n I sit with You. This wondrous love and grace Who can fathom? Abba has given me precious identity. 0' I am the Father's dearest treasure!
7. In heav'n I sit with You - I'm closest to Abba, Sit by His side. He gives me great glory. I am enthroned with Him. I will reign with Abba eternally.
8. In heav'n I sit with You. God has opened His heart - Love overflows. Now He can freely pour out His love on me. 0' He's dancing for me with great delight!
9. In heav'n I sit with You enjoy Abba's embrace, Warmest welcome! I can see Abba's heart - beautiful, committed. He desires me to be closest to Him.

SongPage.Title: 4. Song of Solomon 5:9-6:1
SongPage.Context: Dm 4/4 O' most beau-ti-ful a-mong wo-men, What is your beloved more than other be-loved, What is your beloved more than other be-loved, O' fair-est one, that you so charge us? My be-loved's dazz-ling and rud-dy, Out-stand-ing a-mong ten thousand. His head is the fin-est gold, pure gold; His locks are wa-vy, his locks are wa-vy, Black as a ra-ven. His eyes as doves by the ri-vers, With milk they're washed and fit-ly set. A bed of spices, banks of scent-ed herbs are his cheeks His lips are like li-lies, Drip-ping li-quid myrrh. His hands are like the rods of gold And set with be-ryl. His bo-dy is a carved i-vo-ry, In-laid with sap-phi-res. His legs, pil-lars of mar-ble, Set on bas-es of fine gold. His bear-ing as Le-ba-non, Ex-cell-ent as the ce-dars. His mouth is full of sweetness, He's al-to-ge-ther love-ly. O' daugh-ters of Je-ru-sa-lem, This is my beloved and this is my friend. O' most beau-ti-full a-mong wo-men, Where a-bout has your be-loved gone? Where has your be-loved turned a-side? We will seek him to-ge-ther with you, We will seek him to-ge-ther with you.

SongPage.Title: 7 The Great Love of the Father
SongPage.Context:
1. Abba, Father is rich in mercy. Because of His great love for me, When I was dead in my transgressions, He made me live with Christ my Lord, And raised me up together with Him, Seat'd me in heaven with Him; And raised me up together with Him, Seat'd me in heaven with Him.
2. Abba, Father's boundless love for me Forever is my rest and peace. He loves the Lord, the same He loves me, Without reserve, wholeheartedly. Abba Father, open my eyes, And let me see Your true heart. I'll be carefree; I'll live joyfully, Rest in Your bosom of love.

SongPage.Title: 8 My Father is Infinitely Great
SongPage.Context: D 4/4 When I see all the stars, I think of Your glo-ry. You're the end-less foun-tain, O-ver-flow-ing with love. May Your glo-ry e-ver capture my heart. I've no o-ther de-sire a-part from You. Let me be-hold Your beau-ty And I will be drawn a-way. You are the boundless One, Great-er than the u-ni-verse. All things in this world Have be-come min-or to me. Your vast bo-som of love is my rest. Let me always stay in Your em-brace. O' how precious I am Your dearest child, O' how sweet! Fa-ther, my heart loves You! I long to know You more, Ful-ly drinkg of Your love, Dai-ly re-joice be-fore You.

SongPage.Title: 10 The Comforter has Come
SongPage.Context:
C 3/4 1. The Com-fort-er has come. It's the Father's promise. 0' how precious it is, for-e'er He lives in me, Like a spring of wa-ter, welling to e-ternal life And I will nev-er thirst.
2. The Comforter has come. Fore'er He lives in me. He never leaves me, helps me in time of need. 0' how gentle He is. His love is long and deep. He'll bring me to glory.
3. He's always by my side. We go through floods and fires. He speaks comfort to me. He makes me full of hope. He gives me my vineyard, and I'll sing to the Lord. I'm in love with the Lord.
4. The Comforter's with me. He is always my Guide. All things He teaches me, so I can please the Lord. When I'm sad and weary, He comforts me deeply And gives me joy and peace.
5. When I draw near to God, He teaches me the truth, Makes my heart live again. I'm captured by the Lord: His love draws me away. The world I lay aside, Yearn for His love only.

SongPage.Title: 12 Press on to the Finishing Line
SongPage.Context: C 3/4,4/4 The stage of Christ, feast of the Lamb I see! Afflict-ions of this world - brief and light. With joy I fight, by faith 1 march on. Let's kin-dle the re-vi-val fire, And press towards the goal. Let's run the race, And build His church To the end of the earth!

SongPage.Title: 13 The Lord's Commission in 1964
SongPage.Context: C 3/4,4/4 To glo-re-fy the Lord, re-vive the church, And bring many to the Fa-ther, The path of faith by Him to walk on - Heav'nly vi-sion compels my heart. Bravely I'll march for-ward. One day He comes! I'll see His face. O' let us re-joice!

SongPage.Title: 14 Unreserved Love
SongPage.Context: Eb 3/4 God who did not spare His on-ly beloved Son But for us all gave Him up, How will He not al-so with the Lord Free-ly give us all, give us all, give us all? How will He not al-so with the Lord Free-ly give us all, Free-ly five us all?

SongPage.Title: 15 I was Created for the Lord
SongPage.Context:
F 2/4 1. With Your in-fi-nite love, Wis-dom, adn pow'r, You made me to be Your best cre-a-tion: Com-pa-ti-ble with You, In harmo-ny with You, Each o-ther we de-light, Deep-ly we're in love.
2. My Lord, for Yourself, You creat'd me Compatible with You, I'm Your closest one. One spirit I'm with You, most deeply united, Heart to heart we belong, I'm Yours, You are mine.
3. My Lord, for Yourself, You creat'd me To enjoy Your great love, satisfy Your heart. Day and night I'm with You, in love with You fore'er, Hold sovereignty with You till eternity.

SongPage.Title: 17 The Blood of the Lamb
SongPage.Context:
Ab 9/8 1. The blood of the Lamb opened a new way To the Ho-ly Place, Ab-ba's bo-som. How He loves the Lord, He loves me the same. I am His dear child; He's my rest.
2. The blood of the Lamb washed away my sins. I have no shadows, whiter than snow. He set free my heart, defeat'd all my foes. I lift up my head, shout "victory"!

SongPage.Title: 18 The Fruit of the Cross
SongPage.Context:
G 6/8 1. The Lamb of Gold bled and died; The Veil was rent for-e'er! The wall of sins was shat-tered. God wiped a-way all my sins. I am per-fect, whit-er than snow. A liv-ing way He has opened To the Father - I'm part of this cir-cle of love!
2, I've entered God's circle of love: They're always by my side - Sweet fellowship, love interflow, Love of the Trinity God. I enjoy most this fellowship: The Father, the Son, the Spirit - I cherish most God's precious name. He's my portion! (He's fore'er mine!)

SongPage.Title: 19 Fearfully Made and Born Again
SongPage.Context:
D 4/4 1. Fear-ful-ly, wonder-ful-ly, I am cre-at'd. All things bright and beau-tiful, full of wonders. My heart's amazed and I praise my dear Abba, "How great You are! How great You are!"
2. Fearfully, wonderfully, I'm born again. I am creat'd and now I'm born of You. It's so joyful to be Your dearest child. You love me most! You love me most! You love me as You love the Lord.

SongPage.Title: 20 Glorious Miracle of Love
SongPage.Context:
G 6/4 1. Glo-rious mi-ra-cle of His love - I'm Ab-ba's dear-est child. This af-fection sweet-ens our hearts. We're enthralled in this deep love. He brings me to His heart.
2. I am His dream, His glory. I have captured His heart. For me, He sings and shouts for joy. I am His treasure, delight. I satisfy His heart.

SongPage.Title: 21 The Father's Tender Care
SongPage.Context:
D 3/4 1. Your love is wid-er than the o-cean. This love cap-tures my heart. The hea-vens de-clare Your glo-ry. Every star, You call them by name.
2. 0' Father, Your love and tender care Deeply comfort my heart. Every strand of my hair You have numbered. From afar, You know my every thought.

SongPage.Title: 22 He Came and Died for Me, Now Lives in Me
SongPage.Context:
Eb 4/4 1. A Child was born for me, for me, He's the Father's on-ly Son. He has no be-gin-ing, no end; He is the in-fi-nite One. For love, He came from heav'n to earth To be a Man for-e-ver. He leaped u-pon the moun-tains. For me, He's born in the man-ger.
2. He even walked to the cross. He saw the great joy ahead, Despised the shame, endured the cross. "It is finished!" He cried out. Now He and I are united. Fore'er He lives in my heart. Day and night He lives with me. 0' Lord, Your love melts my heart. Your ban-ner o-ver me is love. Lord, Your love draws me a-way! May I love You more and more, Love You, fol-low You on-ly.

SongPage.Title: 24 The Lamb of God Loved Me and Humbled Himself
SongPage.Context:
Ab9/8 1. Hark! Ten thou-sand voi-ces prais-ing, "Worthy is the Lamb, the Lamb of God!" You re-deemed me by Your pre-cious blood. You seat me on the throne with You.
2. The Lamb of God shed His blood for me. The glorious young stag came with great joy, Longed to see my face and to hear my voice. He wants to live with me fore'er.
3. To show me Your love, You humbled Yourself. From heaven You came for Your love dream - To live in me, fore'er heart to heart. Lord, Your fervent love thrills my heart.
4. You're the Son of God, the infinite One, But for me You were born as a Child. You have bridged the gap and brought me into The depth of God's heart! forever. (God's circle of love and joy.)

SongPage.Title: 26 Stunning Personal Love
SongPage.Context:
Eb 3/4 1. Were I the on-ly sin-ner, He would still come for me. He'd walk to the cross for me, Drink the bit-ter cup for me. He tru-ly loved me, Gave Him-self for me. His boundless per-son-al love Thrills and melts my hearts.
2. 0' Lord Your personal love stuns the whole universe. I am a seal on His heart, a seal upon His arm. I am my Beloved's, He desires me. His fervent and gentle love fore'er embraces me.
3. 0' Lord Your personal love is my myrrh, my treasure. His eternal fervent love forever belongs to me. A world of two surpasses all things. When You and I live in love-bless God's house and the world. 0' Lord, love You - Draw me close to You Make me the clos-est to You, Re-spond to Your love.

SongPage.Title: 28 A World of Two
SongPage.Context: Eb 3/4 In this world there are two hearts Close-ly knit'd to-ge-ther. Heart to heart, deep-ly in love, These two hearts are joined as one. He and I are one, Deep-est u-ni-on. He cre-at'd me for Him-self To be His dar-ling.

SongPage.Title: 29 The Lord Delights in Me Most
SongPage.Context:
C 4/4 1. I was born of the Spi-rit, I am per-fect, Your de-light, Compa-ti-ble with You I am. Now I know You de-light in me.
2. Lord, You rejoice over me As a groom over his bride. I make Your heart beat faster. Now I know You delight in me.
3. Your tender love, fervent desire - Most beautiful, warms my heart. Life-yielding love proves Your desire. Now I know You delight in me.
4. Facing the cross, You thought of me - To be with me forever. You want to live in my heart. Now I know You delight in me. You want to come to take me home. O' Lord Je-sus, may You come soon!

SongPage.Title: 31 I was Created for Him; He is My Dwelling Place
SongPage.Context:
G 4/4 1. Apart from You, nothing my heart desires. Out of Your love, You made me for Your-self. Lord, You a-lone can sa-tis-fy my heart. You are my rest, my joy, my dwelling place. Now and for-e'er, with You I'm sa-tis-fied.
2. Lord, keep my heart, let me love You only. Appear to me, and show me Your glory. May You kiss me, so I'll run after You. Embrace with You, I wonder at Your love.

SongPage.Title: 32 The Love Expression that Stuns the Universe
SongPage.Context:
Eb 4/4 1. I'm the love gift of Ab-ba To His Be-loved Son - A gift that gives His heart, En-dured the great-est pain. Such love ex-press-ion Stuns the whole u-ni-verse, Makes me stand in won-der. O' the love of Ab-ba To-ward His on-ly Son. O' the Lord with rap-turous joy received His Fa-ther's love gift And en-dured the bit-ter cross. O' the love with-in the Tri-ni-ty Is why I am, I am most ten-der-ly blessed.
2. I'm the love dream of the Lord From e-ter-ni-ty past. I'm His sweet love se-cret Trea-sured deep in His heart. One day with pass-ion He came from heav'n to ful-fill His fair-est love dream; Re-ceived in bound-less joy His Fa-ther's best love gift. O' the Lord, He saw the joy a-head, Des-pised the shame And en-dured the bit-ter cross. Now His love's vic-torious ban-ner Flies o-ver me. I am His and He is mine.
3. O Ab-ba, the Lord and the Spi-rit Em-brace me To the depth of Their fair-est heart. We're the most beloved trea-sure In Their love com-mun-ion From e-ter-ni-ty to e-ter-ni-ty.

SongPage.Title: 35 Lord Jesus, I Love You
SongPage.Context: C 4/4 Lord Je-sus, I love You! You have died for me! You make me white as snow, Your heart's fair-est jewel. You've brought me out of darkness In-to Your mar-velous light; You have changed my life! I'm for-e-ver Yours! You're for-e-ver mine!

SongPage.Title: 36 Carry Me Home
SongPage.Context: D 4/4 One day from hea-ven He'll come, He'll come to car-ry us home. To the New Je-ru-sa-lem, He'll come to car-ry us home! In the clouds, His radiant cha-ri-ot, I'll see His glo-ri-ous face! He'll take us to His fair-est home, He'll come to car-ry us home!

SongPage.Title: 2 Yesterday, Today, Forever
SongPage.Context: A 6/8 Yes-terday, to-day, for-e-ver, Je-sus is the same; All may change, but Je-sus ne-ver! Glo-ry to His name! Glo-ry to His name! Glo-ry to His name! All may change, but Je-sus ne-ver! Glo-ry to His name!

SongPage.Title: 3 Amazing Grace
SongPage.Context:
G 3/4 1. A-maz-ing grace! How sweet the sound. That saved a wretch like me! I once was lost, but now am found, Was blind, but now I see.
2. 'Twas grace that taught my heart to fear, And grace my fears relieved; How precious did that grace appear The hour I first believed!
3. The Lord hath promised good to me, His word my hope secures; He will my shield and portion be As long as life endures.
4. Through many dangers, tolis and snares, I have already come; 'Tis grace hath brought me safe thus far, And grace will lead me home.
5. When I've been there ten thousand years, Bright shining as the sun, We've no less days to sing God's praise Than when I first begun.

SongPage.Title: 5 His Unforgettable Appearing
SongPage.Context:
D 3/4 1. Re-joice! Re-joice! He is re-sen! O-ver-came Satan and death, He is re-sen! Re-joice! Re-joice! He is re-sen! How can I for-get His love ap-pear-ing!
2. The Lord's appearing Wiped off my tears. His Father is my Father, Dearest to Him. The Lord's appearing Removed my grief. It's too good to be true. I clung to Him.
3. The Lord's appearing Cast off my fear. The Lord's love will never change. My heart's comfort'd. The Lord's appearing Opened my eyes, Took away all my sorrow. My heart's fervent!
4. He appeared to me And gave me peace. He sent me to the world To work with Him. He apeared to me, Showed me His wounds. "My dear Lord, and my God, I love You so!"
5. He appeared to me By the seashore. He prepared breakfast for me With tender love. He said to me, "Do you love Me? If you do, shepherd My sheep, And follow Me."
6. He commissioned me On the mountain To finish the glorious church, Wait till He comes. I'll never forget His face and voice. With same heart, I work with Him, Strive till He comes.
7. He appeared to me, Opened my eyes: My Brother - the Son of God, Who came for me. He's the Sone of Man, The same with me. Yet He is without sin. He's glorious.
8. On Mount Olive, He said to me " You'll received pow'r from above. Be My witness." When He's blessing me, He's taken up. He's taken to the Father, He lives for me.

SongPage.Title: 8 One Sacrifice for Sin Forever
SongPage.Context:
G 4/4 1. Je-sus Christ as the High Priest Had of-fered one sa-cri-fice For sins for-e-ver and He sat down At the right hand of God, at His right. From that time He's wait-ing, He's wait-ing Un-til His e-ne-mies are made His foot-stool.
2. For by one offering, For by one offering, He has perfected forever, forever All those who are being sanctified. The Spirit also testifies to us, "I'll remember no more their sins and lawless deeds."
(ref. Heb. 10:12-15, 17)

SongPage.Title: 9 My All-knowing Friend
SongPage.Context:
Eb 4/4 1. I treasure You are my best friend. You have searched me and known me. You know my thoughts from a-far off. All my desires are be-fore You.
2. O' my dear Lord, You know all things. You are mindful of my thoughts. Before You I open my heart. You know my thought before it's told.
3. You have known me inside-out, Lord, And You fully understand me. Teach me how to live with You - To be set free and without fears.

SongPage.Title: 10 Alone with the Father
SongPage.Context:
G 3/4 1. I love to be a-lone with You. Free-ly I talk to You. Ev-ery morn-ing Your love is news, May You re-new my heart.
2. Alone with You in our secret place - This is our sweet moment. O' Father of Almighty Pow'r, My heart is unveiled to You.
3. Father, nothing I hide from You, Open my heart to You. You're full of mercies and comfort. I pour out my heart to You.
4. As Your dear child, peacefully I rest On Your bosom of love. Fatherly love fills all my heart, My sorrow, troubles are gone.
5. Alone with You, I am most set free, In laughter or in tears, Gladly I'll be away from friends, And to be with You only.
6. One day the Groom gloriously appears, Takes me to Father's home. With endless joy, I'll see Your face With endless joy, I'll see Your face In heaven, our eternal home.

SongPage.Title: 12 Unshakable Foundation
SongPage.Context:
Cm 4/4 1. Ne-ver shaken, for-e'er the same: It's God who jus-ti-fies me. In Christ, I will ne-ver be condemned. I am Gold's right-eous-ness.
2. Never shaken, fore'er the same: Abba loves me as the Lord; The Lord loves me as Abba love Hime - Eternal highest love.
3. Neve shaken, fore'er the same: In heav'n I sit with the Lord - Enjoy Abba's welcome and delight. I am Abba's dear child.

SongPage.Title: 13 You Will Surely Give Me the Best
SongPage.Context: E 4/4 "My dear Lord, You'll give me the best!" I said it not when my days were ea-sy and light; I said it not at the time when I gained What I had e-ver dreamed of. When I'm in loss, when I'm in lack, When I suffer, when I am troubled, I can't understand why; under pressure, I am filled with wor-ries. Yet I must get o-ver all feel-ings. I trust Your e-ter-nal love - Sure-ly You will give me the best. I know You will never miss a single de-tail - All my hair You've numbered with care. "My dear Lord, You'll five me the best!" I said it not when my days were ea-sy and light; I said it not at the time when I gained What I had e-ver dreamed of. When I'm in loss, when I'm in lack, When I suffer, when I am troubled, I can't understand why; under pressure, I am filled with wor-ries. Yet I must get o-ver all feel-ings. You make all things work for me, Though now I may not under-stand. It ne-ver stops me run-ning to Your bo-som. Your love for me is pro-ven. I praise and give thanks to You. I lift my hand and shout for joy. There is no-thing bet-ter You can give me, For I've gained all Your hearts, Your love From e-verlasting to e-verlast-ing.

SongPage.Title: 16 Father, 'Twas Your Love that Knew Us
SongPage.Context:
F 4/4 1. Fa-ther, 'twas Your love that knew us, Earth's foundation long be-fore; That same love to Je-sus drew us, By its sweet constraining pow'r And will keep us, and will keep us, Safe-ly now and e-ver more. Safe-ly now, and e-ver more.
2. Now that changeless love enfolds us, All its wealth on us bestows, While its pow'r unchanging holds us In a holy calm repose. Oh, dear Father, Oh, dear Father Unto You our worship flows, Unto You our worship flows.
3. 'Tis the Father's tender mercy That doth cause me to rejoice; And myself am given wholly As a son thro' God's own choice. God so loves us! God so loves us! That He gave us His dear Son! That He gave us His dear Son!
4. God of love, our souls adore You! We would still Your grace proclaim, Till we cast our crowns before You, And in glory praise Your name; Praise and worship, praise and worship, Be to God and to the Lamb! Be to God and to the Lamb!

SongPage.Title: 18 The Father's Longing
SongPage.Context:
F 3/4,4/4 1. May I oft' me-di-tate You've thought of me since e-ter-ni-ty. Ab-ba, You think of me; You long for me. O' I have cap-tured Your heart.
2. May I always realized Your desire for me is long and deep. Day and night I lean on Your bosom. I enjoy this fatherly love.
3. May I enter Your love, Talk with You face to face more and more. This is sweet moment of father and son. We're content in embrace of love.

SongPage.Title: 19 Joined to the Lord
SongPage.Context:
Ab 3/4 1. Lord Je-sus are we one with Thee? O height, O depth of love! Once slain for us u-pon the tree, We're one with Thee a-bove.
2. Our sins, our guilt, in love divine, All! All were borne by Thee; The fall, the curse, the wrath were Thine, To set Thy members free.
3. Ascended now in glory bright, Still one with us Thou art; Nor life, nor death, nor dept, nor height Thy saints and Thee can part!
4. O teach us, Lord, to know and own This wondrous mystery, That Thou with us art truly one, And we are one with Thee.
5. Soon, soon shall come that glorious day, When, seated on Thy throne, Thou shalt to wond'ring worlds display That Thou with us art one.

SongPage.Title: 21 Walk in Love with the Lord
SongPage.Context:
Eb 4/4 1. From e-ter-ni-ty past to e-ter-ni-ty You de-sire me. This beautiful love plan came from Your dream of love. You want to live with me in love and joy.
2. Lord, You became a Man. You died and shed Your blood To betroth me. Deeply we're united, one spirit, heart to hearts. Forever we walk on this path of love.
3. To have You I'm so blessed. Share with You joy and tears - All are precious. Work in same heart with You, I'll accomplish Your will. I wait for You to take me to the clouds.

SongPage.Title: 22 My Precious Companion
SongPage.Context: Eb 4/4 The Father and the Son and the Spi-rit Live in my heart, em-brace me day and night. I live in this sweet fellowship for-e'er. Love, joy and live now I ful-ly en-joy.

SongPage.Title: 23 His Blood-sealed Love
SongPage.Context:
Ab 9/8 1. O' Lord, I trea-sure You shed Your blood. This love melts my heart, makes me a-mazed. It warms my heart, draws me close to You. I live in Your bo-som of love.
2. O' Lord, I treasure You shed Your blood. You've Kept the nail prints - the wounds of love. Your love's ever fresh, forever the same. 'Tis my eternal rest and joy
3. O' Lord, I treasure You shed Your blood. Your love overcame all pains and death. We are united; I belong to You. As a seal I am on Your heart.
4. O' Lord, I treasure You shed Your blood. Your true love for me is proven. This is my rest, the rock of my faith I freely embrace Your love.

SongPage.Title: 24 And Can It be that I should Gain
SongPage.Context:
G 4/4 1. And can it be that I should gain An in-terest in the Sav-iour's blood? Died He for me, who caused His pain? For me, Who Him to death pur-sued? A-mazing love! How can it be That Thou, my God, shouldst die for me?
(Refrain) A-maz-ing love! How can it be That Thou, my God, shouldst die for me?
2. He left His Father's throne above - So free, so infinite His grace - Who can sound the depths of His love - He bled for our sinful race; 'Tis mercy all, immense and free; For, O my God! It found out me.
3. Long my imprisoned spirit lay Fast bound in sin and hopeless night; Thine eye diffused a quick'ning ray, I woke, the dungeon flamed with light; My chains fell off, my heart was free; I rose, went forth, and followed Thee.
4. No condemnation now I dread; Jesus, and all in Him, is mine! Alive in Him, my living Head, And clothed in righteousness divine, Bold I approach th'eternal throne, And claim the crown, thro' Christ my own.

SongPage.Title: 26 Crown Him with Many Crowns
SongPage.Context:
D 4/4 1. Crown Him with ma-ny crowns, The Lam u-pon His throne; Hark! How the Heav'nly anthem drowns All mu-sic but its own! A-wake, my soul, and sing Of Him who died for thee; And hail Him as thy matchless King Thro' all e-ter-ni-ty.
2. Crown Him with the Lord of love! Behold His hands and side, Rich wounds, yet visible above, In beauty glorified; No angel in the sky Can fully bear that sight, But downward bends his wond'ring eye At mysteries so bright.
3. Crown Him the Lord of life! Who triumphed o'er the grave; Who rose victorious in the strife For those He came to save; His glories now we sing, Who died and rose on high; Who died eternal life to bring, And lives that death may die.
4. Crown Him the Lord of Heav'n! One with the Father known, One with the Spirit through Him giv'n From yonder glorious throne! To Thee be endless praise, For Thou for us hast died; Be Thou, O Lord, thro endless days Adored and magnified.

SongPage.Title: 28 Jesus, the Very Thought of Thee
SongPage.Context:
G 3/4 1. Jesus the ve-ry thought of Thee, With sweetness fills my breast; But sweeter far Thy face to see, And in Thy pre-sence rest.
2. Nor voice can sing, nor heart can frame, Nor can the mem'ry find A sweeter sound than Thy blest Name, O Saviour of mankind!
3. O Hope of every contrite heart, O Joy of all the meek, To those who fall, how kind Thou art! How good the those who seek!
4. And those who find Thee, find a bliss Nor tongue nor pen can show; The love of Jesus, what it is None but His loved ones know.
5. O Jesus, light of all below! Thou fount of life and fire! Surpassing all the joys we know, And all we can desire.
6. No other source have we but Thee, Soul-thirst to satisfy. Exhaustless spring! The waters free! All other streams are dry.
7. Jesus, our only Joy be Thou, As Thou our Prize wilt be; Jesus, be Thou our Glory now, And through eternity.

SongPage.Title: 30 Lord Jesus! When We Think of Thee
SongPage.Context:
Ab 3/2 1. Lord Jesus! When we think of Thee. Of all Thy love and grace, Our spirits long and fain would see Thy beauty face to face.
2. And though the wilderness we tread, A barren, thirsty ground, With thorns and briars overspread, Where foes and snares abound.
3. Yet in Thy love such depths we see, Our souls o'erflow with praise - Content ourselves, while, Lord to Thee A joyful song we raise.
4. Our Lord, our Life, our Rest, Our Shield, Our Rock, our Food, our Light - Each thought of Thee doth constant yield Unchanging, fresh delight.
5. Blest Saviour, keep our spirits stayed Hard following after Thee, Till we, in robes of white arrayed, Thy face in glory see.

SongPage.Title: 32 Abba's Personal Love for Me
SongPage.Context:
Eb 3/4 1. My Ab-ba's per-son-al love For me is high and deep. He would glad-ly send His Son If it were on-ly for me.
(Chorus) Your love thoughts for me who can comprehend? Now You are my dear Abba! Deep af-fection we share.
2. If it were only for me, He would prepare the Lamb - By the blood of His Son, He washed me whiter than snows.
3. Abba, Your personal love For me is high and deep. You forsook Your beloved Son To gain me as Your dear child. I'm in Your bosom of love.

SongPage.Title: 34 The Lord's Love Dream, His Joy Ahead
SongPage.Context:
D 4/4 1. O, Lord, when you faced the deepest pain on the cross, You sweetly thought of this fullness of joy before You. You longed for me to be enthroned with You in glo-ry. You yearned to live in me for-e-ver and e-ver. I cherish Your love dream. You gave Yourself for me. Now Your love dream has come true. With joy You embrace me in-to Your beautiful heart.
2. O, Lord, when You faced the deepest pain on the cross, The joy of the Father and mine were set before You. You longed for the Father's deepest love to be in me. You desired me to live in Abba's heart forever. I cherish Your love dream. You gave Yourself to make Abba's and my dream come true. Abba ran out to me, embraced me into His heart.
3. O, Lord, when You faced the deepest pain on the cross, You sweetly thought of this fullness of joy before You. You longed for Abba's house of glory and unity To be the warmest home in the whole universe. We all stand as one man to ac-complish God's love plan. The full-ness of this house over-flows to worlds of love. I cherish Your love dream. You offered Yourself to fulfill God's dream of love.
4. O, Lord, when You faced the deepest pain on the cross, You sweetly thought of this fullness of joy before You. You longed for me to be sanctified, belong to You, Sweetly I live with You in our fellowship of love. You sanc-ti-fied me. Now I be-long to Ab-ba. Closely I walk with Him, enjoy deep-est affect-ion, Live in the Father's heart, delight in God's fami-ly. I cherish Your love dream. You gave Yourself for this wonderful love plan of God.

SongPage.Title: 36 You Betrothed Me with Your Blood
SongPage.Context:
Eb 4/4 1. Lord, You loved me, gave Yourself on the cross. With Your precious blood I'm betrothed to You. Death-daring love has melted my heart. O' Lord, Your heart and mine are u-nit-ed. Heart to heart we embrace in love for-e'er.
2. Facing the corss, You saw the joy ahead: You'll gain my heart; Your love dream will come true; You'll meet me in the clouds and bring me home; Enthralled in the wedding feast of the Lamb, We'll drink in the endless river of love.

SongPage.Title: 37 The Glorious Hope
SongPage.Context:
Bb 4/4 1. Rejoice we'll meet the Lord in the clouds. Our bodies will be like the Lord's. I will be with Him, share His glo-ry, E-ver in Ab-ba's house.
2. Glorious rewards before stage of Christ! Jubilant wedding feast of the Lamb! Reign with the Lord in Millennium. Joint-heir with Christ fore'er!

SongPage.Title: 38 He Died for You
SongPage.Context: Bb 3/4 He died for you. He lives for you. Do you know His life was given to you? He was raised from the dead And He can now hear your prayers. Do you know he died for you?

SongPage.Title: 39 In Heaven High
SongPage.Context: F 4/4 Be-hold, how glo-rious In hea-ven high, There's a Man who won the bat-tle And sits by the right side of the throne. He's Je-sus Christ, the Son of God. He died for my sins, And He's liv-ing for me.

SongPage.Title: 40 Praise the Lord No Matter What
SongPage.Context: F 4/4 Praise the Lord no mat-ter what! He died for me. He has overcome all! He is risen, and as-cend'd to hea-ven. Praise the Lord! Praise the Lord! Though I am weak, my Lord is strong. Re-ly on Him. I can overcome all. Praise the Lord! Praise the Lord! Re-ly on Him, I can overcome all.

SongPage.Title: 2主是我的福份
SongPage.Context:
1.主耶穌是活水泉源，是我甘露喜樂， 是我生命的糧飽足我飢腸。 主耶穌是我的磐石，是我避趡藏處， 是我心裡力量隨時的幫助。 主耶穌是我生命，變我越發榮耀， 是我末世盼望，榮耀真可誇！
2.主耶穌是我的中保，替我辯護代求， 是我永遠祭司體恤又祝福。 主耶穌是我的君王，制伏我心仇敵， 祂是萬王之王仇敵要餂土。 萬物要服祂腳下，萬膝都要跪拜， 主的勝利充滿宇宙每角落。
副歌： 主是晨星燦爛光華，是園中鳳仙花， 我永屬祂，祂永屬我，我愛祂。

SongPage.Title: 3你真偉大
SongPage.Context:
1.主啊我神，我每逢舉目觀看，你手所造， 一切奇妙大工；看見星宿， 又聽到隆隆雷聲，你的大工，遍滿了宇宙中。
2.當我想到，神竟願差祂兒子，降世捨命， 我幾乎不領會；主在十架； 甘願背我的重擔，流血捨命，為要赦免我罪。
3.當主再來，歡呼聲響澈天空，何等喜樂， 主接我回天家；我要跪下， 謙恭的敬拜瞻仰，並要頌揚，神啊你真偉大！
副歌： 我靈歌唱讚美救主我神：「你真偉大何等偉大！」 我靈歌唱讚美救主我神：「你真偉大何等偉大！」

SongPage.Title: 4紫色的袍
SongPage.Context:
1.紫色的袍，荊棘冠冕，蘆葦杖在右手； 兵丁唾面，嘲笑譏諷，我見救主站立。 祂在羅馬守衛面前，承受我們罪債； 鞭打，刑罰，令人掩面，我見救主前行；
2.懸在十架是創造主，天色漸漸昏暗； 永遠的贖價已償還，我見救主逝去。 祂曾懷憐憫到世上，現在高天掌權； 因為祂對罪人的愛，我歌頌祂的名。
副歌： 急步奔向巨大十架，高懸在烈日下； 人類數不盡的罪惡，我見我救主擔當。

SongPage.Title: 5主受苦為我
SongPage.Context:
1.耶穌在客西馬尼園，禱告汗流如血， 祂甘願為我嘗苦杯，憂傷幾乎要絕。
2.耶穌在彼拉多庭前，受審時甚孤單， 祂為我戴上荊棘冕，被世人所輕看。
3.耶穌在各各他山上，為我釘死十架， 祂捐軀流血洗我罪，捨身付了贖價。
4.耶穌我們感激涕零，因你慈愛浩大， 粉身碎骨難報萬一，惟有讚美敬拜。
副歌： 使我莫忘客西馬尼，使我莫忘主之痛苦， 使我莫忘主愛為我，使我愛主更深。

SongPage.Title: 6完美的耶穌
SongPage.Context:
1.在那靜靜的加利利海邊，我停步默默的凝想； 忽人山人海的擁擠滿途，來了加利利人耶穌！ 我眼見那生下來的瞎子，一剎那間重開雙眼； 祂行使大能，跛子就跳蹦，那加利利人耶穌。
2.祂體貼話語祂同情臉光，叫受者一輩子難忘； 祂站著注視我沉溺無助，那加利利人耶穌， 祂示我受傷的肋旁雙手，並低聲說那是為我； 在祂的腳前我重擔擺脫，那加利利人耶穌。
3.我親耳聽祂向風浪號令，風和海立刻就平靜， 風浪聽祂話海順祂吩咐，那加利利人耶穌， 內心長此享受安穩平靜，是何等的神聖心境； 祂大能雙手緊把我扶住，那加利利人耶穌。
副歌： 祂是何等的溫柔又慈祥， 我怎能不永遠愛祂！ 祂全然可愛遠超萬人，那加利利人耶穌。

SongPage.Title: 7記念主
SongPage.Context:
1.今日我們在主面前，虔誠恭敬聚集， 因你被賣那夜吩咐，如此行記念我。
2.因你身體為我擘開，開一新活道路， 我得坦然入至聖所，我心要記念你。
3.你在花園三次禱祈，你心沉重憂傷， 汗如血點連連下滴，我們來記念你。
4.你釘苦架在髑髏地，受盡世人羞辱， 無疵羔羊為贖罪祭，我們來記念你。
5.念你品德念你恩典，念你愛情慈憐， 當我在世一息尚存，我總要記念你。
6.當你再來永見你面，表記之物過去， 被殺羔羊傷痕仍見，我心永遠記念。

SongPage.Title: 7祂救了我
SongPage.Context:
1.從前我迷失在罪途，輕慢主愛遠離公義正路； 我真不解為何拒絕，那為愛我流血死的耶穌。
2.祂安放我在祂心懷，因此我見祂受傷的肋旁； 我心因這愛受感動，情不自禁俯伏淚流滿眶。
3.我真永遠夢想不到，我能得到這樣平安喜樂； 基督已拯救我靈魂，也能救我勝過一切罪惡。
副歌： 祂救了我，從罪中釋放我，在各各他，為我付上贖價； 我一切罪，主已完全赦宥，使我黑夜變為白晝。

SongPage.Title: 8各各他十架
SongPage.Context:
1.各各他十字寶架，循循細訴救主愛何高， 為我捨棄天上尊貴榮華，願降生甘心把血灑， 狐狸有洞，天空飛鳥亦窩，惟獨你孤單無枕所。
2.各各他十字寶架，循循細訴救主愛何寶， 為我受盡世人譏笑辱罵，願捨身甘心受鞭打， 荊棘冠冕，釘穿手腳槍傷肋旁，為何你竟說赦免他！
副歌： 想想想！想主恩深厚不滅。 深深深！深不可測。 惟願我心仰望主手張開接納， 投入你終生獻上自己。

SongPage.Title: 8與基督同活
SongPage.Context: 真快活真快活，與基督天天同活。 這樣的真快活難述說，天天與基督同活。 哈利路亞！哈利路亞！屬天的生活， 這樣的真快活難述說，天天與基督同活。

SongPage.Title: 8神愛世人
SongPage.Context: 神愛世人，甚至將祂的獨生子賜給他們， 叫一切信祂的，不至滅亡，反得永生。

SongPage.Title: 9深哉！深哉！耶穌的愛
SongPage.Context:
1.深哉，深哉，耶穌的愛，無限廣闊無限量； 浩浩蕩蕩有如汪洋，主愛臨我何週詳。 把我蔭庇把我環繞，是主滔滔大慈愛； 導我前行領我歸家，安息天上到萬代。
2.深哉，深哉，耶穌的愛，萬國萬民當稱揚； 何等的愛，永久的愛，永永遠遠不更改。 祂看顧屬祂的兒女，為我們十架捨身； 為我們在父前代求，在寶座看顧施恩。
3.深哉，深哉，耶穌的愛，是愛中至上的愛； 是廣闊賜福的洋海，是享安息的港口。 深哉，深哉，耶穌的愛，對我有如在天堂； 領我進入榮光之中，領我就近你身旁。

SongPage.Title: 10 奇妙的耶穌
SongPage.Context:
1.馬槽中祂降生卑微貧困，加利利海岸上傳道救人； 十架上飲苦杯為我捨身，耶穌奇妙的主！
2.祂飄流郤為我預備天家，祂飢渴郤賜我活水江河； 祂受苦郤賜我平安喜樂，耶穌奇妙的主！
副歌： 奇妙的奇妙的耶穌，祂是我友，恩情長久； 祂捨命使我得拯救，耶穌奇妙的主！

SongPage.Title: 10 我已經靠寶血洗乾淨
SongPage.Context:
1.我已經靠寶血，靠寶血我已經洗乾淨， 衣服洗淨才能進入生命城， 我已經靠寶血洗乾淨。
2.主寶血為我流，永約血已定我得永生， 聖靈澆灌使我生命發亮光， 我已經靠寶血得永生。

SongPage.Title: 11 思念十架
SongPage.Context:
1.我每思念十字寶架，榮耀的主在上懸掛； 我就不禁渾忘身家，鄙視從前所有倨傲。
2.願主禁我別有所誇，除了基督的十字架； 前所珍愛虛空榮華，今為祂血情願丟下。
3.看從祂頭祂腳祂手！慈愛愁苦和血而流； 那有愛憂如此相連，荊棘編成如此榮冕。
4.看祂全身滿披水血，如同穿上朱紅衣飾； 因此我與世界斷絕，世界向我也像已死。
5.假若宇宙都歸我手，盡獻於主仍覺不夠； 愛既如此奇妙深厚，當得我心我命所有。

SongPage.Title: 12 傷心為你
SongPage.Context:
1.你曾否念過十架故事，耶穌在上捨命， 主寶血從祂肋旁流下，罪債為你還清。
2.你曾否念過救主為你，戴上荊棘冠冕， 主禱告：「他們所作無知，神啊！求你赦免。」
3.你曾否念過主仰望天說：「成了！」是為你， 你曾否對主說：「感謝主，因你為我捨己。」
副歌： 救主為你捨命心破碎，救主捨命心破碎； 為你，為我身懸十架救主捨命心破碎。

SongPage.Title: 13 主如明亮晨星
SongPage.Context:
1.當我在黑暗痛苦絕望中，有一曙光明照在我心； 就是那稱為奇妙的救主，捨棄天上榮華為我降生。 祂又為我被釘在十字架，情願受苦洗淨我的罪， 我要唱奇妙主哈利路亞，從今後永不會再絕望。
2.救主耶穌基督被接升天，祂去原為我預備地方； 就必再來接我到祂父家，永遠與主同在到千萬年。 到那時再沒有痛苦悲傷，只有甜美快樂的笑容， 眾聖徒同聚在明亮聖城，滿心歌頌讚美主大恩。
副歌： 祂仁慈善良的愛，領我衝破狂風巨浪， 主如一顆明亮的晨星，帶給我無限的希望！

SongPage.Title: 13 我真快樂
SongPage.Context: 我真快樂原因就是這樣，耶穌已將我重擔除開， 我今歌唱天天都歌唱，耶穌已將我重擔除開， 前我曾被罪惡重擔所壓傷，耶穌除去我重擔賜我平安， 我真快樂原因就是這樣，耶穌已將我重擔除開。

SongPage.Title: 14 願明主愛
SongPage.Context:
1.主啊，你奇妙的愛，我真願意明白； 到底它怎樣帶你來，受死在加略山。
2.主啊，豈是那鐵釘，釘你在十架上； 不！是因你永遠愛情，使你肯為我死。
3.哦！這真是奇中奇，因你想見我面； 你竟為我嘗盡死味，使我與你相聯。
4.主你已溶化我心，使我破碎降卑； 我當歌頌你的得勝，尊你為主為王。
副歌： 哦！叫我能明白它！使我能接受它！ 哦！主啊，你為何竟來用血買我歸你。

SongPage.Title: 15 愛是當
SongPage.Context:
1.愛就是當主成為人，生在馬槽中，無尊榮地位。 愛就是當主成為人，成為一木匠，同漁夫為友。 愛就是主來尋找呼叫我，祂慈愛光芒，照亮我生命。 愛就是主擔當我罪，為我受苦，救我這樣罪人。
2.愛就是當主成為人，使世人看見祂榮美慈愛。 愛就是當主成為人，親嘗甘與苦，為安慰我心。 愛就是主永忘記我眾罪，陪伴我同行，負責我一生。 愛就是主覺得值得，為我流血，救我這樣罪人。

SongPage.Title: 16 榮耀的釋放
SongPage.Context:
1.我曾被罪惡鎖鏈之束縛，我真像奴僕，不得自由； 但耶穌斷開我一切鎖鏈，榮耀之釋放，我就獲得。
2.主使我脫離律法之咒詛，脫離我情慾，嗜好，驕傲， 脫離我世俗虛空之幻想，榮耀之釋放，再無憂慮。
3.主使我脫離黑暗之權勢，脫離這悖謬，罪惡世代， 脫離我心靈所受各控告，榮耀之釋放，喜樂無窮。
副歌： 榮耀之釋放！奇妙之釋放！我再無罪惡束縛痛苦。 榮耀釋放者是救主耶穌！從今到永遠使我釋放。

SongPage.Title: 17 真榮耀
SongPage.Context: 真榮耀真榮耀當我信主一刻 我就與主永聯合成為一靈 真奇妙真奇妙我在基督裡 活著的不再是我是新造的人 親愛主永住我心同享榮耀與權能 同享無限的聖靈同享父愛承受萬有 真的愛真的愛這是何等的愛 我要你作我的主與你相愛直到永遠

SongPage.Title: 17 因主活著
SongPage.Context:
神遣愛子，被稱為耶穌；降世為人，赦罪治病。 甚至捨命，為贖我罪過；那空墳足證救主基督活著。
正因祂活著，我能面對明天；因祂活著，畏懼全消。 因我知道，主掌管未來；生命活得有價值，正因主活著。

SongPage.Title: 18 頌主大愛
SongPage.Context:
1.我要頌主大慈愛，口舌永說不盡。甘願擔當我重刑， 血贖我眾罪，將我污穢洗白淨，日與父神親近； 身靈安居主愛裡，永遠滿足我心，主的愛滿足我心， 主的愛滿足我心。何等長闊高深， 令我稱頌歡欣，主的愛滿足我心。
2.我要頌主大慈愛，與眾聖同歌吟；欣感主愛激勵我， 滿心火熱如焚。甘願與我為密友，彼此靈交日新； 情意最厚恩無盡，主愛越久越深，主的愛越久越深， 主的愛越久越深，深如最深海洋， 我要時時歌唱，主的愛越久越深！
3.我要頌主大慈愛，遠超吾人心願，從主不測之豐富， 充滿無量充滿；永遠沉潛主愛中，時時有新效驗； 愛我終必愛到底，主愛永不改變。主的愛永不改變！ 主的愛永不改變！從永遠到永遠， 我要歡聲頌讚，主的愛永不改變！

SongPage.Title: 19 為主而活
SongPage.Context:
1.為耶穌而活，生命才豐盛； 在一切事上，討我主喜悅。 與耶穌同心，完成主計劃； 背十架爭戰，直到榮美家。
2.在短瞬世間，願為主而活； 因我心所愛，惟有主笑容。 深願為我主，尋找失迷羊； 引領疲倦人，安息主懷中。
副歌： 耶穌我親愛救主，我靈魂體屬你； 因你在十字架上，流血買我歸你。 你是我主人愛人，我心為你寶座； 我活著是為主而活，主啊我只屬你。

SongPage.Title: 20 神的形像
SongPage.Context:
1.按照祂的形像，主神創造我們， 為要藉著世人，使祂榮耀得顯。 可是我們失喪有如羊走迷路， 忘記神的大愛，失卻神的形像。 但從亙古之先，神已計劃， 用加略山寶血拯救罪人。 離開榮美天家，基督降臨人間， 使我們能再生活，真有神的形像。
2.因此我願相信，接受祂為救主， 心中罪的痛苦，今消失無影蹤。 我要為主而活不顧任何代價， 只為主的大愛，主奇妙的恩典。 我永不能明白救贖計劃， 基督甘願捨己為罪人死， 如此奇妙救主，我要永遠歌頌， 我們當努力前行，真有神的形像。

SongPage.Title: 21 主愛難忘
SongPage.Context: 1.耶穌你愛我怎能忘，不時牢記心中， 你血流出洗我眾罪，此恩何等深宏。 2.主你像根出於乾地，多經苦痛憂患， 被人藐視遭人厭棄，郤常擦我淚眼。 3.記念你在客西馬尼，汗流如血下滴， 橄欖山中黑夜蓋地，無人儆醒同情。 4.我的罪多應受咒詛，你郤替我擔當， 用你寶血作我贖價，使我今得釋放。 5.我今願棄人間樂趣，願棄塵世纏累， 讓你恩愛充滿我心，使我心永屬你。

SongPage.Title: 22 耶穌一來
SongPage.Context:
1.孤單可憐，一乞丐坐在路旁；雙目失明， 不能看見亮光。緊握破衣，黑暗中戰兢不停； 耶穌一來，使他重見光明。
2.昔有一人，被邪鬼附上他身；離別親友， 淒涼獨住墳塋。惡者捆綁，傷害己體無人救； 耶穌一來，釋放他得自由。
副歌： 耶穌一來，魔鬼權勢就粉碎， 耶穌一來，抹去一切眼淚； 除去幽暗，使痛苦變為甘甜， 耶穌一來，萬事都要改變。

SongPage.Title: 23 我事奉復活救主
SongPage.Context:
1.我事奉復活救主，祂今就在世間； 我知道祂是活著，無論人如何說； 我親眼見祂慈手，親耳聽祂柔聲； 正當我需要祂時，祂在我旁。
2.在我四圍環境中，我親見祂慈憐； 雖然我心漸沉倦，但我總不灰心； 我知道祂必引導，經過風雨飄搖； 深信祂顯現之日，終必臨到。
3.哦！聖徒歡欣歡欣，都當揚聲歌唱， 當歌唱哈利路亞，永歸基督君王！ 祂是尋者的盼望，又是求者力量， 無一人像祂可愛，仁慈善良。
副歌： 祂活！祂活！基督耶穌今復活！ 與我同心，與我同行在人生的路途。 祂活！祂活！救恩已經完成， 你若問我怎知祂活，祂活在我心中。

SongPage.Title: 24 祂愛我
SongPage.Context:
1.我有一位奇妙救主，祂的愛情舉世莫如； 深海雖深它還要深，高天雖高它還要高； 亦新亦陳又摯又真，不分境地不理晚早； 祂愛我，永遠無窮盡！
2.祂在天上位分至尊，天使天軍無不拜頓， 郤因情愛非常堅強，以至願意撇棄穹倉， 來尋迷羊並且受戕，捨了天福又失世賞； 祂尋我，抱我祂懷中！
3.祂的道路實在孤單，沒有同心沒有同伴， 祂的所有患難憂愁，惟祂自己和神知道； 但祂前走不稍退後，直等祂到我的囚牢， 祂見我，釋放我自由！
4.不久悲慘日子就到；祂被人賣祂被人告， 祂就如此零丁孤苦，頭戴荊冕身受鞭傷， 為我之故來髑髏處，忍辱受死疼痛獨當， 祂救我，與祂永結連！
5.一生一世我要述說，祂的愛情何等超絕！ 當我至終被提上天，住在祂所預備的家； 我心所羨是見祂面，我要高唱哈利路亞， 我愛祂，永遠無窮盡！

SongPage.Title: 25 注目十架
SongPage.Context:
1.親愛救主，你曾為我釘十架， 如此恩愛，我怎敢往後退？ 求你使我，注目仰望你十架， 輕看世界名利勇敢往前行。
2.親愛救主，越久越覺你寶貴， 你的愛索牽引我親近你， 求你使我注目仰望你榮美， 丟棄世界萬事為要得著你。

SongPage.Title: 26 常念主愛
SongPage.Context:
1.我晝夜常思念你的愛，耶穌！不能測 長闊與高深，如瀑布從高處澆下來， 耶穌！使我心快樂頌主恩。你因愛肯降世， 成肉身，耶穌！捨棄你榮光大寶座，竟生在 律法下為人子，耶穌！甘心受貧寒無枕所。
2.你的愛如筵席氣味香，耶穌！讓我蒙恩人 來飽嘗。多虧你在十架代死亡， 耶穌！甘願被咒詛掛架上。救贖我出死亡 脫罪孽，耶穌！你寶血洗我白如雪。又差遣 保惠師訓誨我，耶穌！行事得蒙主常喜悅。
3.我晝夜常羨慕你的家，耶穌！在天為聖徒 備安宅，黃金街碧玉城樂無涯，耶穌！不再 有痛苦與眼淚。得常在你恩惠慈愛中， 耶穌！諸天所有福難較量；你的愛至永遠 不變更，耶穌！榮耀圍繞我成光浪。
副歌：
我的愛都澆奠你腳前，耶穌！因你比萬有滿我意； 你到底又盡美，又盡善，耶穌！我心歡喜住你懷裡。

SongPage.Title: 27 更美的血
SongPage.Context:
1.沒有血沒有壇，祭祀已成過去； 沒有煙冒，沒有火燃，犧牲永不再需， 更美的血流自更貴的脈， 洗淨了人的罪，開了新活道路。
2.神我們感謝你，為你兒子的血， 靠它我們被稱為義，靠它我們得捷， 勝過控告、死亡、黑暗勢力； 毋需兩次爭戰，不留一個仇敵。
3.神我們感謝你，因有天來恩典； 漫過我們最闊不義，赦免最深罪愆， 我們要讚美你所有的愛； 像你榮耀、權柄、能力，存到萬代。
4.神我們感謝你，因為盼望堅固； 下沉的靈藉以再起，直至晨曦顯露。 有福的盼望時常鼓舞我； 那疲倦的心靈，走最艱苦路程。
5.神我們感謝你，為那榮耀之冠； 並非只有一時美麗，轉眼即已衰殘。 乃是像寶座不朽到永遠； 樂哉能向寶座投下所有冠冕。

SongPage.Title: 28 金色的黎明
SongPage.Context:
1.一榮耀早晨，苦難全消，一榮耀早晨，平安消遙， 傷心事已過熬煉已了，天門將大開主要再來。
2.悲哀變歡騰，萬事光明，永遠告別離塵世黑夜， 身體忽改變，像榮耀主，輝煌的黎明，見主榮面。
3.與主喜會面，在彼高天，哭泣不再有，淚眼擦乾， 愛者得團圓，永恆相見，可愛的黎明，來時不遠。
副歌： 金色的黎明，主要再來，金色的黎明，爭戰全勝， 主勝利呼聲，畫破雲河，金色的黎明，為你為我。

SongPage.Title: 28 今天愛筵
SongPage.Context: 今天愛筵，齊來享受主愛，彼此關顧， 過著家的生活，快樂時光不飛去， 今天正是快樂時，齊唱詩歌， 述說主愛，快快樂樂待主再來。

SongPage.Title: 29 讚我恩人
SongPage.Context:
1.我主耶穌，惟你是配，來得永遠的讚美； 因你愛心，恩典慈良，遠超我們所能想。
2.我們滿心感激不盡，前來稱頌你尊名； 一生一世滿披恩惠，到處述說你寶貴。
3.我們所拜的主耶穌，你是何等的寬恕； 你的愛心，像你能力，永無限量永無已。
4.耶穌你是首先末後，你要領我到盡頭； 一直領進榮耀裡去，與你作王到永久。
副歌： 讚祂！讚祂！讚我恩人，聖徒們哪！當高聲！ 讚祂！讚祂！直到天上，讚得完全讚得長。

SongPage.Title: 30 榮美靈宮
SongPage.Context:
1.天上有新城耶路撒冷，根基共有十二座； 這城是神親手經營所建造，根基中有一顆是翡翠。 啊！奇妙窯匠，石頭琢磨成翡翠， 願每一顆的翡翠通透在主前。
2.新耶路撒冷就是教會，我們心裡充滿歡樂； 主的救恩使我獲得榮耀，改變我有價值為主活。 啊！偉大窯匠，我們無限忠於你， 直到永遠世代裡，我們見證主。

SongPage.Title: 31 主必快來
SongPage.Context:
1.黑夜已深，白晝將近；榮耀盼望，給我喜樂。 時代真理快樂信息，主為萬王之王萬主之主。
2.世界潮流，天然現象，天下局勢都是預兆， 父神所召忠心見證，高聲傳我救主必快再來。
3.許多信徒主內安睡，主再來時都要復活。 存活信徒身體改變；同被提到雲間與主相會。
4.榮耀教會人數將滿！輝煌靈宮快要完工！ 七年災難速速來臨；當儆醒！潔自己！候主再臨。
副歌： 主必快來！主必快來！主必快再來提接教會； 或在早晨，或正午或夜半，我知主快再來！

SongPage.Title: 32 被提
SongPage.Context:
1.教會將要被提，愁苦轉為歡喜； 那日來臨毫無遲疑，不過今朝明夕。
2.外面似乎憂慮，內心甘甜如蜜； 因為我主已經應許，我們與祂同居。
3.應該妝飾整齊，等候羔羊婚娶； 那日喜樂光華無比，有祂已夠滿意。
4.為了將來甜蜜，苦難立刻忘記； 目前景況雖像客旅，轉瞬即享安息。
副歌： 主啊，我愛你！我心渴想你！ 為你將萬有撇棄，鄙視一切名利。

SongPage.Title: 33 天上美家
SongPage.Context: 他們卻羨慕一個更美的家鄉，就是在一天上的， 所以神被稱為他們的神並不以為恥； 因為祂已經給他們預備了一座城， 因為祂已經給他們預備了一座城。

SongPage.Title: 34 橄欖山一別
SongPage.Context:
1.自橄欖山你與我們分手後，我心有個真空無可補滿， 我在河濱將琴掛在柳枝頭，你未再來我怎有心彈奏， 當我深夜孤獨安靜的時候，觀看星宿念你在三層天上， 不禁歎息！我想你離我多遠，我想著你應許已久的歸旋
2.你的馬槽使我生客旅之想，你的苦架使我撇棄世界， 你的再來使我懷未見之鄉，主你自己成我追求目的， 你未再來喜樂來己減它滋味，詩歌也缺它所應有的甜美， 你未再來，終日我若有所失，主啊我要你來我不要你遲
3.雖我在此也能享受你同在，但我深處依然有個缺憾， 雖然有你光照也有你愛情，但我心裡仍像有個空缺， 我雖平安在世仍受眾苦難，我雖喜樂我仍不免有悲嘆， 滿足之間，我心靈仍有渴求，是因我還未能與你面對面
4.當我回想我已等候多長久，不禁歎息低頭獨自流淚， 求你快來改變我朽壞身體，現今就來接我與你相會， 來吧！我主這是教會的呼求，來吧！我主你的新婦正催促， 歷世歷代聖徒累積的共鳴，我主能否求你今天一起聽！

SongPage.Title: 35 主滿足我心懷
SongPage.Context:
1.救主耶穌我一思念，心中滿有甜味， 若是在天親見主面，必更香甜百倍。
2.口所能唱，心所能想，任何追憶思念， 總無一樣聲音，能比我主名更甜。
3.我常思想，憂傷之人如何蒙主安慰？ 迷路之人如何救回，不禁感讚滿懷！
4.你若問我尋見救主，究竟有何所得？ 主的恩愛筆舌難述，深願你親嘗受。
5.惟主是我平安、福樂，又是將來賞賜。 求主使我以你為榮，從今直到永世。
副歌： 惟主能使我心知足，主外別名無味， 恆愛，盼望，永遠喜樂，全在主耶穌內。

SongPage.Title: 36 若得全世界
SongPage.Context:
1.若得全世界得不到救主，我這樣活著有何益處， 世上事物都要很快過去，我心靈怎能寧靜安舒。
2.主耶穌是我一切真快樂，醫治破碎心靈的良藥， 無論何重罪，祂都能赦免，無論何憂傷，祂都能體念。
3.若得全世界得不到救主，我這樣活著有何益處， 世上事物都要很快過去，我心靈怎能寧靜安舒。
副歌： 若得全世界得不到救主，我一生奮鬥價值為何 世上一切快樂怎能一比，基督充滿的美羡生活。

SongPage.Title: 37 與我相見
SongPage.Context:
1.晨星暗中照閃，光輝漸破夜簾， 靜悄中有聲音， 把我喚醒：「孩子快起來。」
2.來開始新一天，快回到我面前， 為早已預備豐富筵席， 孩子，與我相見。
3.求可於今天每時共你心相連， 在我心裡你佔首要位置， 求主與我相見。
副歌： 渴慕與主面對面，盼望聽盡你恩言， 我願坦蕩赤露心田，給你更新改變。

SongPage.Title: 37 祈禱良時
SongPage.Context:
1.祈禱良時祈禱良時，在此我將世慮推辭， 我今俯伏施恩座前，諸般心願對主明言， 在遇苦難憂愁之際，屢得平安慰我心意， 網羅屢脫總不延遲，我惟靠此祈禱良時。
2.祈禱良時祈禱良時，忘記世間一切難處， 屈膝跪在施恩座前，為得恩惠幫助慈憐， 尋求你面和你能力，敬聽恩言蒙你眷念， 靠你常得安慰慈愛，我惟渴慕祈禱良時。

SongPage.Title: 38 基督徒樣式
SongPage.Context:
1.行事為人當與蒙召恩相稱，凡事謙虛溫柔， 忍耐用愛心互相寬容，用和平彼此聯絡， 竭力保守聖靈所賜合一的心。
2.惟用愛心說出誠實的話語，凡事長進連於 元首主基督全身百節，都靠祂聯絡合式， 各按各職，發揮功用彼此相助。
副歌： 身體一個聖靈一個指望也祗一個， 一主，一信，一洗叫我們都合一。

SongPage.Title: 39 請安歌
SongPage.Context: 啊！親愛弟兄聽呀聽呀聽我唱歌問候你。 我盼望有事情呀情呀情呀我能夠幫助你。 在春天夏天並那並那並那秋天和嚴冬， 我定呀定呀定然、令呀令呀令你、 心呀心呀心歡喜。

SongPage.Title: 39 彼得前書第二章
SongPage.Context: 祂被掛在木頭上，親身擔當了我們罪債， 使我們既然在罪上死，就得以在義上活。 因祂受鞭傷，我們便得醫治， 從前迷路的羊，現今歸到靈魂牧人。

SongPage.Title: 40 慈愛主信實無變
SongPage.Context:
1.慈愛主信實無變，在每天清晨，主愛已彰顯 慈愛主信實無變，沒有分陰晴，主愛勵勉
2.慈愛主信實無變，日影西斜，主愛更溫暖 慈愛主信實無變，沒有分冬暖，主愛復眷
副歌： 愛慕到達主跟前，渴慕救主引牽 困苦壓迫憂心掛念 神愛眷必不停斷，神愛眷終不改變

SongPage.Title: 40 你比世人更美
SongPage.Context: 主之外，主之外，在天我何所歸向，在地我無所愛慕， 你比世人更美，你比世人更美，在你嘴裡滿有恩惠。

SongPage.Title: 40 有一恩手
SongPage.Context: 雖然我常不受注意，在天地中真渺小， 神在天上看顧著我，雖然我看不見祂， 有一恩手帶領我，有一恩手帶領我， 我知道我不孤單，當我行過世路途， 因為有一恩手帶領我，是有一恩手帶領我。

SongPage.Title: 41 標竿
SongPage.Context:
1.為祂已丟棄萬事，為祂已看作糞土， 為要得著基督，為要得著基督， 並且得以在祂裡面。
2.我不以為自己得著，只有一事在我身上， 就是忘記背後，努力面前， 忘記背後努力面前。
2.然而我常與你同在，你攙著我的右手， 你以訓言來引導我，以後接我到榮耀裡， 除你以外我有誰所愛慕。
3.向著標竿直跑，為要得神的獎賞， 就從上面召我來得的獎賞， 我不以地上的事為念。

SongPage.Title: 42 我寧願有耶穌
SongPage.Context:
1.我寧願有耶穌，不要權位； 我寧願屬主，不願財富無邊。 我寧願有耶穌，不要虛榮； 我深願一生跟隨主前行。
2.恩主比百合花美麗鮮艷； 祂更比蜂房下滴的蜜甘甜。 我帶飢渴心靈來到主前； 享主的恩愛，勝似赴美筵。
副歌： 不願做君王，雖統治萬方， 卻被罪權所苦害， 我寧願有耶穌不要塵世， 任何榮華情愛！

SongPage.Title: 43 一顆單純愛主的心
SongPage.Context:
1.誰有一顆愛主的心，像馬利亞單純； 世上一切不愛不親，專心愛主到底。 越遭誤會越與主近，甘心犧牲不吝； 直到今日主仍尋找體貼主心的人。
2.求主賜我愛你的心，像馬利亞單純； 珍貴香膏日日貯存，只獻耶穌一人。 親友譏誚唯主知心，屋中滿了芬芳； 直到今日主仍尋找體貼主心的人。
3.求主賜我愛你的心，像馬利亞單純； 抓住機會玉瓶破碎，免得香膏退回。 雖被難為何必枉費，完全澆主頭上； 直到今日主仍尋找體貼主心的人。

SongPage.Title: 44 親近主
SongPage.Context:
1.救主是我永遠福份，比生命朋友寶貴； 我今在此荒野路程，甚願一路親近主。 親近主，親近主，親近主，親近主； 我今在此荒野路程，甚願一路親近主。
2.我願丟棄世間宴樂，不求功名與富貴； 情願為主勞碌辛苦，只求能夠親近主。 親近主，親近主，親近主，親近主； 情願為主勞碌辛苦，只求能夠親近主。
3.求主領我走完此世，因我不知如何行； 一直領我走回天家，更與我主倍親近。 親近主，親近主，親近主，親近主； 一直領我走回天家，更與我主倍親近。

SongPage.Title: 45 我歌唱我的主
SongPage.Context:
1.我歌唱我的主，無論到何處， 歌唱祂奇妙的愛，讓世界知道， 為拯救罪人像我，死在各各他十架， 我歌唱我的主，無論到何處。
2.我歌唱為罪人，因為我深知， 耶穌基督的寶血，洗罪白如雪， 若我所唱的詩歌，能叫人認識我主， 我歌唱我的主，無論到何處。
3.我歌唱為聖徒，當他們前行， 歡樂地不久便到，不再有悲嘆， 我們將同聲歌頌，讚美全能大君王， 我歌唱我的主，無論到何處。

SongPage.Title: 46 將你最好的獻與主
SongPage.Context:
1.將你最好的獻與主，獻你生命的清晨； 將你純潔熱情心靈，忠心為真理打仗， 主耶穌已有好榜樣，勇敢堅定不懼怕； 你要熱心真誠愛主，將最好奉獻與祂。
2.將你最好的獻與主，主愛偉大無可比； 祂將自己作你贖價，天上榮耀賞賜你， 祂捨生命毫不退縮，救你脫罪把血灑； 你要忠心殷勤事主，將最好奉獻與祂。
副歌： 將你最好的獻與主，獻你生命的清晨； 穿上救恩全副軍裝，忠心為真理打仗。

SongPage.Title: 47 靠我靈成事
SongPage.Context:
1.是否有山阻擋你路，甚多疑惑恐懼； 放心請聽聖靈所言，這山必要挪去。
2.是否有河阻隔你路，這河又深又廣； 踏上河水必要滾開，你必安達彼岸。
3.是否有火試煉臨到，過於你所能受； 看哪！萬福真神兒子，祂必與你同走。
4.單獨信靠全能的神，主言風也聽從， 務要壯膽不可灰心，主必為你開路。
副歌： 非勢力，非才能，主說：「乃靠我的靈成事。」 非勢力，非才能，主說：「靠我靈成事。」 這大山必要挪移，這大山必要挪移； 這大山必要挪移，主說：「靠我靈成事。」

SongPage.Title: 48 主啊你吸引我
SongPage.Context: 主啊你吸引我，我就快跑隨你。 我心深深與主默契。蹤然北風興起， 雖然南風吹來，卻溢出我園中香氣。 我主全然美麗，我主滿我心意， 主你屬我，主我也屬你。 眾水不能熄滅，大水不能淹沒， 我必我必愛主到底。

SongPage.Title: 49 我知誰管著明天
SongPage.Context:
1.我不知明天的道路，每一天只為主活 我不借明天的太陽，因明天或許陰暗。 我不要為將來憂慮，因我信主的應許； 我今天要與主同行，因祂知前面如何。
2.每一步越走越光明，像攀登黃金階梯 每重擔越挑越輕省，每朵雲披上銀衣。 在那裡陽光常普照，在那裡沒有眼淚； 在美麗彩虹的盡頭，眾山嶺與天相連。
3.我不知明天的道路，或遭遇生活苦楚 但那位養活麻雀者，祂必然也看顧我。 祂是我旅途的良伴，或經過水火之災； 但救主必與我同在，祂寶血把我遮蓋。
副歌： 有許多未來的事情，我現在不能識透； 但我知誰管著明天，我也知誰牽我手。

SongPage.Title: 50 這世界非我家
SongPage.Context:
1.這世界非我家，我是個寄居客；我積財寶在天， 我心羨慕天家。我願擺上自己，在世為主而活； 我永不再貪愛這世界為我家。主啊你知我無良友像你， 天堂若非我家，我必流離無依。在世搶救靈魂， 完成我主大工；一日天門大開，我主親自迎迓。
